items.title: Fahren sie nicht mit Eurostar!
items.review_text:
Das war mit abstand die schlechteste zugfahrt die ich je hatte(Köln nach Paris). Erst hatte der Eurostar 45 Minuten verspätung, dann musste der zug auf halber strecke(3 Stunden) um 0 uhr aufgrund von organisatorischen Problemen wieder zum nächstgrößeren bahnhof fahren. Den Fahrgästen wurde gesagt, weitere Informationen gäbe es um 5 Uhr morgens. Genervt sind alle in umliegende Hotels gezogen und am nächsten morgen wieder zum Bahnhof. Dort wurden uns zwar die Tickets für die weiterfahrt finanziert, jedoch war der Zug diesmal so überfüllt, dass uns keine sitzplätze gegeben wurden. Ich kann nur empfehlen, die Fahrten mit Eurostar so gut es geht zu vermeiden.
-ein geschädigter Kunde

items.title: Absolute joke and scam!
items.review_text:
Haven't even traveled yet and their company is an embarrassment!
I booked two tickets for me and my mum, input all the correct information, her name, age and passport information all comes up as correct but when I click to fownload ticket it's under my name so it's unusable. 
I called up asking for help and they told me as its booked under my account I can't use it and I'll just have to keep it for myself for a later date so £100 lost even though all the information is correct. 
I asked for a name change because they said its £15 but they refused me because its linked to my account. 

Absolute joke and scam!

items.title: Cheating customers from earning loyalty points
items.review_text: If I can give 0 star, I would definitely do. Be careful if you want to earn the loyalty points. I put my full name on my ticket to match with my passport which makes total sense. I provide ‘First name’ and ‘Last name’ as per request in my Eurostar account. I end up was told I cannot earn loyalty points because they cannot ‘recognise an identifiable link between two seemingly different customers’. They cannot identify customers with the difference between full name and first/last name. Stop cheating your customers. The loyalty points system is such a joke!

items.title: Beware you don’t swallow glass!
items.review_text:
Beware! Complete health and safety risk. I travelled to Paris, my first ever trip on Eurostar. Everything was fine until my breakfast tray arrived. Was about to put my bottled water into my glass when I noticed 2 broken pieces of glass sitting at the bottom on my glass. One large enough to do significant damage if it was swallowed.

Train staff were great, apologised profusely and advised they would write an incident report.

I complained formally to Eurostar who offered me a discount off a future ticket to restor my faith in the business (their words not mine). I refused this and now they have come back and said they have now passed the matter to their 3rd party caterers to resolve and I have to wait 6 weeks for a response.

Come on Eurostar, you put the health and safety of your passengers at risk and then bat off the responsibility to a third party. My contract was with you, not your caterers. 

Take some responsibility, manage your suppliers failings and show the customer you actually care about them and own this disgrace.

items.title: Euro star is a good experiences
items.review_text:
Nice comfortable trains, Quite a few a day, not mad polices, Friendly staff.
But you they can make it even much better if by buying on the train cafe you should collect points like when traveling.
The second they can make better is that the trains going to the UK should start their route in Antwerp centraal, Then Bruusels, Lile Europe & final stop in St Pancres Internatinol.

items.title: Eurostar step up and improve the app
items.review_text: I have had a love/hate relationship with Eurostar for a while in the sense I absolutely loved to travel with Eurostar 5 years ago, and today it treats loyal customers with contempt. There is literally nothing that is ever settled in the clients favour, delays, rebookings, the recent points migration, or even conflict with client services around missed points due to the app. Key here is I don't understand  why the app as a cornerstone of the travel experience still misses points, but tells you to wait 24 hours before adding the travel reference, but also doesn't work so often over the past years. It really feels like its on purpose to clear statuses because the lounge was too busy. If they keep this up am pretty sure the lounge and the trains will be empty.

items.title: Geen enkele coulance als je een ticket…
items.review_text: Geen enkele coulance als je een ticket wilt wijzigen. In mijn geval: ik wil op het laatste moment (3 dagen voor vertrek) een andere reisgenoot meenemen. Mag niet, je kan uiterlijk 1 week voor vertrek de tenaamstelling wijzigen. "Mevrouw de trein is vol" .... maar als mijn oorspronkelijke reisgenoot niet meegaat is er toch plek, " nee mevrouw, het kan toch niet". Ontzettend vervelend,  het zal best in de kleine lettertjes staan,  maar ik heb er nooit aan gedacht dat zo iets bij een treinkaartje een probleem zou kunnen zijn. Ik koop nooit meer iets bij eurostar!

items.title: Unglaubliche Abzocke beim Ticketpreis…
items.review_text:
Unglaubliche Abzocke beim Ticketpreis an Bord.
Soeben 55 Euro für Düsseldorf nach Aachen bezahlt, da der EST 9474 in der DB App als Alternative angezeigt wurde, aufgrund von Verspätungen meiner eigentlichen ICE Verbindung.
Im Eurostar Zug wurde mir dann eröffnet, dass ich einen (erhöhten) Fahrpreis zu zahlen hätte. Die Zusatzinfo darüber in der DB App ist versteckt und muss aufgerufen werden, keine Ahnung warum der EST überhaupt als Alternative bei aufgehobener Zugbindung angezeigt wird.
Keine Ahnung wie man Menschen so vom Zugfahren in Europa überzeugen will.

items.title: The most discusting and dome 1st class…
items.review_text: The most discusting and dome 1st class seat arrangement I ever saw in a train. Seats are looking to each other, very close to each other, no space to put your foot, face to face with a strager hours long. The whole compartment was so. Next time gonna choose airplane then this unconfortable and stupidly desighned train.

items.title: 2x gebeld en gevraagd om naam te…
items.review_text: 2x gebeld en gevraagd om naam te wijzigen en expres 2x opgehangen ongelofelijk! Je betaald grof geld maar naam wijzigen is sinds kort niet leer mogelijk.nog nooit zulke klantonvriendelijke service medewerkers meegemaakt.

items.title: Vlot en comfortabel, prima!
items.review_text: Prima vlot en comfortabel gereisd voor een stedentrip naar Londen. Uiteraard moet je op tijd aanwezig zijn omdat je de EU verlaat en door de douane en security moet. Maar veel minder drukte en wachten dan op een vliegveld. In de trein genoeg ruimte en horeca voorziening plus goede en vriendelijke service. Bovendien kom je in de stad aan en hoef je niet nog van het vliegveld naar Londen te reizen. Het is ons prima bevallen!

items.title: Geen wifi, geen koffie
items.review_text:
Geen wifi terwijl dat wel beloofd wordt. Zit je dan 4 uur ;).
Daardoor kan je niet of nauwelijks pinnen want dat is een mobiel apparaat. 5x proberen. Bizar lange rij bij restaurateiwagen. Geen melk voor de koffie. Daardoor 20 minuten voor niets in de rij.

items.title: Discusting staff in Eurostar Paris
items.review_text: Discusting staff in Eurostar Paris. I am a Etiolle member and due to a late change of plan my business premier booking had to be changed and there was only comfort class left. I was travelling with my wife and had booked both tickets on my account. Upon arrival at the ES desk the lady refused to admit my wife as she did not have membership. The staff member was very rude and not even prepared to listen or help. The lounge was also empty. Good luck ES but if you continue to employee dusting staff you will not get better

items.title: A disgrace
items.review_text:
Do not waste any money booking hotels with Eurostar it’s a complete scam and they do not allow any flexibility it’s better to use Booking or Expedia as these companies allow better terms if you have an emergency or a situation outside your control. 
I contacted Eurostar to modify my train and hotel booking as due to severe weather conditions I was unable to travel to get to London to take the train to Paris this was a unprecedented never seen in history case of extreme weather conditions experienced in my home country which made me unable to arrive in London on time. I was told there was nothing that could be done, extremely unhelpful and unsympathetic customer service, I gave them 6 days notice and they said it needed to be 7 and for me to try travel insurance. I even said I was okay with losing the hotel if they at least allowed me to move the travel day for the tickets to a month ahead, but with no success. Eurostar pocketed £470.

items.title: No Flexibility at all
items.review_text: My family saved up a enough points on the Eurostar to get a trip for our family of 3 to Disneyland Paris for April 24, we changed the date to May 24 due my work commitments. When we changed the tickets we were not notified that we aren't allowed to make anymore changes, usually you can change your tickets multiple times. We now not in a financial position to afford Disneyland and wanted to postpone our trip to next year. Eurostar however are refusing to change the ticket and saying that you will loose them. I'm really upset by this as we have tried to save to take our 5 year old to Disney. I feel that they were not helpful, were abrupt and not sympathetic to me and lacked compassion. I know that exceptions can be made. I will def NOT be recommending Eurostar to anyone.

items.title: Great until there’s a problem
items.review_text: We travelled from London to Amsterdam on a train and hotel package with business premier tickets. The facilities and service at St Pancras and on the train were excellent and we thoroughly enjoyed the first part of our journey. Unfortunately at Brussels there was a problem and after being held for ages we were told we couldn’t continue for “operational reasons” and everyone was ordered off the train and just told to get the next one. There was no help or assistance. After several platform changes which are problem when you are travelling with a disabled person with mobility problems, the train arrived and everyone was told we were not allowed on and staff aggressively blocked anyone from getting on. They told us they couldn’t help, we were on our own and we just had to go to the Eurostar desk. Obviously a train full of angry passengers meant it was chaos at the desk and no help anyway, we were told we had to arrange getting booked on another train ourselves. Instead of enjoying ourselves in Amsterdam we wasted hours of our holiday stuck in Brussels station. I understand problems can and do happen, but to not have a comprehensive recovery procedure, clearly communicated to both passengers and staff, with full support for passengers is completely unacceptable. Despite the train being initially being labelled as cancelled, when it comes to compensation they have now reclassified it as only delayed not cancelled. If abandoning a train full of passengers in an entirely different country to the one they paid to get to is not a cancellation, I don’t know what is. On our return 5 days later we were held again at Brussels for over 3 hours. This time entirely beyond Eurostar’s control and we got to stay on the train, but it was an anxious wait fearing history was repeating. I thought travelling by train would be less hassle than flying, it seems not.

items.title: Paris - London
items.review_text: In Paris, Passkontrolle bei der Ausreise und 5 Meter gleich wieder bei der Einteise, lange Schlangen, Sicherheitskontrolle und das ganze etwas chaotisch. Scheiben des Zugs milchig-dreckig. Ab der Schweiz eigentlich kein Vorteil gegenüber dem Flugzeug. Ab Paris aber sicher sinnvoll.

items.title: Stuck in Antwerp C.
items.review_text: We have been stuck for more than 2 hours in Antwerp C where our route was cancelled by Eurostar. We couldn't onboard another train since Eurostar people prompted us to pay 64 euros just to take the next train.

items.title: Thank you so much
items.review_text:
Thank you so much, Ingrid (Train Manager, Eurostar). 

She was super kind, supportive and helpful when we boarded the wrong train. Our journey was so pleasant and she even gave us recommendations on places to visit in Belgium - a true ambassador to her home country!

items.title: The new app is a disaster
items.review_text:
The new app is a disaster. I travel every week from Lille to London but I am so frustrated with the app over the last few month and instead of fixing issues its getting worst every single week.
I loved eurostar for years but really worried about the direction it's taking.
I really hope behind the new fancy looking loyalty program they focus on getting the basics right.
Example:
(1) ability to book a journey without facing 10 bugs in the process
(2) Holding customer API (as it used to be)
(3) ability to change the departure or destination...

items.title: Alioune & Anne-Marie
items.review_text: First time on Eurostar and it will definitely not be our last!! It was fabulous much better than flying and the food was very good too. Shout out to Alioune on the 9008 and also to him and Anne-Marie on the way back 9055, they had a great sense of humour, great customer service from them both. Fabulous experience for me and my husband. Thank you.

items.title: Arnaque au billet : Site internet en panne pour modifier sa résa
items.review_text:
Un réservation faite pour un train Bruxelles Paris A/R le 9 avril 2024, IMPOSSIBLE à modifier car le site internet indique “Oupps une erreur s’est produite …” 
Bref arnaque complète et depuis 5 jours impossible de joindre le service client.

items.title: Companies like Eurostar are going to…
items.review_text: Companies like Eurostar are going to decimate the train industry. Save your money and time and fly. Same level of customer service and headache as Heathrow anyway.

items.title: Terrible service
items.review_text: Terrible service. 2 and a half hour delay on train to Paris, they let you stand for the whole one hour and a half trip even though you payed seats

items.title: Te duur, neem het vliegtuig maar!
items.review_text: Jaren met de Eurostar gereisd van en naar Londen, eerst vanuit Brussel later vanuit Rotterdam. Heerlijk! En toen.... gingen de prijzen door het dak. Deze jongen had nog nooit met het vliegtuig gereisd maar helaas werd ik om deze reden geforceerd het vliegtuig te pakken voor slechts een fractie van de kosten. Ik kan me absoluut niet voorstellen dat er nog mensen 100-200 euro voor een enkele reis betalen en dan ook nog 2e klas! Ryanair 35euro retour LOL!!!!

items.title: Des billets de train achetés un mois à…
items.review_text:
Des billets de train achetés un mois à l'avance.
Et au passage à la. Douane on constate que nos Places ont été modifiées, résultat je me retrouve séparée de mon mari 😳.
Furieuse, inadmissible !

items.title: JOKE COMPANY
items.review_text:
JOKE COMPANY

Putting the ticket prices up to extortionate levels even though it is months in advance. What is the benefit of travelling by train? Save your money and fly!

items.title: Keurig afgehandeld door Kevin van customer service.In december met Eurostar naar Londen…
items.review_text:
In december met Eurostar naar Londen vanaf Rotterdam en helaas ruim 3 uur vertraging. Aanvankelijk werd onze claim tot onze verbazing afgewezen. Vandaar onze 4 sterren.
Opnieuw contact opgenomen, dit keer kreeg ik Kevin aan de telefoon van de afdeling Customer Service. Alles uitgelegd en hij nam de tijd om het nog eens grondig na te kijken en wat bleek: er was een fout gemaakt en we hadden recht op compensatie en kregen 50% van onze ticketprijs terug. Complimenten voor Kevin, en Eurostar: wees zuinig op deze medewerker, hij doet wat de reizigers nodig hebben en op prijs stellen: een eerlijke check en nette behandeling!

items.title:
Premium price for Eurostar known low grade broken facilities. Dont waste your
Money with Eurostar Premier miss selling
items.review_text: Terrible facilities on tired and broken train carriages. Eurostar quality of customer service  has fallen through the floor since merge with Tallyis. Paid for Premier and no there was no Power sockets and no Wifi available on either journey to or from Brussels. staff all have pre set excuse of old rolling stock and its always this way so noting they can do.clearly Eurostar intentionally miss selling premium service price for low grade facilities.. don’t waste the money ever again with Eurostar.

items.title: Terrible customer service
items.review_text: Terrible customer service, outrageous policies, unclear and misleading advertising. Also face unnecessary rejection at the gate because I was 5 minutes late due to a train cancellation. Then the service was also delayed. Ridiculous. Change to next available train for free is rubbish too, they charged me £44. Second time I’ve used Eurostar and it’s the second time I’m having issues, will fly from now, it’s cheaper anyway!

items.title: Tendu à Saint Pancras
items.review_text: Je viens de lire que je ne suis pas le seul à arriver avant les 30 minutes & à trouver les portillons fermés... Je confirme que le personnel anglais à l'accueil est désagréable: voix de stentor, répète inlassablementdes formules de politesse sans donner de réponses claires . Très déçu, je prendrai l'avion la prochaine fois = plus carré... De plus, le 1er train pour Londres à partir de Lille est à 8h35, ce qui n'est pas du tout pratique... Le dernier train venant de Londres à Lille n'a pas de correpondance avec la SNCF locale...

items.title: Déplorable
items.review_text:
Déplorable ! Le train n°9018 Paris-Londres le 02/04/24 à 10h08 a eu 59 minutes de retard. Le chef de bord a annoncé que nous pouvions percevoir une compensation et qu'il fallait attendre 24h avant de remplir le formulaire. Lorsque l'assistance est venue me chercher j'ai demander plusieurs fois si nous pouvions réclamer une compensation, elle m'a certifiée que oui à deux reprises. J'ai attendu les 24 h de délais. Le site me refusant à plusieurs fois le formulaire rempli sans justication precise et ne comprenant pas ce qu'il se passe jai contacté le service client afin de resoudre le problème.  La personne me dit qu'il aurait fallu 1 minute de plus pour que la compensation soit accordée. J'ai demandé une réclamation car je ne trouve cela inadmissible que l'on nous ait fait croire qu'il était possible d'obtenir la compensation et en plus à 1 minute près!!! 
Je viens de recevoir la réponse négative. 
Les managers eurostar n'ont aucune considération pour la clientèle !! Que les futurs clients le sachent si jamais ils se retrouvent dans la même situation

items.title: Website is worst that I've encountered for travel.
items.review_text:
I haven't even managed to book tickets yet, despite three tries. I can't yet comment on other aspects of travel, but the website is pathetic. Unclear, bordering on impenetrable, without any clear signals for something as simple as ordering two return, Standard Premier tickets from St P to Brussels Midi for seniors!
They should be ashamed of themselves. It's 2024 and they still don't have a decent tech team!!!

items.title: Des trains constamment en retard pour…
items.review_text: Des trains constamment en retard pour des billets à des prix élevés. La prestation ne suis pas !

items.title: Trip from Amsterdam to London
items.review_text:
Trip from Amsterdam to London.   
Was stuck on a train for 9 hours, was given a kit Kat and a glass of water, during this time.
Managed to get off the train in Brussels, to be locked in a waiting room, with just water  for another 3.5 hrs.    
Finally made in into London the following day.   
Instead of being apologetic for everything we had been through, they are picking at the bits of compensation they are going to pay.

items.title: Sorrowful standard premier Eurostar
items.review_text: Eurostar began as a gateway to Europe for British travellers wanting to go for a day or weekend break. Fast forward and I was railroaded, excuse the pun into an ambush by entering St Pancras station to board with time to spare and being subjected to a twenty minute queue to get through to the departure lounge. This is a strategic money-making scam similar to the budget airlines. I was then refused entry after paying a premium fare of 250 for 2 and forced to pay additional 88 pounds due to their intentional  ambush of its customers, made victims. My advice is to fly and avoid Eurostar at all costs!!!

items.title: Service catastrophique.
items.review_text:
Service catastrophique.
Erreur sur l'horaire indiqué sur mon billet de train. Surprise à l'arrivée en gare du Nord : l'eurostar partait 10 minutes avant l'heure inscrite sur mon billet. 
Bilan j'ai raté mon train pour leur incompétence, et j'ai du dépenser 50€ pour un nouveau billet. Ni excuse, ni geste commercial.

items.title: Water in de tunnel, Eurostar de dienstverlening overboord
items.review_text: 30 December 2023 , zouden we terug gaan vanuit Londen naar Amsterdamse. 3 personen businessclass tickets verrassing voor kerst. Water in de tunnel, eerst vertraging daarna cancelled. Wij in de stress hoe terug te komen, bellen Eurostar geen antwoord, appen geen antwoord, mmmh zelf retour uitzoeken. Geen hulp, niets niets niets. Zelf hotel en terugreis geregeld en betaald. Ze schrijven de dag erna dat je een claim in kunt dienen. Nou toen begon de ellende!! Kastje naar de muur. Ook een excuus ze worden samen gevoegd met Thalys Paris het kan wel duren. Terwijl ik een DJ op de radio hoor dat hij ook vast zat en binnen no time zijn geld terug had!!!! Ik heb na 4 maanden nog steeds mijn geld niet terug, ik kreeg een standaard bedrag terug voor mijn tickets, ik loop 360 euro mis. Wtf is dit voor oplichterij.

items.title: Very disappointed by Eurostar
items.review_text: Very disappointed by Eurostar. After waiting for more than 3 hours, our train was cancelled. It was 11 pm and we had no public transportation to go home. Eurostar offers no solutions and hotels are only available for non belgian residants. We weren't able to cancel our first hotel night as it was already 11 pm and the hotel couldn't rent the room toe anyone else. Except for rebooking our ticket free of charge (which is the bare minimum when your train is cancelled) we had no compensation for our three hour wait and for our hotel. When contacting customer service the only answer I get is "sorry we can't reimburse those costs" and no other explanation. We lost a lot of money and a lot of time.

items.title: A cheap and nasty shambles
items.review_text:
We travelled standard premier and my advice to other people is don’t bother. There is no working WiFi, the food is inedible, the trains are tired and dirty and the staff are miserable.
Departing from St Pancras was utter chaos, nowhere to sit and poor facilities. 
Gare du Nord is even worse. We queued for an hour to get through only to be told that the train is delayed. It is delayed as they can’t process people quickly enough.
Again at Gare du Nord there is nowhere to sit down as it so busy.
We will never use Eurostar again. I’d rather travel from central London to Heathrow than endure this experience again. Eurostar treat the passengers with utter contempt.
What a waste of time and money. Fly if you can!

items.title: Komfort gleich Null
items.review_text: Komfortsitze? Keine Spur! Für große Personen zu wenig Beinabstand. Service Verpflegung: Null trotz 1. Klasse. Auf der Rückreise gab's nicht mal ein "Bistro", sondern lediglich ein paar Automaten mit Chips und Riegeln. Dafür, dass der ES lediglich pünktlich ist, ist er zu teuer. Nie wieder!

items.title: A Disastrous Journey of Incompetence and Indifference.
items.review_text: Absolutely disappointed with Eurostar's service. While in Paris, we received a sudden notification that our train was canceled, causing immense panic and distress. In a frenzy, we hastily booked a flight back to Bristol, only to receive an email moments later acknowledging their error – our train was never canceled. This gross incompetence cost us precious time, money, and ruined the remainder of our day in Paris. Despite eventually receiving a refund for the return fare, the damage was already done. Our trip was marred by unnecessary stress and uncertainty, leaving us deeply dissatisfied with Eurostar's reliability and customer care. Additionally, we were appalled to witness Eurostar's willingness to leave a disabled man in a wheelchair and his family stranded in Paris with no refund for at least 3 days, and no accommodation provided. Furthermore, their exorbitant charge of £150 more per person to change our train to the following hour was outrageous, especially when compared to the £90 flight with EasyJet per person that we ultimately took. Eurostar's disregard for the well-being of its passengers and their families is unacceptable, and I cannot in good conscience recommend their services to anyone.

items.title: Marlies at Eurostar Lost Property St Pancras
items.review_text: I left my work phone on the Eurostar arriving into St Pancras. I was extremely worried and upset and emailed Eurostar Lost Propert, within 24hrs it was located and I was contacted to my immense relief. It was packaged for me and I arranged for Royal Mail to pick it up. Excellent communication throughout and 5 star service from Marlies.

items.title: Service clientèle catastrophique et très désagréable
items.review_text:
Service clientèle désagréable, méchant et inefficace.
J'ai réservé un billet Anvers- Paris. Je l'ai par inadvertance annulé. Résultat pas de remboursement des 250 euros payé , ni de bons,  ni de proposition quelquonque pour que je puisse récupérer mon billet ou mon argent.
Extrêmement déçue de cette compagnie que je pensais respectable et qui s'avère être  minable. Je ne reserverai plus chez eux à l'avenir.
(Référence trajet: JZ23MV)

items.title: Bought tickets but had to change the…
items.review_text: Bought tickets but had to change the dates. I exchanged the tickets but was then horrified that I had paid double the amount. The site isn’t clear at all, be careful when changing dates. I messaged customer services a few times but just got a standard response, basically tough. Wish I never even bothered about booking the train, I could have flown with my new price. Scam and unclear pricing structure.

items.title: À fuir
items.review_text: Non seulement tous leurs trains sont en retard mais le formulaire pour se faire rembourser ne fonctionne pas. Leur service est injoignable. Cette compagnie est à fuir!

items.title: Der Eurostar ist eine bequeme und…
items.review_text:
Der Eurostar ist eine bequeme und schnelle Art von Köln nach Paris zu reisen. Die Züge waren pünktlich. Wir sind 1. Klasse gefahren, der Platz war ausreichend.
ABER: Das Essen war eine Katastrophe. Unbeschreiblich schlecht. Auf der Rückfahrt haben wir das Menü gleich weggelassen. Die Toiletten waren auf der Hin- und Rückfahrt eine Zumutung. Kein fließend Wasser. Dafür floß etwas anderes durch den Raum. Das geht gar nicht. Ohne Essen und Toilettengang war es aber o.k.

items.title: Honteux !!!
items.review_text:
Honteux !!!
Départ lundi de Paris vers Amesterdam Central  : retard 1h45 !
Retour jeudi vers Paris du Nord : retard 40 mn
Simplement innacceptable…. Et ne rien attendre d une éventuel community manager pour communiquer avec ses «  clients » oups un gros mot, désolé 
Dans les faits si vous êtes à l heure c est une exception

items.title: Cancelled train midway
items.review_text: Cancelled train midway because of “absence of staff”. This company is an operational nightmare, being on time only 3 out of 4 times.

items.title: Voor 2 personen een retour geboekt voor…
items.review_text:
Voor 2 personen een retour geboekt voor eind maart en in februari omgeboekt naar september dat kon kosteloos moest wel eerst weer betalen maar kon naar de kosten van de eerste boeking fluiten €190,00 
Weg gemaal met eurostar maar je wordt van het kastje naar de muur gestuurd   je kan beter gaan vliegen

items.title: Unpünktlich – schlecht organisiert – wenig kundenfreundlich
items.review_text:
Es fängt damit an, dass man in Brüssel die Abfertigungshalle nicht findet, weil sie wenig bis gar nicht ausgeschildert ist. Papierschilder ersetzen fehlende Schilder nur mäßig. 

Der Dutyfree-Shop im Abfertigungsbereich ist extrem weitläufig und schick. Die schummrige Wartehalle, in der die Fahrgäste gestapelt werden, hat dagegen eher Kelleratmosphäre. Anzeigen, sofern überhaupt vorhanden, sind kaum zu finden und nur in französisch und niederländisch, der Zug fährt aber nach London.

Verspätung über 55 Minuten. Information, die ersten 15 Minuten keine. Der Mann am Info-Schalter antwortet auf die Frage, wie lange die Verspätung voraussichtlich dauern wird, alle die im Wartebereich säßen, würden warten. Das stimmt, beantwortet aber nicht die Frage. Laut Anzeigen im Wartebereich steht der Zug schon am Bahnsteig, Boarding und Einsteigen sind angeblich schon beendet, tatsächlich ist es noch gar nicht los gegangen

Abfertigung. Über eine(!) Rollrampenanlage gelangen alle Passagiere auf einmal auf den Bahnsteig zum Zug., katastrophal schlecht organisiert und entsprechend langwierig. 

Das im Zug beworbene WLAN ist überlastet, über einen Großteil der Strecke ist kein Internet verfügbar. WiFi funktioniert, wenn überhaupt, allenfalls sporadisch in extremem Schneckentempo. Im Wartebereich ist eine Anmeldung wegen eines Serverfehlers erst gar nicht möglich.

Für den schlechten Service und die schechte Organisation, sind die Tickets definitiv deutlich zu teuer.

Dass die Fahrgäste schnell und komfortabel zum Zug kommen bzw.auf den Einstieg warten können, interessiert bei Eurostar offenbar niemanden, sie sollen allerdings ihr Geld im schicken Duty-Free ausgeben. Unternehmen, die an ihren Kunden interessiert sind, behandeln sie anders. Eurostar zeigt sich hingegen demonstrativ desinteressiert.

Fazit: Muss man sich nicht antun.

items.title: overcrowded VIP lounge
items.review_text: overcrowded VIP lounge - the non VIP lounge even worse - poor selection of shops, boarding experience again chaotic due to large crowds. Seats in Business Premier same as in other areas and too hard. Only thing available in larger quantities is booze. The meal is tiny and poor in quality, shame on Raymond Blanc. No journals in train, toilets dirty

items.title: retards fréquents et service client quasi inexistant
items.review_text: Je suis une cliente hebdomadaire de la ligne Bruxelles Paris. Quasiment chaque semaine je suis confrontée à un retard de train au départ de Bruxelles. Je me suis trompée de date pour un changement de billet récemment qui m'a coûté 65 euros de plus que le billet de départ. Eurostar a refusé de corriger mon erreur et m'a invitée à repayer 15 euros de plus pour partir à la bonne date. Enfin j'ai failli me faire expulser d'un Eurostar unjour de semaine à 7heures du matin car je suis entrée dans une voiture de 1ere classe pour dire bonjour à une connaissance sans avoir de billet de 1ere classe... J'ai beaucoup voyagé en train dans ma vie et je n'ai jamais vu ça!

items.title: Eurostar Gare du Nord
items.review_text:
Paris better than London? I take it you haven't been to Gare du Nord recently

Evening Standard
DYLAN JONES

Article about Eurostar terminal at Gare du Nord - accurate from my experience

items.title: Problemen met iDeal
items.review_text: Ik had geboekt met iDeal. Blijkbaar heeft Eurostar daar problemen mee momenteel. Dit communiceren ze uiteraard niet op hun website. Nu moet ik een nieuw ticket boeken en is deze meteen 22 euro duurder. Oplichters. En dan verbaast zijn dat mensen het vliegtuig nemen. Tip: boek dus met creditcard en niet met iDeal.

items.title: Unclean cabins and toilets
items.review_text: Unclean cabins and toilets, the French trains are good.

items.title: choqués de l attitude du…
items.review_text: Extrêmement choqués de l attitude du personnel anglais au passage frontière à Bruxelles... Nous avons été invectivés par une employée (?) au comptoir à l endroit du scannage des passeports... Les autres guère plus aimables. Idem au retour à Saint Pancras.

items.title: Too busy rebranding to care about customers
items.review_text:
Our family holiday to Disneyland Paris was cut short by strikes on the French railways. As our tickets between London and Marne La Vallee were booked entirely through Eurostar, I enquired about how we were going to get home. The options were to leave a day earlier before the strikes started or stay an extra three days - not possible due to work and school.
We were able to change our tickets free of charge, and the hotel was great at refunding our missed night. Back in the UK though we were told that we had to pay extra to change our LNER tickets. They told us to contact Eurostar to seek compensation.
Eurostar were not in the slightest bit interested. The email I received from their "customer service" team stated our train hadn't been cancelled and that we'd chosen ourselves to cut our holiday short! What a bizarre thing to say. Anyway, I guess by this point they'd already got our money.
We're planning another trip to Disneyland later this year. We'll be flying.

items.title: Loyal customers can’t upgrade seats using points
items.review_text: I’m a loyal, long-term customer and have just been told that I can’t use my Eurostar Club Card points with Eurostar to upgrade a seat to a higher level, because it is a connecting journey from London to Brussels and then using a non-Eurostar train to travel on. The onward journey in Belgium (which I booked through Eurostar) has NOTHING to do with my actual Eurostar journey between London and Brussels. What a silly and ridiculous business policy. What is the point of a customer reward scheme, which doesn’t reward your customers - for no apparent reason? Avoid the Club Membership. Even better: avoid Eurostar where you can.

items.title: Merci Beaucoup, Steve!
items.review_text:
Merci Beaucoup, Steve! 
Gisterenavond met de Eurostar van Disneyland Parijs naar Brussel-Zuid gereden. Alles verliep vlot, de zetels zaten heerlijk, propere, ruime, nieuwe wagon die goed rook, handige uitklapbare tafeltjes, … . 
En een hele lieve manager, Steve genaamd, heeft me deze voormiddag persoonlijk gebeld, om te laten weten dat mijn iPhone nog op de trein lag en waar hij die het best kon achterlaten om op te halen. 
Super bedankt, Steve!

items.title: Eurostar est un service de m… en…
items.review_text: Eurostar est un service de m… en comparaison avec ce qu’était Thalys. Retard de 50 minutes à l’arrivée non compensé dans la politique commerciale, le temps du trajet du train au départ a 6h33 pour Paris n’est pas 1h25 mais près de 2 heures, pour le prix habituel. Des ########

items.title: Trein vanaf londen was gecanceld
items.review_text:
Trein vanaf londen was gecanceld. 
Dit omdat de tunnel onder water stond. Dit speelde zich af op 30 december.
Netjes nieuwe tickets gekregen. En vandaag alle extra kosten die gemaakt moesten worden zoals hotel ,
vervoer,eten en drinken overgemaakt. Precies zoals afgesproken. Top service

items.title: What a horrible experience
items.review_text:
What a horrible experience  - our first and last.
London St. Pancras station total chaos, not much help from Eurostar staff, very poor customer service. 0 points from us.

items.title: Incompetents
items.review_text:
3h de retard car cette compagnie est visiblement incapable de faire fonctionner son reseau, et des voyageurs d’autres trains annulés entassés dans notre train. 
Le cost cutting porte ses fruits avec des infrastructures qui tombent en ruine
Bravo à tous pour les travaux (la journée etait pourtant sans intempéries et sans grève vous êtes des champions)

items.title: Leuk voor een keertje maar valt tegen
items.review_text:
Heenweg.. op Brussel moest de hele trein opnieuw door de security omdat iemand een hek open had laten staan. 
Kan toch wel een kopje koffie vanaf ofzo? Nee, claim maar geld vanwege vertraging. Gedaan en snel uitbetaald gekregen. 
Terugweg ging wel volgens schema. 

Terminal op Amsterdam is krap, London is netjes en ruim met faciliteiten. Snap niet goed waarom je op beiden zo vroeg aanwezig moet zijn. 

Comfort aan boord is matig, in ieder geval in de tweede klasse. Krappe zitplaatsen, vrijwel dezelfde beenruimte als een KLM vlucht. Stoelen bijzonder hard.

Al met al een keer geprobeerd als minder gedoe alternatief voor vliegen. denk dat ik de volgende keer toch weer ga vliegen

items.title: Racist attack on Eurostar
items.review_text:
Racist attack on Eurostar!
On Jan 7, I took Eurostar from Amsterdam to Brussels. As soon as I boarded the train, I was met with a lot of rude, unprofessional and hostile behaviour from a woman wearing the Eurostar uniform. She even told me to shut up. I was never humiliated like this ever in my life. I asked for a manager, but none came to rescue. I for one will think twice before I board another Eurostar train again. Eurostar has a lot of work to do to make customers welcome on their trains. They need to have proper customer training and escalation processes in place. Mainly, they need to ensure that racists are not employed and such behaviours are dealt with immediately.

items.title: LONDRES PARIS ANNULE le 30 DECEMBRE…
items.review_text:
LONDRES PARIS ANNULE le 30 DECEMBRE 2023
- Arrivée à la gare St Pancras pour apprendre que notre train est annulé  en raison d'innondations des voies.
- Incapacité du personnel à nous aider
- Obligés de se débrouiller tout seuls avec trois enfants!! UNE BELLE GALERE
- chercher un hôtel, un vol pour repartir , un restaurant... (eurostar complet, ferries complet, vol très cher)
- Après de nombreux échanges avec Eurostar, demande de documents envoyés et transmis A ce jour, toujours aucun remboursement et à chaque fois un interlocuteur différent qui n'a pas les documents ou un autre employé qui est désolé mais qui ne peut rien faire!
LAMENTABLE ! C'EST UNE HONTE

items.title: Should have checked the reviews first
items.review_text:
First time trying to take the train from Amsterdam to London. Got to the train station, the Eurostar building was closed, after a few minutes of waiting, a security personnel came by and told me that my train was canceled. Didn't receive any notification about the cancelation before and getting to the central station and back cost me time and money. 
Wanted to re-book for another day, but I would have had to pay a pretty hefty difference(more than my round-trip combined) if I wanted to go the next two days. Ended up opting or a refund, which is only possible in a form of a voucher, so I'll have to use this dismal service once more in the future(going to be the first and last time I'll rely on this company, unless they cancel again that time...).

items.title: DO NOT BOOK WITH EUROSTAR
items.review_text: DO NOT BOOK WITH EUROSTAR. THEY WILL NOT LET YOU CANCEL YOUR BOOKING OR GET A REFUND EVEN IF THERE IS AN EMERGENCY. THEY WILL DELAY YOU AND YOU WILL GET TO YOUR DESTINATION LATE. NO WATER IN THE TOILETS TO WASH YOUR HANDS AND THEY JUST WANT TO TAKE MONEY OFF YOU

items.title: With over 3 weeks advanced notice
items.review_text:
With over 3 weeks advanced notice, Eurostar were unable to amend my departure destination on a return journey from Paris to Brussels. 
A limited booking system and something to consider when using their service

items.title: Just take a plane
items.review_text: Worst company ever. 0 help, 0 customer service. You have no clue where to find your train and it only goes on a sign 30 min before you can get on yet you magically need to be checked in 1.5 hrs earlier.

items.title: definitely worse than flying. won't do it again
items.review_text: what a disaster! they like to brag that it's better than flying but it's far from the truth. horrible line ups (2 of them) before boarding. not enough space to sit down while waiting (saw old people walking around because they couldnt sit). you basically go throught security check like in an airport. wont do again

items.title: Würde gerne mit meinem Reisrad nach…
items.review_text:
Würde gerne mit meinem Reisrad nach Paris fahren, die Vorstellungen von Eurostar sind völlig abwegig. Man kann ein Gepäckrad nicht einfach zerlegen und verpacken; wo soll man denn eine Verpackung organisieren und wo soll man sie anschließend lassen - kaufen und dann ab in den Müll?
Im TGV war es eine reine Freude! Das Rad ins Gepäckabteil schieben und aktive Hilfe - ganz prima!
Eurostar und Rad einfach im Vorfeld nur abschreckend - so wird das nichts mit der Klimawende, einfach unprofessionell!

items.title: Even the mute communicate better
items.review_text:
No stars if the option is available. The level of competence is staggering. Cancellation was communicated 90 mins before departure while we were well on our way. Common sense did not prevail and management team clearly has s -hit for brains. Turns out your employees have been on strike since 21 December and it is evident you do not have a crisis management plan or business continuity plan in place. It’s like taking a dump only to flush it 10 days later. 

Resign and check yourselves into gutters where you belong.

items.title: 1/ Ils sont tres chers (peu de petits…
items.review_text:
1/ Ils sont tres chers (peu de petits prix)
2/ Leur site web ne marche pas bien, rien n est corrigé, pertes de temps
3/ Compliqués a joindre dans galerer...
En conclusion : ils sont seuls, ils en profitent car pas de concurrence reelle, probablement contraire... au droit européen...

items.title: Train cancelled
items.review_text:
Train cancelled, what are my options?

Option 1: 'Change your date and/or time for free!' Here 'for free' means 'no ticket exchange fees, ONLY PAY THE TICKET PRICE DIFFERENCE', or 170 euros extra for a train 2 hours later. Very free indeed.

Option 2: 'Get a refund!' Here a refund applies only for the outbound trip, and not for return, because hey, maybe you can teleport instead and still want to come back.

Never again will I consider even opening Eurostar website, flying or even Flixbus has not ever caused such massive disappointment.

items.title: GARETH made my experience great
items.review_text: GARETH made my experience great. If I could give 10 stars I would. He was fantastic, resolved all my issues and called me back when he said he would. Thanks to him I am now able to go to the Paris Olympics on Eurostar! Amazing customer experience.

items.title: La lamentable gestion Eurostar
items.review_text: La lamentable gestion Eurostar. Avec son non-droit à compensation après 1 heure de retard Paris-Brxl (site qui "décrète" que non vous ne pouvez pas obtenir compensation), ses trains annulés, entassements comme du bétail pour 109 euros (2 trains en un)... Et puis retrouver ses numéros de billets, tout un poème. Bref compliquer la vie des gens plutôt que la faciliter, ça fait très cher payé le service.

items.title: Mauvaise expérience 10 mars 2024 je ne voyagerai plus avec cette compagnie
items.review_text: REF FKWYY4 : Fermeture des portes du portique 30 minutes avant le départ du train du 10 mars Londres Paris, il était 16h32 pour le train de 17h04!!!! donc 28 minutes et non 30mn!!!le personnel a été très désagréable, pas de bienveillance, grosse déception, et surtout nous a demandé un supplément de 50 euros par billets pour prendre celui de 18h04!!d'autres clients derrière nous dans le même cas ont eu le droit eux à un changement de billets GRATUIT exceptionnellement!!!pourquoi pas nous???une honte d'être aussi mal traité, j'exige le remboursement des 50 euros pour moi et mes 2 amis, soit 150 euros!j'ajoute que la salle d'attente est vraiment sale et pas assez de siège.

items.title: No consumer protection. Fly instead.
items.review_text:
Trains cancelled last minute due to the flooding. Okay, fine. 

Refund offered for the outgoing leg. Cool.

But no refund available for the return leg a day later, even though that return is earlier than the earliest train we could get to even arrive following the cancellations.

That makes no sense at all and is beyond ludicrous. I should be able to cancel and reschedule both legs.

Flying in future as the consumer protection is far more robust and going to ombudsman to demand my outstanding refund.

items.title: Waardeloze ervaring Eurostar, compensatie lastig claimen
items.review_text: Voor een zakelijke meeting in Brussel (11.00) de Eurostar geboekt. 07.30 vertrokken, trein zou om 9.00 in Brussel zijn. Op 10 kilometer van Brussel 4,5 uur stilgestaan vanwege defecte trein. Meeting niet gehaald en weer terug gegaan. Cash compensatie niet online te regelen! Alleen een voucher...wil helemaal geen voucher.  Wat een ongelooflijke slechte service en dito site!!!

items.title: was terrible from start to finish and…
items.review_text:
was terrible from start to finish and even posting this is near impossible because of the shocking internet! Don't think about working it's not going to happen! Business premium is a disgrace, the food and drinks are scarce and the seats not comfortable. The staff are lovely and that's the only positive about this experience and expensive ticket from London  to AMS return, it's too
Long and too uncomfortable! No business class lounge or preferential treatment in AMS it was a disgrace! Never again

items.title: 40min de retard sans explication.
items.review_text:
Çe truc mérite même pas 1etoile.

Le chauffeur arrive 40min en retard sans aucune explications ni excuses et nous fait rater notre correspondance.
Pire on entend l'hôtesse annoncer 20min(au lieu de 40) de retard EN RIGOLANT. Vous vous croyez ou ? 3mois de formation pour savoir piloter un train, son seul devoir c'est d'être la a l'heure, même pas besoin de faire travailler ses méninges.
Le mec a sûrement pris le temps de se boire un café et de bouffer tranquil sans scrupule d'exploser les plans des 150personnes qui attendent comme des débiles dans le train.
Évidemment impossible de voir le chauffeur et son 70 de Q.I vu qu'il se planque maintenant dans sa cabine cet abruti.

Trop de la daube. Évitez si possible.

items.title: unreliable!
items.review_text: Ik rijd wekelijks met Eurostar van Rotterdam naar Antwerpen. Sinds de fusie van Thalys en Eurostar geen enkele keer op tijd gereden waardoor ik steeds mijn aansluiting in Antwerpen mis. Waardeloos!!! Ik ga voortaan met de auto. Zonde voor het milieu maar het is niet te vertrouwen…

items.title: lang weekend Parijs via Eurostar…
items.review_text: lang weekend Parijs via Eurostar geboekt vanuit Amsterdam. Heen twee uur stil gestaan ergens in België zonder adequate informatie (na een herstart van de trein konden we uiteindelijk verder reizen); terug vanuit Parijs gestrand in Mechelen, niemand van de spoorwegen te bekennen, wederom geen informatie, er zouden bussen staan om ons verder te vervoeren, niets gezien...; uiteindelijk via een omweg met een boemeltje via Puurs naar Roosendaal na ruim acht uur thuis aangekomen. Een grote schande, voor veel geld nul service, wat een amateurisme.... We 'zouden' meer met de trein moeten reizen, maar op deze manier pakt iedereen weer een vliegtuig of gaat met de auto....

items.title: Stations are overcrowded
items.review_text: Stations are overcrowded. They lack facilities and you have to queue for most things including the toilets which are horrible. The trains are basic and the wifi is rubbish. The toilets on board are also pretty grim! All this for £250 London to Paris return. If the world wasn’t on fire, I’d fly!

items.title: Even one star is too much
items.review_text:
Even one star is too much
They cancelled our train few minutes before departure time and gave no information at all (no email, nothing) even if we are frequent travelers with loyalty card. We got the information on the platform.

items.title: Dramatisch slechte communicatie Eurostar en de rest.
items.review_text:
Ik had een duur retour Amsterdam CS - London St Pancras gekocht, vertrek maandag 12 februari jl, (treinnr 9346, vertrek 12:11u, werd kort daarvoor nog bevestigd door Eurostar. 
Vertrek Amsterdam Centraal, jaja! Ik sta daar op spoor 15 met vele andere verdwaasde reizigers. Alles is dicht, geen mededelingen of bordje. Pas na navraag bij NS informatie wordt mij verteld dat ik vanaf Rotterdam moet vertrekken. Ik haal nog net de trein naar Rotterdam, alwaar de Eurostar flink vertraagd is. Op Brussel Zuid na enorm rennen en veel stress, haal ik net de aansluiting, die meteen vertrekt. Vele anderen missen hem dus. 
Je betaalt een kapitaal en dit is wat je krijgt. 

Vanwege ziekte moet ik eerder terug op 14 februari. Er is voldoende ruimte in de eerstvolgende trein, ik ben in bezit van een duur retour ticket voor de volgende dag, maar mag nu alleen mee tegen betaling van een extra €191.
De hele reis heeft me €588 gekost......

Schandalig. Ik ga maar eens contact opnemen met het programma Kassa.

items.title: Hâte de voir la fin de ce monopole du train sous la manche !!!!
items.review_text:
Je prends l’EuroStar Londres-Paris régulièrement (toutes les 2-3 semaines) et depuis août 2023 ça ne s’est pas passé normalement une seule fois.
Ce matin pareil, mon ticket sur l’application m’affiche 7h12 et une fois en gare sans prévenir le train est à 6h58. Ticket échangé gratuitement et encore heureux. A noël train annulé 2h avant le départ et le train du lendemain (que j’ai du payer 390€) a eu 1h40 de retard car pas de plateforme disponible en Gare du Nord.
Ça ne se passe tout simplement jamais bien, jamais… 

Un staff extrêmement gentil mais une organisation et un système informatique déplorables. Ils savent qu’ils ont le monopole alors se permettent des folies.
Le jour où la société EuroStar coulera je m’allumerai une bougie et danserai comme un fou tout seul

items.title: Eurostar you’ve been sublime  …
items.review_text: We have just had the most superb  experience with Eurostar. Every person has been truly wonderful.  Especially Amour, Pape, Stephane and Jose at St Pancreas Customer Service. Continued care and attention of the utmost standard by the staff in coach 16. Thank you Eurostar for starting our trip to Paris in the most magical way.

items.title: très décevant
items.review_text:
très décevant 

hier il s’arrête en pleine gare a Rotterdam il nous dit qu’il ne va finalement pas à Bruxelles (suite à un problème de réseau) tous les passagers ont dû descendre et sont livrés à eux-mêmes le personnel d’Eurostar, quasiment incapable de nous dire ce qu’on doit faire Nous avons mis plus de huit heures pour faire Amsterdam Bruxelles, avec plein de correspondance et finalement quand on arrive sur Bruxelles, on nous dit qu’il y a plus de train qui va sur Lille à cause des problèmes d’Eurostar 

le pire de pire nous étions en classe premium mais seulement pendant 1 

merci beaucoup j’ai passé ma journée dans les trains  je devais arriver chez moi pour 19 h je suis arrivé a 22 h

items.title: Service déplorable Paris - Bruxelles et inversement
items.review_text: Depuis le changement Thalys en Eurostar, le service est pourri. Prix en nette hausse et retard de 58 min donc pas d'indemnité, frais bancaires à la réservation car zone non UE, accès au lounge restreint selon qui est à l'accueil....bref déconseillé ! Mieux vaut un Paris - Lille puis Lille - Bruxelles , moins cher et plus rapide finalement.

items.title: Would give 0 stars if I could
items.review_text:
Would give 0 stars if I could. The trip actually went reasonably well, but I had to take a different train due to a cancellation. And now customer service is refusing a refund for the additional ticket I had to pay, leaving me out of pocket. 

0 starts, because they give 0 concern for customer complaints.

items.title: Détérioration catastrophique du service à bord depuis la disparition de Thalys
items.review_text: Qu'il était agréable le trajet entre Paris et Bruxelles avec Thalys, dont il ne reste plus aujourd'hui que les belles rames conçues pour de vrais voyages en train... Tout a été "repensé" : les places en première sont bradées à 1 EUR de supplément, donc c'est le seul wagon où vous êtes sûr de voyager toujours dans un train bondé, rempli à la dernière minute avec des touristes en transit entre deux aéroports - leurs bagages énormes saturent l'espace réduit d'un véhicule ferroviaire où le personnel de bord peine à garder le sourire devant la thrombose permanente et la multiplication des mauvais comportements. Finis les petits échanges avec le personnel très classe et polyglotte de Thalys, le fond sonore est plutôt celui du comptoir des réclamations chez Ikea... J'attends maintenant avec impatience l'arrivée de Trenitalia comme solution de rechange. En attendant, chers concepteurs de cette "optimisation" qui va ruiner rapidement la santé de vos voyageurs, de vos employés et de votre compagnie, retournez vous occuper de l'élevage de poules en batterie. S'il vous plaît.

items.title: I traveled 2 times in 2 months
items.review_text: I traveled 2 times in 2 months, both times I had horrible experiences. First time: overbooked train to go to Paris, to come back delayed train, dirty, smelling bad. Second time was OK to go to Paris, but train to come back was canceled and I wasn't even notified. I was alowed to take another train, but I had no seat (standing the whole trip at the bar where not even a glass of water was offered). No apologies from anyone (at the office in the North Station in Paris or on the train). No quality and no assurance that you can get were you have to for a pretty expensive price (more expensive than flying). My colleague that had to travel even further to Rotterdam arrived home the next day. Please avoid at any cost if possible!

items.title: The initial efficiency was just an illusion
items.review_text: my family and I were part of the big group of people whose train was cancelled on 30 December 2023.  We arranged with the Eurostar customer service for the expenses for our alternative travel arrangements to be paid back to us (800£, to be able to get home, which is a significant extra cost!).  We agreed more than 2 weeks ago, still seen no money.  The person from the customer service i was dealing with is no longer contactable and i raised 2 more enquiries on the same case.  Still no answer!!! At the beginning I was impressed by the efficiency, I guess it was just an illusion

items.title: Awful Experience
items.review_text: Would leave minus stars if possible. Strike action on the 21st December affected travel from Paris to London the following day. No communication. Rude staff telling you to go away and come back in 30minutes. This happened 4/5 times. We were then queued in awful conditions for over 2 hours. No help offered and again no communication. Advised we could claim possible compensation  as delayed for other 60minutes but this is not happening. Will never use Eurostar again. Have flown to Paris and would 100% recommend over the train. Trains queued in Paris, but the staff there could not cope in any way with the additional trains so people were crammed together like cattle. No refreshments or toilets which are basic needs

items.title: Terrible service & train late
items.review_text:
Train was late on the 01 of February causing an hour long queue.When i got to the platform,i was told by a French employee that my seat was changed to several coaches away.That was very stressful as i am a 72 years old pensioner with medical problems and carrying heavy luggages.
What's the point of choosing a seat and then they change it?Staff at Gare du Nord are rude and arrogant and not helpful at all.
Since Eurostar merge it is not the same service anymore, it's got worse.
Never again.

items.title: The French really left an impression
items.review_text: The French really left an impression. To take the train in the London terminal Isa terrible experience. Queues, staff pointing in different direction, the new security subcontractor is rude… and the waiting room is always as over crowded. Prepare yourself if you go with a pram…

items.title: Poorly organized Amsterdam departure
items.review_text:
This relates specifically to Amsterdam station:
- the queue to the “people storage” shed is long and goes way beyond a short canopy, which is not very handy when it rains (probably, this is preparation for Netherlands to get desert climate?)
- staff is not really friendly and it starts from security. With its very high tables for all luggage to go through, they refuse to help with heavy suitcases or provide any tools to lift- we were just told to ask fellow passengers, because staff would not bother!
- it is very cramped inside the shed, with tiny toilets and an amazing coffee machine: there are no cups, even paper ones- you are supposed to find your own cup!

We had to use Eurostars instead of the usual airplane because of prohibition to fly after an eye surgery- but next time we will use planes again, as it is equally inconvenient but at least much cheaper!

items.title: CTO überfordert?
items.review_text:
Beim Umbuchen eines gültigen Thallys Ticket hatte Eurostar technische Probleme. Altes Ticket wurde storniert, jedoch kein neues Ticket erstellt. Dennoch Gebühren von Kreditkarte abgebucht. Musste dann nochmals 340 € im Zug bezahlen, da ursprüngliches Ticket als annuliert galt.

Warte seit mehreren Monaten auf bestätigten Refund. Angeblich hat Eurostar nun essentielle Probleme mit eigenem Zahlungssystem. Absolutes Chaos. 

Warum ist der offensichtlich überforderte CTO immer noch im Amt?

items.title: DON’T BOTHER!!
items.review_text:
Decided to use Eurostar as a different experience to flying, wish I had not bothered. Before booking you see the flashy pictures of the Eurostar lounges, don’t be taken in, it was like a cattle market, then the stampede for the train begins! No where to sit overcrowded waiting areas.

Train delayed no communication no refund available, missed my connection in Paris tough luck apparently.

Return all I can say it was on time. Escalator broken in Paris, so everyone with a case 99.9% I reckon all queue at one gate. Ready steady go and stampede number 2 gets going, passengers running frantically no staff assisting.

All in all for over £500 return, I feel very let my Christmas treat was a nightmare

items.title: Regularly travel Amsterdam-Brussels and…
items.review_text: Regularly travel Amsterdam-Brussels and back and since Eurostar took over Thalys there are frequent delays between 20-60min. The bar has nothing to offer , no food whatsoever. Altogether not worth the high ticket price.

items.title: reservations
items.review_text:
tried to ask them what % seats are available to reserve if you have an interrail pass for 9th Jan next year

their chat bot  can't answer and does'nt suggest you email - probably because they wouldn't manage a reply

items.title: Disaster
items.review_text: Eurotunnel strike meant our train could not leave. We were given zero information apart from an automated message and then being told to leave the station (with no support whatsoever about how to get home). Their statements to the press says they worked with ferry partners to get people home but that is a complete lie as we were not offered anything. We were told, eventually, to just update our tickets online. We were told we could claim expenses such as a hotel etc but when I tried to claim I was told I couldn’t and needed travel insurance. This has cost us hundreds of pounds that we cannot afford and we will never travel by Eurostar again.

items.title: Waarom is klantenservice altijd het…
items.review_text:
Waarom is klantenservice altijd het tegenovergestelde van wat het moet zijn deze dagen? 😆 Eurostar trein van Rotterdam naar Brussel staat 3u stil in Rotterdam wegens een ongeval in antwerpen (een man op het spoor gesprongen, volgens de conducteur) en rijd vervolgens terug naar Amsterdam 😅 Alle mensen moesten terug uitstappen en er zou voor de rest van de avond geen andere eurostar trein meer rijden. Vervolgens een extra ticket moeten kopen om de gewone trein naar België te nemen.

Eurostar stuurt mij daarna zelf een mail, dat ik een compensatie kan claimen. Claimen werkt niet en mail verwijderd zichzelf na een aantal dagen. Ik laat weten dat ik mijn compensatie dus nog steeds niet kan claimen, waarop zij zeggen dat ik de site moet contacteren via waar ik het ticket gekocht heb 😅 laat maar ik hoef die 50 euro niet meer.

items.title: Pire première classe
items.review_text: En première classe, les hôtesses sont désagréables, parlent uniquement anglais et refusent de parler français. Eurostar 9369 - voiture 11 - train de 17h25. Ce lundi 19 février.  A ce prix, au départ de la France et à l’arrivée de Bruxelles, ils pourraient choisir des personnes qui parlent français et qui soit un peu plus agréables !

items.title: Eerste keer met de Eurostar
items.review_text: Eerste keer met de Eurostar, wat een fantastische ervaring. Dit komt voornamelijk door onze geweldige conducteur Kevin. Volgens mij heet hij Heijsteeg. Zonder hem zou deze trip totaal niet hetzelfde zijn. Wat een onwijs leuke jongen.

items.title: Think London-Brussels would be any…
items.review_text: Think London-Brussels would be any better than brussels-london with Eurostar? Think again, it's even worse. Bus travel has better service and shorter waiting times.

items.title: Non exsistant - customer service
items.review_text:
Email I sent to Eurostar about our recent trip to Amsterdam. 
Thank you for asking us to complete a survey about our recent Eurostar trip from Amsterdam to London.  It seems weird we were not sent one for our outbound journey from London to Amsterdam??
So I would like to take this opportunity to give you our feedback. 
We choose to go direct on Eurostar even though it was more expensive than flying because we thought it would be a pleasant and relaxing way to tr
avel and so it was until we arrived in Brussels . Here we sat on the train for a considerable amount of time before an announcement was made telling us a member of staff was missing,  then some time later we were asked to get off the train and wait on the adjoining platform for the next Eurostar to Amsterdam.  
Before the Eurostar arrived another announcement was made asking the hundreds of passengers to go to platform 16 and take the next train from there . It took ages for every one to get up the stairs and we hadn't even reached the next platform before a sea of passengers were coming back towards us telling us they were not allowed on because the train was full . So everyone went back to the Eurostar platform,  when the train arrived members of staff were barring the doors saying there wasn't any room .
This whole time there was not one member of Eurostar around to give anyone any advice or customer support . This is obviously a major stop on the London - Amsterdam route if this is where the staff change over happens so why isn't  there any customer service personnel stationed there ?
Even an email with advice of how to get to Amsterdam would have been helpful but instead you just abandoned a whole train load of passengers on a platform  - such abysmal customer service.  We finally managed to make our own way to Amsterdam arriving 3.5 hours late ! 
Secondly - the sorry your train was delayed email . It wasn't delayed it was cancelled mid journey. 
The options we were given for compensation were 
Delayed or Cancelled before journey started - neither of which was the case . Why is what I assume is a generic email sent out , Eurostar is a huge company surely an email could have been sent out that was appropriate to the situation,  again really poor Customer service. 
We have been helped by a very nice young man called Martial who has said he can compensate us with an 80% of the outbound ticket price but personally I think the very minimum we should be offered considering the stress and inconvenience we were put through is a full refund. 
It's a shame we were so looking forward to travelling on Eurostar and if we had been given information and support at Brussels although it would have not been the journey we were anticipating at least it wouldn't have been so stressful and we would have considered using Eurostar again but definitely wouldn't now

items.title: Compagnie à fuir !!!!
items.review_text:
Compagnie à fuir !!!!
Le samedi 30 décembre 2023, nous devions prendre un train gare de Lille Europe direction Londres gare St Pancras. Week-end prévu pour le soir du nouvel an.
1 heure avant le départ, nous recevons un message d'annulation de notre train, ainsi que tout ceux de la journée.
Nous nous sommes tout de même rendu à la gare pour essayer de trouver une solution. Les agents d'Eurostar nous ont dit qu'ils y avaient aucune solution possible, mais que le remboursement du train ainsi que de l'hôtel étaient obligatoires.
J'ai donc entamé les procédures de remboursement.
J'ai reçu un mail de réponse seulement deux semaines après qui m'indiquaient que le remboursement était impossible ni pour le train, ni pour l'hôtel. Ils ne remboursent que les voyageurs bloqués à Londres seulement.
J'ai donc perdu tout mon voyage sans aucune solution proposée de leur part.
C'est inadmissible !!!

items.title: Price change whilst booking
items.review_text: Found out first hand about Eurostars sharp practices. Having booked a train/hotel package a final price was displayed. When I clicked proceed with purchase  a message flashed up that the price had gone up during booking by £55. When I checked back to input the identical train and hotel choices it still displayed the lower and cheaper price. Conclusion: That Eutostar scam customers for a last minute surcharge. Will be interested to know what trading standards think of these dishonest practices.

items.title: Voyage de Paris à Amsterdam
items.review_text: Voyage numéro DXVGR3 Paris-Amsterdam. Eurostar bande de sale d0g. Et je pèse mes mots. J'étais censé avoir la voiture numéro 6 et je me suis retrouvé à la voiture 15 et sans oublier que la place côté fenêtre à été prise par une famille. Je suis dégoutée que EuroStar ne sait pas arrangé les voyages comme au bon vieux temps. Je reviens encore pour mars parce que il y a la PM et ensuite c'est Tchao. Ça me fera des économies comme ça.

items.title: Accueil chaleureux
items.review_text: Nous avons voyagé avec 104 élèves et le train était à l'heure et à l'aller et au retour. Nous avons été accueilli avec le sourire par tous les agents, surtout au retour. Une mention spéciale à Akim qui a pris le temps de parler avec nos élèves et qui était aux petits soins pour nous! Seul bémol pour le retour, comme nous étions un grand groupe, ils nous ont mis dans une salle sans restaurant,ni magasin. Dommage, ils auraient dû nous prévenir afin de faire nos achats dans la galerie commerciale.

items.title: Best customer service I have EVER…
items.review_text: Best customer service I have EVER received! I had a ticket booked in 2021 for myself and my mum (who doesn't live in the UK) and the trip got cancelled due to covid. I kept rescheduling and pushing it back hoping she would be able to fly over one day for us to take the trip together, but that has not happened. I need to use my ticket for a separate trip and called to ask if I could get her ticket refunded or moved to my husband's name. They managed to change the name on the ticket to my husband's name and waived all the change fees! These unused tickets have been haunting me for 3 years and I'm so glad we are finally able to use it. The agent on the phone was also really professional and friendly, such a refreshing experience!

items.title: No Urinals in the Gents Toilets
items.review_text:
No Urinals in the Gents Toilets,  The first in the UK!!

inside departure section packed and no seating

either cos of train delay or half term,  which ever !

Train journey is always nice experience and it was fine hence 3 stars

items.title: Know impact
items.review_text: I was expecting to see my girlfriend this week-end in our long-distance relationship between Brussels and Amsterdam. Because of a “know impact” on the track and after 3 cancelled trains in a row on a Friday at 10 pm, it was no more possible to reach Amsterdam. Thanks Eurostar!

items.title: Compensation process for cancelled journey
items.review_text: Our trip home from the Netherlands was cancelled. There were no representative from Eurostar at the station explaining what can be done to arrange alternatives. The customer services were unavailable for 3 days. The website didn’t recognise my booking so we couldn’t re-book for the next available journey. There were no additional trains put on and as such there was no availability for us to pay again for our journey home. When we tried to claim £800 in compensations for our hotel costs, food costs and alternative transport. Eurostar were only prepared to consider hotel costs and selected few food costs. The process of compensation was dragged out, I feel deliberately as the Eurostar website was having digital issues and they also lost my emails. I’ve still not received compensation over a month later despite me stressing to them I have a young family and times are hard.

items.title: Eurostar Amsterdam - Paris
items.review_text:
Voyageant régulièrement sur la ligne Amsterdam - Paris, le train est systématiquement en retard au point que j'ai plusieurs fois manqué des correspondances à partir des autres gares de la métropole. 
La dernière expérience avec Eurostar s'est traduit par 2h 30 de retard au départ et avec comme cerise sur le gâteau tout les voyageurs largués en gare d'Anvers à 1h du matin avec seulement un Voucher de 175E par réservation ne couvrant pas les frais pour arriver à destination (Amsterdam).  À l'heure où nous sommes incités à prendre ce type de transport pour réduire notre empreinte carbone, des compagnies de moquent de leur clients et n'assument par leur engagement. Déplorable.

items.title: Je devais prendre le train de 8h13 de…
items.review_text: Je devais prendre le train de 8h13 de bxl à Paris. Celui ci a ete annule et envoi mail 32 min avant. Reponse a vous pouvez prendre le prochain avec aucune garantie de place. Des billets qui coutent pour un service nul. Soutient 0. Desormais pour tout mes voyages professionnels et prives cela sera voiture et/ou avion. Service desastreux. Aide 0 remboursement 0 . Acces a leur site pour trouver une solution défectueux.  Comment perdre du temps de l argent.

items.title: retard et qualité de service deplorable
items.review_text:
Comme d’habitude, retard d’une heure à l’allé et au retour sans compensation 
Compagnie d’incapables on vous déteste tous. 
Les trains sont sales et abimés. 
Entreprise de voleurs, je prendrai l’avion à l’avenir puisqu’on ne sait pas faire fonctionner des trains en 2024

items.title: Great experience
items.review_text: I travel very often for work to and from Paris on the Eurostar and I always have a pretty good experience with staff at St Pancras. Today the train changed and so mine and my partners seats were changed and we were seated apart. However Akim in the waiting lounge was extremely kind and helpful in changing our seats to be together and very friendly and funny as well. I wish there were more people like Akim working for Eurostar!

items.title: Probably the worst train carrier
items.review_text:
Train from Amsterdam to London got stuck for 7 hours in the middle of nowhere. 
We had to buy 2 new tickets from Brussels to London for the morning after for 450 EUR.
This happened 2 months ago, and I still don’t have my money back.

items.title: This company is a joke!
items.review_text:
This company is a joke!
I bought a ticket with cancellation insurance and it turns up that I can't cancel my trip.
Then I tried to change the dates of my trip, but there is no way of doing that online due to a useless website.
Never again!

items.title: Be very careful...
items.review_text:
Be very careful not to make booking mistakes. You will pay for it.

The attitude can best be described as commercial 'extremism'. A total disdain and disregard for customers. Money grabbing to an unprecedented degree. I was shocked that their approach is lawful. It shouldn't be.

items.title: Thalys becomes Eurostar "tout change" negatively
items.review_text: While Eurostar staff is definitely kind and available both on board the train and over the phone at the "service clientèle", the fusion between Thalys and Eurostar is very negative.They announced "nothing changes" for the clients but that's not true: you loose your status points (so you don't have access for example to the lounge: I have had access to the lounge for the last 6 years and booked my tickets according!) and trains are frequently late. Today one out of two of my trains was late.

items.title: Can i give a 0 star review?
items.review_text:
Can i give a 0 star review?
This is the worst experience that i have EVER had regarding a customer facing service!

I am expecting a refund and have been waiting 4 months, calling once every 2 weeks... because Customer Service keeps telling me that they will get back to me every week... and hey have NOT GOTTEN BACK TO ME ONCE!!!! 

Your company is really taking advantage of having other people's money. And are losing trust!

I would like my money back please - this is the equivalent of theft!!!

And your customer service team is the worst, as NOT ONE OF THEM have helped me after 4 months? how is that possible?

items.title: EUROSTAR ...CATASTROPHE
items.review_text: EUROSTAR .... Nous avons reçu un message d'annulation pour intempérie (5mm de neige) de notre  train en partance de Paris direction Cologne quelques heures avant le départ. Conclusion l'hôtel HILTON que nous avions loué n'était plus dans les conditions d'annulation Conclusion le séjour ne nous est pas remboursé. Eurostar nous prenne vraiment pour du bétail. L'annulation du train aurait du être prévu bien avant à croire qu'il ne surveille pas la météo. En tout cas pour nous plus jamais Eurostar et très mauvaise publicité sera faite. A mettre dans le même sac que tous les transports en commun en France. C'est un week end qui nous coute très cher il faut que tout le monde dénonce ces injustices. Reprenons tous nos moyens de transports personnels.... Réfléchissez bien avant de vous engager sur le paiement d'un séjour car EUROSTAR ne soucie pas des frais engagés par leur client qui ne respectent pas ......

items.title: Toegangspoortjes Amsterdam CS bestaan niet
items.review_text: De reis van Londen St. Pancras naar Rotterdam CS was prima. Fijne verwarmde wachtruimte op St. Pancras. De heenreis vanuit Amsterdam CS was minder prettig. Adviezen, vermeld bij het ticket, zoals: 1 uur van tevoren aanwezig zijn om op Amsterdam CS in te checken bij de toegangspoortjes op perron 15b, klopten niet! Er zijn op dit moment helemaal geen toegangspoortjes en de trein (Thalys) vertrok van een heel ander perron. Dus: 2 uur tijd verspilt voor niets. We hadden ook, hadden we dat maar geweten, ook op station Schiphol kunnen instappen. Waardeloze informatie dus!!!

items.title: Erg slechte!!!!na een vertraging van 2…
items.review_text: Erg slechte!!!!na een vertraging van 2 uren van Parijs naar Amsterdam kwamen wij aan in Antwerpen en moesten de trein uit.  Het ging niet verder rijden en alles was chaos voor de passagiers.  Niemand wist wat ze moeten doen- ook de conducteurs niet.  Geen informatie!!  Als een solo 74 jarige reiziger met baggage moest ik op straat lopen om een hotel  te vinden   Het werd na 1:15 voordat ik heb een gevonden!!!  Erg slechte

items.title: The Trains may not be the fanciest…
items.review_text:
The Trains may not be the fanciest ones, but i got a refund SO EASY at the service statio..
with the other train company i tried it (öbb) it's so hard and i will never get it. here i just had to show the ticket i couldn't use bc another train was to late, and i got the money back without any questions.

items.title: Pourquoi débiter alors que vous n'etes pas capables d'honorer la commande pour faute de place dans l'hotel (package train÷hotel)
items.review_text:
Réservation 7WVPGG
J' ai voulus prendre un pakage"train+hôtel" pour aller visiter les studios d'Harry Potter pour l'anniversaire de mon enfant .
Une fois la commande correspondant à mes dates validée sur le site d'Eurostar.
Je réserve les billets pour le studio d'Harry potter pensant que tout est OK sauf que Eurostar m'indique que ma commande est annulée pour faute de place dans l'hôtel.
Pourquoi m 'avoir débité alors que vous n'êtes pas dans la capacité d'honorer ma demande.
Je trouve cela inadmissible, je dois attendre d'être recredité de la somme de que vous me devez avant de pouvoir reprendre quoi que ce soit.
Tout le monde.de ne peut pas se permettre de faire plusieurs commande en même temps.
Je risque également de perdre mes billets Harry POtter (366euros) si
Une fois recredité il n'y a plus les dates désirées.
Je ne recommande pas du tout votre site.
Aucune étoile correspondrait plus plutôt qu une!

items.title: An absolute awful episode
items.review_text: An absolute awful episode. This company can't be trusted and their services demonstrate a complete lack of customer care and contingency plans. On Friday January 19th on a train from Amsterdam Centraal towards London St Pancras, the train did simply stop half an hour away from Brussels Midi, the mid-stop for the entire journey. Despite being forced to stay stuck in Brussels, Eurostar kept hundreds of passengers for over 5 hours inside the carriages looking like "headless chickens" running around and trying to solve the problem. This clearly have shown that their trains lack maintenance for ages at this point and that they ignore training their staff to react to such faults. Despite all that, and with many young children and elderly inside, the only thing they could was feeding us with chocolate bars and water, which for instance they were running out from. The train stopped in Brussels past 3AM and after arriving at the terminal the communication with the ground security at the station was completely ignored causing tensions to rise amongst all. If European's green policies rely on thieves like Eurostar to reach their low carbon emission goals, so that's laughable and for that reason all of us will keep using airplanes, which are much cheaper and don't cause nearly half of the problems.

items.title: Shocking customer service
items.review_text:
What went wrong? - What went right?

The train was very delayed - That is life and understood.  Under their terms and an email I received I can make a claim.  Their website will not allow the claim and there is no other way to communicate with them except a useless chatbot.

I will never use Eurostar again - simple.

items.title: No refund following cancelled train
items.review_text: No refund following cancelled train. I was told I would have a refund within 10 days and have seen not a penny. Customer service is lacking both in London and Paris. Left my disabled friend without assistance for over 3 hours, no communication. Eventually cancelled our train last minute causing us to incur substantial additional costs for accommodation and alternate travel. When I spoke to someone on the phone, they assured me a they had initiated a refund and I would have it in 10 days. Several weeks later, nothing. I'm now out of pocket by an additional £500 and they're completely uncommunicative.

items.title: Voor het eerst met de eurostar naar Londen
items.review_text:
Voor het eerst met de eurostar naar Londen gegaan. Overweging: milieu; geen gedoe op een luchthaven; tijd in de trein kunnen werken.
