Leur application ne fonctionnait plus donc même pas moyen d’ajouter mes points (4 allers retours par mois pendant presque 4mois) Je veux absolument récupérer mes points de décembre à mars. C’est la moindre des choses après tous les retards que j’ai eu ou je n’ai pas reçu de compensation! A quand une réponse ? Je vous ai déjà envoyé plusieurs mails

items.title: Nouveaux wagons inconfortables et…
items.review_text: Nouveaux wagons inconfortables et sièges trop haut privant de toute vue extérieure ou presque. Trajet retour avec personnel saint pancras incroyablement stressé et désagréable et tres peu de personnel a la douane Française. Organisation indigne d'eurostar qui oblige à décaler le départ du train car les voyageurs sont toujours à faire la queue depuis l ouverture de l embarquement il y a plus de 90 minutes !!!! Pourquoi vendre des billets quand on n à pas le personnel pour prendre soin des clients ?

items.title: Again my seat changed last minute!!
items.review_text:
Again my seat moved last minute!!
Reference FXNXHD. I book ON PURPOSE the tickets a long time in advance and spend time carefully selecting my seats, all this for nothing as I always end up receiving an email two days before departure telling me my seating plan has changed. 
Obviously now seats are terrible, going backwards and not with a table. 
Terrible service for the price we pay. 
Give me back my seats and I’ll remove this review.

items.title: Van haas naar schilpad
items.review_text: De reis naar Londen ging goed echter terug naar Rotterdam werd het een ramp. 930 uur in checken daarna zien dat we tot Brussel gaan. Trein naar Breda pas rond 17 uur. Dan nog naar Eindhoven. Zo ben je met de snelle trein de hele dag onderweg. Nooit meer

items.title: Incompetant - in all areas
items.review_text: Eurostar confirmed friend had £210 in credit on tickets purchased. Due to circumstances she wished to change date of travel on the journey, which meant she would only need to use £83 of this amount. After protracted conversations with (and being put on long term hold on numerous occasions) “Customer Services” surely a title that fails on all levels, she was told the balance was forfeited and could not be used to book other trips ! A nice earner for Eurostar…..

items.title: Worthless seat allocation
items.review_text: These pathetic wastes of space and time once again changed the seats I had booked. I really do not understand why they give the impression that customers can book seats when they more or less systematically change the seat allocation at the last minute.

items.title: Chaos @  St Pancras
items.review_text:
Chaos @  St Pancras. 
First & last time

items.title: Absolutely a joke....
items.review_text:
Absolutely a joke....

Trying to get compensation due to train cancellation since May and still nothing. We raise 2 complaints between me and my partner:
- Complaint number 1 didn't get a reply since may.
- Complaint number 2 actually got to some kind of compensation that they can't release as the First complaint (that they never replied to) is still opened.

The customer service is absolutely useless in particular Tyler who has been dealing with our complaint and hasn't been able to connect the 2 complaints together.

Another 1 star review that probably won't get a reply, I really can't understand how they can keep such a bad level of service.

items.title: Seats are not guaranteed
items.review_text: Having booked well in advance for a group of four and reserving our seats so we could be sat together, we get an email a week before our trip saying the seating has changed, I checked on the plan and found we still had seating together then with one day to go another email saying seating has changed again this time we were split apart on the plan, apart from the fact we have to download tickets once again, I couldn't talk to anyone to complain, fortunately when we got on the train we were seated together, the same pattern happened on our return but this time we were seated with two with a table and two seated behind, not very happy to say the least, what or who is running eurostar and what's the point of reserving seats they can't seem to honour. No problem with the staff on the train who must have to put up with this amateur management day in and day out.

items.title: OVERPRICED!
items.review_text: Not very reliable and completely overpriced. They have a monopoly and take advantage of it, this is outrageous

items.title: Eurostar are a shambles
items.review_text:
Eurostar are a shambles. Don’t expect to sit in the seat you book no matter how far in advance you do it. We booked 4 seats together In Standard Premier for a big anniversary trip 8 months in advance and we printed off our tickets at the time. However without any warning Eurostar rebooked  us in 4 single seats one behind the other in backward facing seats at the back of the train. Eurostar were not able to rectify the position and merely claimed that their terms and conditions allowed them to do it. The experience in Standard Premier was ok but the whole experience was spoiled by the inability of the 4 of us to celebrate our anniversary trip together. 
Arrival at Gare du Nord was very poor with an 800m walk to taxis and a 30 minutes wait with no cover. 
In view of the very high cost of Eurostar and the uncertain premium experience it is far better to fly.

items.title: Geannuleerde trein
items.review_text: Mijn trein naar Londen vanuit Rotterdam werd vanwege werkzaamheden, buiten de schuld van Eurostar om, geannuleerd. De klantenservice was zeer behulpzaam bij het zoeken naar een alternatief.

items.title: Schandalig slecht behandeld
items.review_text: Schandalig slecht geregeld, niets van actuele reisinformatie, geen berichtje via de app oid, chaos op station st pancras in Londen, ons ruim 3 uur wachten op een trein waarvan ze zelf al moeten hebben geweten dat hij het eindstation in nl nooit meer zou halen, iedereen moet het maar uitzoeken en afwachten, geen info, vervolgens honderden reizigers laten stranden in Brussel midden in de nacht, ook daar niets geregeld. Niemand in de trein om informatie te verstrekken of mensen te helpen, hotels uiteraard al gesloten of volgeboekt door medereizigers, wij hebben nog een uber kunnen boeken, á €470, wie gaat daarvoor opdraaien?

items.title: HELL COMPANY! Never use it
items.review_text:
Lets start with this… If there was lower than 1 star review I would give it without a second thought! The only way of this company improving , would be to close doors and never again work in customer service field! 
My first trip to London was canceled in the last second! We were pushed into Thalys train without seats! When I asked for a possibility of having only one seat for my pregnant wife , because she cant stand on her feet for few hours in between 100s of people I was answered this is not our problem! 
Now with lost of uncomfortable hours and terrible ride we managed to reach London, on the way back we had 3 and a half hours of delay and finally when we were in the train, which supposed to be direct but all of a sudden had 4 stops , we were TOLD THAT WE ARE GONNA STOP IN BRUSSELS AND WE CANNOT CONTINUE UNTIL NEXT MORNING!  11392 train! Offered to sleep in the train cause it is safer!!!

items.title: I used to travel regularly to Paris by…
items.review_text: I used to travel regularly to Paris by Eurostar for work. The WiFi service is just non existent. Why bother even advertising it, it's not possible to maintain a connection for more than five minutes. The trains I've taken recently were at least on time but the queues for security and passports are a bit nuts.

items.title: Fahr mit dem Auto
items.review_text: Fahr mit dem Auto, bist du auch nicht schneller aber du bist nicht auf die Pünktlichkeit der Züge angewiesen.

items.title: A complete rip off
items.review_text:
Having decided to treat ourselves to a little more comfort I paid an extra £134 pounds to upgrade to "standard premium" on the way to Paris. It was only AFTER buying the (v expensive tickets to start with) that i discovered I was not sitting together with my wife. I phoned immediately but it was 5.02pm and they close at 5.00!
I tried the next morning and they basically said "tough" and we cannot guarantee seating together and, no there is no way to check if you can be seated together before buying AND there is no "cooling off" period to cancel. 
I asked if there were two seats together in ordinary economy and they said yes. They refused to even discuss refunding me the £134 on the grounds that I had chosen a "voluntary" downgrade
As it was twice the price of flying I have learnt my lesson NEVER AGAIN

items.title: 1 minute too late for check-in
items.review_text: 1 minute too late for check-in. Our access was denied even though the train wasnt about to leave for another 30 minutes. Only business class people were still allowed to answer

items.title: Kosten van annulering zijn voor klant
items.review_text: De terugreis werd geannuleerd en de kosten daarvan waren voor mij. Niet alleen mag je alles zelf regelen, je moet het ook zelf betalen. Zelfs de boekingskosten krijg je niet terug. Alsof het nog niet duur genoeg is, komen er zo nog hinderden euro’s bij en moet je zelf maar zien hoe je thuis komt. Er was niet eens een Nederlands sprekende medewerker te krijgen bij de helpdesk.

items.title: Eurostar will ruin your holiday and…
items.review_text: Eurostar will ruin your holiday and cost you $$$$. Eurostar will try to extort money from you, or you’ll “miss” your train. You can’t cancel bookings, BTW and changes cost as much as a regular booking. They prey on unsuspecting tourists. BEWARE.

items.title: I went from London to Paris (return)
items.review_text:
I went from London to Paris, standard class return, in May 2023. It was OK and made a change to flying.

The screen boasts that there is free WiFi on board,although, in practice it was painful to use. Whilst it was straightforward to connect to the wifi, there was hardly any connection there or back. I had better connection from my mobile phone signal. Waste of time trying to connect.

There is also still a message on the screens saying masks MUST be worn at all stations. Nobody wore them. Not sure why in May 2023 they need to continue to show such a message when nobody pays any attention?

items.title: This is a 5 star review of Rose
items.review_text:
This is a 5 star review of Rose, who works at the Rotterdam station. She worked very hard to help me in my ticketing issue, it was a pleasure to be taken care of by her.

The train itself was late and brutally expensive, hence the 4 stars for Eurostar

items.title: Train delayed by “the number of passengers”
items.review_text: Real announcement just made as we wait on Amsterdam bound train: “departure of this train will be delayed due to the number of passengers”. Not sure how to respond to that. Long and chaotic queuing - got through passport control one hour after arriving at the station.

items.title: Eurostar have a lot to learn
items.review_text:
The Eurostar Rotterdam terminal is not fit for purpose. Only vending machines selling second-rate snacks and sandwiches with almost nothing for hungry vegetarians. 
Just before the train arrives passengers stand in a queue before being allowed onto the platform. 
At Brussels the train sits motionless for half an hour.
It wouldn’t be so bad if Eurostar offered competitive fares. Their prices are outrageous - it’s simply cheaper and quicker to fly.
The sooner they loose their monopoly the better!

items.title: Absolute shambles
items.review_text: Absolute shambles. No communication, rude and poorly trained staff giving you misleading information. I was shouted at for no reasons whilst trying to explain that my mother needed to get on her train due to poor health and mobility. She was reissued a ticket for a later train as there were problems. When she got to the other side, her train was still there and she was refused entry because she was given a new ticket. Nothing made sense.

items.title: absurd asociaal bedrijf
items.review_text: Book ik vroegtijdig 6 maanden voor mijn zomervakantie en dan laat Eurostar 4 maanden later, 7 weken voor vertrek, horen dat mijn reis door werkzaamheden geannuleerd is. Later vetrekken kan niet want ale hotels en appartementen zitten nu stampvol en wat er nog over is is 2 keer zo duur. Moet nu vliegen wat inmiddels zo kort voor vertrek extreem duur is geworden. Dit kost mij nu zo'n 700 euro aan extra reiskosten. Belachelijk. Bedankt Eurostar.

items.title: Het kan ongeluk zijn dat je vertraging…
items.review_text:
Het kan ongeluk zijn dat je vertraging hebt of dat je heenreis geannuleerd wordt door werkzaamheden maar de service die geboden is verschikkelijk.

De 1e keer: Vorig jaar besloten wij naar Londen te gaan met de Eurostar met een overstap in Brussel. De communicatie rondom hoe het op Amsterdam zou gaan was onduidelijk. Wel geen paspoort/douane controle. NIemand die het wist.. Op Brussel blijkt dat onze trein meer dan 2 uur vertraging heeft door een aanrijding met een persoon. Het station Brussel is niet geschikt om zoveel mensen op te vangen dus dat was een drama maar daar kan Eurostar opzich niet veel aan doen. Hun tegemoetkoming was dat wij of een voucher kregen wat 30% van onze reissom was of cash maar dan 25%. Wij dachten dat we nog een wel een keer naar Londen zouden gaan dus kozen voor de voucher. 
Bij het boeken blijkt dat de NS international goedkoper is dan de Eurostar zelf inclusief de korting op dezelfde datum en tijd. Na wat mailwisselingen en ook gebeld te hebben met de Eurostart klantenservice (waar ik 20 minuten op heb moeten wachten) bleek toch echt dat de NS international dit heel goed had ingekocht. Echter bleek NS international over de hele linie goedkoper te zijn. Waardeloze vouchers dus..

De tweede keer; we boeken in januari voor augustus en krijgen op 30 mei een mailtje dat vanwege werkzaamheden op ons opstapstation (dit keer Rotterdam) de heenreis vervalt. Je kunt je geld terugkrijgen, een voucher of een nieuwe boeking maken met de huidige dagprijs. Wij zouden met vrienden gaan die vanuit Amsterdam vertrokken maar dit is niet mogelijk. Je kon wel opnieuw boeken vanuit Amsterdam maar dan was de prijs wel 2.5 x keer zo duur.

Om de reis te annuleren weer gebeld met Eurostar en weer 20 minuten in de wacht gestaan. Was inderdaad niets mogelijk. Opeens hoorde ze me niet meer en hing meteen op. Ben ook niet teruggebeld oid.

Voor ons nooit meer Eurostar.

items.title: They took my money
items.review_text: They took my money, and did not inform me of voucher expiry. Bunch of crooks.

items.title: Wat een SUPER service
items.review_text:
Wat een SUPER service. Was tas vergeten in business lounge. Het personeel heeft geholpen met omboeken, tas veilig stellen en het ging zo soepel. Dik compliment!

Jeroen Backx

items.title: De Eurostar van Londen naar Amsterdam…
items.review_text: De Eurostar van Londen naar Amsterdam was heerlijk, niet in de laatste plaats door de fantastische bereidwilligheid om mij (invalide bejaarde vrouw) te helpen en gerust te stellen. Conducteur Mevrouw Marianne Palmers, chapeau!

items.title: -10 stars if i could
items.review_text:
-10 stars if i could. Useless cow not giving out ice. 
Surly and poor customer service.

items.title: Absolutely disgusting!
items.review_text:
Absolutely disgusting!
We arrived 2 hrs before our train but weren’t allowed to join the queue. Then the scanner wouldn’t work on our tickets then finally got to see someone and we’re told we will miss the train because we were late!!
How are they allowed to treat people this way???

items.title: What a disappointment
items.review_text: What a disappointment, I wish I read the reviews prior to booking.

items.title: Experience not as good as domestic UK trains
items.review_text:
Was really looking forward to the journey, but unfortunately Eurostar has a way to go to catch up with the convenience of domestic services. There's no option to choose forward facing seats, and I find traveling backwards at high speed to be deeply unpleasant. Spent the whole journey feeling sick and wishing I'd taken the plane.

The promised WiFi also didn't work.

items.title: Positive experience, including drama from rude passengers
items.review_text:
My trip from London to Brussels and back is absolutely amazing. I had to ask assistance and every person was extremely friendly.
Even when dealing with a difficult customer who was too late as boarding was closed, they kept being professional (even when she was shouting like a banshee). After all, it is not the companies fault when customers decide to arrive last minute and not allocate plenty of extra time, especially when visiting the country for the first time. 

I can’t be grateful and appreciative enough for the team for they efforts, friendliness and professionalism.

items.title: Misleading.
items.review_text:
Misleading.

Booked business premium due to the flexible benefits (so I thought)

They state that it is refundable up to 60days after. But what they fail to state up front with everything is, if you buy a hotel package it is not refundable if you cancel withing 7 days. Thats the one thing you need to read the full Ts and Cs to see. 

Just be careful when booking.

items.title: nightmare experience
items.review_text:
I have been traveling with Eurostar for a while now and the service and customer care gets worse and worse. I am traveling around once a month for work and 2-3 times year for leisure. 

My recent experience has been a nightmare. I have been traveling with a toddler and being pregnant myself. We arrived on time (30 mins before) have been waiting in queue and when got to ticket check they said its too late gate is closed. I got super frustrated but they didn’t want to hear a word. They made me go to their customer service at the station , queue another 15 mins to buy a new ticket FOR THE SAME TRAIN! As the train was 45 min late anyway… 

I raised that as a complaint and they said sorry for inconvenience we will refund as you ( as it was their lack of understanding and professionalism that caused the whole issue). 

I have been waiting for a month now and no refund! They confirmed to me payment was made, but my bank cannot see any trace of a pending payments. I have asked 3 times through mail for Eurostar to contact the issuer bank ( as its their responsibility to track the payment and know where it is) but they just pushed back with “ it has been confirmed by our finance team as being processed contact your bank”. 

I find myself with no refund , awful service and awful experience. Eurostar used to be my go to travel service for work and leisure. Now Its my last option. What a disappointment

items.title: Absolutely awful customer service from…
items.review_text: Absolutely awful customer service from the Eurostar. Our train was cancelled just 24 hours before departure time. The service did not offer a simple replacement or immediate refund as should be expected in these circumstances. Instead they offer a 28 day respond policy, as we had to book a sudden flight back the next night, which was extortionate. So disappointed with a service that we had booked many months in advance. Shame on this company for providing terrible customer service.

items.title: Human kindness and genuine customer care…
items.review_text:
I have to review the exceptional customer service I received yesterday afternoon at Gare du Nord. 

Having spent a few days in Paris with my severely autistic daughter, we had a particularly difficult morning on Saturday 13th and I arrived at Gare du Nord more than 3 hours early hoping to arrange an earlier departure than the evening booking we had made, as we just needed to get home!

The lady who served us at the customer service desk was extremely understanding and immediately arranged seats on the 3.15 train. The team at the passport gates stepped in to help my daughter and I through the automatic gates. And the lady at the gate allowed us through the barrier to board slightly before the main group, giving us time to get down the ramp and on board before it became too crowded. 

I cannot express my gratitude enough. Travelling alone with a learning disabled teenager can be extremely stressful and the kindness of Eurostar staff redeemed what had, to that point, been a really demanding and emotionally exhausting day. 

Well done on exceptional service which is all too rare these days.

items.title: feel scammed..
items.review_text: feel scammed... the ticket is non refundable so they suggest you but insurance.. you buy the insurance.. i had to cancel.. then they say its not refundable.. shame on you Allianz and Eurostar

items.title: Worst experience ever
items.review_text: Worst experience ever. Family of 5 and they split us all apart. Then no one can help fix the situation. We paid extra for first class and couldn’t fit our bags in our car. Then given a plate of gluten filled food when I am gluten free. When I asked for nuts I was told I would have to pay and walk back 7 cars. In addition staff super rude.

items.title: Train or plane to Amsterdam?
items.review_text: Travelled on Eurostar from London to Amsterdam. The catering is dreadful. No hot food or alcohol drink other than wine. At least on a flight you get to buy hot food and drink. Next time I will fly to Amsterdam

items.title: A fuir absolument
items.review_text: Nous avons réservé 3 billets aller-retour Lille Londres le 1er février pour un départ le 27 mai et nous apprenons le 9 mai que le train est annulé sans plus d'explications...Nous avons du prendre à la place des billets d'avion avec un départ de Paris et des frais supplémentaires occasionnés. Il faut maintenant se battre avec eux pour espérer se faire rembourser. Je déconseille très fortement Eurostar. Il faut être pris pour être appris mais je ne re-tenterai pas l'expérience avec eux

items.title: Rude conductor
items.review_text: Overall a bit disappointing comfort level, but no big issue with that. However a rude conductor/train employee really destroyed the experience. We were on the 8am train to Paris and I wanted to buy a coffee and didn't know which direction to go when she  appeared and I approached her and said "Hi, do you work here? Do you know where the restaurant/café is, I mean where can I buy coffee?" I'm not a native English speaker but I don't think I said something very rude... In reply she says, "Well good morning to you too!" In a very insinuating tone, as if I should have said good morning and Hi wasn't polite, or what? Even if I would have been rude, I don't think it is the job of a conductor to educate passengers... It really doesn't feel well to be told off like that, not at all a nice start to our weekend in Paris.

items.title: I recently travelled on Eurostar and…
items.review_text: I recently travelled on Eurostar and after the trip I wanted to add my points to my carte Blanche account. Apparently, the functionality to claim missing miles using Eurostar app and website gives an error. I emailed Eurostar through the website form more than 2 weeks ago. No response. Clearly there is lacking no consideration for customers

items.title: Free replacement ticket for elderly mother
items.review_text: When my 87 year-old mother turned up at St Pancras to board the Eurostar having forgotten her passport, the staff could not have been more helpful in rearranging a new ticket at no extra cost.  Well done Eurostar for showing some humanity.

items.title: My friends and I had a problem with our…
items.review_text:
My friends and I had a problem with our booking and after trying to get it resolved the day before with no luck we had no alternative other than to try at St Pancras. 
We saw a Customer Services person called Will. Well Will was amazing. So helpful and helped us beyond expectations. Thank you Will. Eurostar are very lucky to have you.

items.title: Dirty exteriors.
items.review_text: Queuing at st pancras is a joke,passport control had just 2 booths open at 0800,terminal cannot cope with thousands of passengers waiting around for boarding which is usually about 20 min before departure so then it’s a mad rush to get on the train,the train I travelled on was its first journey of the day but it hadn’t been washed for days,couldn’t see out of the windows they were so dirty,no excuse for this in 2023, I wish Eurostar had some competition with another rail company as I’m sure it would make them sort out problems,the paying passengers deserve better.

items.title: UN SITE INTERNET INDIGNE ET UN SAV RIDICULE
items.review_text: Site internet scandaleux. J'achète des billets pour quelqu'un. Qui me demande finalement de décaler son voyage. Je vais sur le site pour échanger les billets, et là : impossible ! Et nulle part on ne vous explique pourquoi ! C'est simplement impossible. Obligé de me faire rembourser les billets pour en acheter d'autres. Et bien sûr je perds plusieurs dizaines d'euros au passage. Je contacte la personne pour qui je commande les billets, qui est une habituée d'Eurostar. Et elle m'explique qu'en effet, on ne peut procéder à un échange qu'en passant par l'application ! Honteux ! Deuxième problème : je dois me faire rembourser ces billets par mon employeur. Il me faut donc des justificatifs. Les prix n'apparaissent pas sur les billets ; OK. Je vais donc sur le site, j'entre la référence du billet, mon nom, je clique sur "Reçu", et là, s'affiche un reçu... sans le montant du billet ! Tout y est, c'est bien un reçu, mais sans montant ! Je fais une réclamation auprès du service client, à qui j'explique tout, et qui me répond que pour accéder à mes reçus, je dois faire la manipulation que je viens de leur décrire comme ne fonctionnant pas. C'est une fois de plus la personne pour qui j'achète les billets qui me sauve la mise. Et qui au passage me glisse, en tant que grande habituée d'Eurostar, qu'elle fait le même constat que moi : Eurostar traite ses clients comme de la m****. Je rêve du jour ou la concurrence débarquera et vous leur mettra le nez dedans.

items.title: Ik adviseer iedereen om NIET met…
items.review_text: Ik adviseer iedereen om NIET met Eurostar te reizen. Vorige week heb ik twee tickets geboekt van Amsterdam naar Londen. In de teksten rondom het boeken van de tickets wordt steeds aangeprezen dat je heel makkelijk je reis kunt omboeken. Ik had niet eens het idee dat dat nodig zou zijn, maar helaas bleek al snel dat ik mijn weekend Londen op een andere datum zou moeten doen. Toen ik probeerde om te boeken, bleek dat er geen enkele mogelijkheid tot eind van 2023 is om zowel een heen- als terugreis te boeken naar Londen. Meestal is er sowieso helemaal geen mogelijkheid, alle treinen zaten vol. Hier en daar is er een weekend dat je wel heen maar niet terug kan of omgekeerd. Kijk, als ik dat had geweten, had ik natuurlijk niet geboekt. Ik ben op de website gaan kijken wat ik nu moest doen. Er wordt je op alle mogelijke manieren afgeraden om te bellen met Eurostar omdat ze het zo druk hebben. Ik kan geeneens het telefoonnummer vinden! Dus heb ik het contactformulier ingevuld met mijn vragen. Antwoord: er zijn veel werkzaamheden op het spoor daarom zijn er geen reismogelijkheden. Mochten die er wel zijn, dan wordt dat op de site gepubliceerd. Dus het komt erop neer dat ik niet meer kan gaan dit jaar tenzij ik de site in de gaten ga houden. En alleen kan gaan als het Eurostar uitkomt. Als het al uitkomt. Nu heb ik het formulier ingevuld dat ik dan mijn geld terugwil, ook al is aangegeven dat je je geld niet terugkrijgt. Ik vind dat ik misleid ben en dat op die regel moet worden teruggekomen. Maar op mijn reactie wordt nu niet meer gereageerd. Ben zo ontzettend aan het balen. Meer dan 400 euro weg en in Londen zit ik zeker niet. Ik vind het oplichting.

items.title: Booked hotel and tickets as a package…
items.review_text: Booked hotel and tickets as a package to Brussels with my daughter.  Train was ok, but expected more comfort, space.  Snack bar a waste of space.  Only plain coffee, or tea.  Exhorbitant snacks. Thankfully we bought food from 'Pauls' at St. Pancras before boarding.   Eurostar offers not much choice of 4* hotels.  Mercure Midi was only 4 minutes from station, but hotel situated on main road which was mostly boarded up with major, major roadworks upheaval.  Whichever route we needed to walk we had to negotiate a huge roundabout with, again, major roadworks which one could not see beyond, so directions were difficult to follow.  The area surrounding hotel very run down and felt unsafe in evening.   Not a decent restaurant found within 10 mins of hotel.  Most were closed (maybe open in evenings) or by station, which were overpriced for sub standard or mediocre food. Hotel map useless.  When it rained/poured, every road and crossing became a bed of mud from roadworks, and deep puddles.  Eurostar should have checked out conditions of hotel they supplied.    I'm having difficulty in reaching them to complain, emails not going through (unrecognised)- their form menu does  not have a useful listing for this complaint.  I do not think hotel is quite 4* standard, but new spa is very nice, which has no doubt raised their rating.  Desk staff each gave different directions to city centre, marking the maps for us.  2 hours out of our way first time. Half hour + the next trip.   Only one resident of the area gave true directions - so easy - max 15-20 mins.  So many roadworks over Brussels made walking difficult with  many hazards.

items.title: Fantastische service
items.review_text: vliegen! in 4 uur over en midden in het centrum. Veel procedures maar als de Eurostar trein eenmaal rijdt krijg je ook waar voor je geld. Schone toiletten en op de terug reis ook extra service omdat we een plus stoel hadden geboekt voor maar 20e extra (incl eten). Maria en Tessa waren top gastvrouwen met gevoel voor service. Jullie zien ons weer terug met de trein naar Londen!

items.title: Kindness, care & generosity
items.review_text: Yesterday I had travel at the last minute with my mum who had broken her shoulder. Although a last minute ticket was rather expensive, once onboard, the Train Manager, Richard, and his crew were outstanding. They showed us genuine kindness, care and generosity to ensure Mum travelled as comfortably as possible. We will forever be grateful to them all for making a huge difference to a very stressful 24hrs. The crew in Brussels were equally amazing and really did look after me, ensuring I could return home afterwards. I feel very blessed to have been looked after by such a lovely group of people. Thank you so very much from my family and I.

items.title: Slechte communicatie en zeer slechte…
items.review_text:
Slechte communicatie en zeer slechte klantenservice.
Op 27 maart 2023 zouden mijn man en ik terugreizen van Londen naar Rotterdam. Die dag bleek er een trein de bovenleiding te hebben geraakt ter hoogte van Frankrijk waardoor alle Eurostar treinen die dag vertraagd waren. Onze trein, die oorspronkelijk om 13:01 uur zou vertrekken, werd na 2u wachten (in de trein) geannuleerd. Vervolgens werd onze reis met een enorm onduidelijke omweg omgeboekt naar de reis van 18:01 uur. Ook deze trein had enorm veel vertraging opgelopen waardoor we pas om 19:23 vertrokken. Al met al een vertraging van 06:22 min. 
De klantenservice van Eurostar zegt hierin dat onze reis maar een vertraging had van 82 min (gerekend vanaf 18:01u) en we alleen hiervoor een compensatie kunnen krijgen. 
Zelfs na een uitleg vanuit onze kant, blijven zij bij dit statement. Absoluut geen goede/meedenkende klantenservice. Het voelt alsof de klant hierin dubbel gestraft wordt. 
Voor ons geen Eurostar meer en zal deze manier van reizen dan ook zeker niet aanraden.

items.title: RUDE CONDUCTOR + Arbitrary new seats attribution because of train change
items.review_text: New seat attribution because of a train change on our way back to Brussels from London forced  us to have  seats in standard premier irrelevant to our costly reservation of two face to face seats (paid rather dearly for - more than 600 EUR-and reserved very well in advance) while the rude conductor insisted that he would not accept our "conditions" (!?!?) for seating. So much for customer rights, service and care!  :-(...

items.title: I travelled back from Disney and had a…
items.review_text:
I travelled back from Disney and had a seat change 5 times and the seat we ended up in was still someone else’s seat. I was travelling with an autistic 3 year old and when I emailed to complain….Kevin tells me as per section 6.2 of carriage rules or whatever, they can’t guarantee seats! But I had a seat number 4 times and it kept being given away! Walking around a carriage looking for a seat is not what anyone with a 3 year old needs to be doing! 

So if you’re autistic, anxious, stressed or like a specific seat….DONT TRAVEL EUROSTAR!

items.title: Plus jamais
items.review_text:
Deux fois 
Je veux prendre l Eurostar deux fois c est annulé.

Service client peu réactif ! C est du grand n’importe quoi

items.title: Scheduled arrival time 16:13 Actual 23:30
items.review_text: The Eurostar from London to Amsterdam was 4 hours and 22 minutes late leaving St Pancras apparently still destined for Amsterdam. But no. As the train approached Brussels we were informed it would terminate there and all passengers would have to find their own way to Amsterdam on Intercity Trains from Brussels. That was it. No further assistance/support/information. Effective customer service was withdrawn when it was most needed.

items.title: Eurnostar
items.review_text: After a long delay sitting in the train a fault was found and we were delivered back to the station we had passed three hours before and shuttled onto another train. I have to say the lovely people assisting us on the train were amazing, making sure we were fed and watered, putting up with the odd grumpy person with grace and calmness.  As for Eurostar, knowing the issues caused by your faulty train and the delays caused, making sure there were enough taxis and rooms booked or set aside for us all would have been a good idea. However, you left us stranded in London at midnight, no visible staff to help us find accommodation or a cab home. We now have the joys of trying to claim back all the incurred costs, the train tickets we were unable to use, overnight accommodations and a very expensive ride home at peak times this morning! I will be objecting to any future plans to travel via a Eurostar train in future. In our eyes, you will forever be Eurnostar.

items.title: Another unhappy customer...
items.review_text:
Another unhappy customer...
But the company doesn't care. 
Of course, they don't, they have a full monopoly.

Today my disappointment came from ''flexible travels''... Which made me confidently pay 300£ for a trip.. I have to cancel.. and guess what?
It's not that flexible. 
First, they charge you 30£ a pop, just to update your ticket.. And you can;t change the destination.

And I will also mention that those prices are absolute rip-offs. 
I could go back and forth 3 times using aircraft.. 
If you really care about how green your travels are, make them affordable instead of having half your train empty.

Just don't put ''flexible travel'' when it is not.. 
Buying a car to stop using those guys.

items.title: Rip off
items.review_text: Have to say I’m disappointed in Eurostar paid £351 for 1 person but due to unforeseen circumstances couldn’t travel and Eurostar do not refund even though my ticket cost more that business class, they are no help once you’ve given them your money

items.title: Very bad experience with the cafe
items.review_text: Very bad experience with the cafe. The staff in the cafe on the trip to Paris is very rude.

items.title: Rip off and non-existent customer service
items.review_text: Had a last minute issue and needed to change my original booking which could only be done over the phone, the customer service was terrible once i was finally able to get hold of them. They do not have a contactable phone line on weekends and ask that you open a case online (they do not respond to these either!). They do not allow any refunds and ask that you pay the extra if you need to change your tickets which are extortionate near date of travel! They wanted to charge me £600 on top of what I had already paid to change tickets for the same dates of travel!! Awful experience and no flexibility from their side even though there were many trains available. Rip off...

items.title: SHAMBLES
items.review_text:
Absolutely disgraceful customer service. Took a trip first weekend of February and was delayed 2 hours on the way out - due £70 refund. They told me on 17th February it could take up to 28 days to come into my account - it’s now 3rd April.

I have sent multiple emails about this and hear nothing back. On hold to them now and have been for 30 MINUTES.

The worst company - I will never use again!!!!!!

items.title: Just horrible
items.review_text: Just horrible. Stuck in Brussels, 2 hours after the train should have left. It's 10.40pm now, there is no communication, no apology, nothing. Disgraceful!

items.title: Eurostar workers in Amsterdam, the worse by far
items.review_text:
Eurostar workers in Amsterdam made me loose my trip to London on purpose.

I asked downstairs at Helpdesk where to go and they literally told me to wait for the train in platform 15b, so I did.

At the platform, 3 Eurostar workers  saw me waiting at the platform (no signalling whatsoever, not even one arrow or sign pointing where to go), for 35 minutes, they were just laughing and talking between them, the train arrived 15 minutes before departure and they blocked the platform and told me I lost my train. I was absolutely in shock, seemed like something out of a prank movie, the nerve of these three, can't even call them men, they were talking in Dutch the whole time, I begged them to let me go through and board, and they said I lost the time to check in and go through security. 

The apathy from these people is appalling, what kind of company has these people working for them?

The service in London is a luxury in comparison, Eurostar in Amsterdam is absolutely disgraceful.

items.title: Gare du nord.
items.review_text: Most recently 31/03/23 I had exceptional service from a member of staff named malvina at gate du nord. She was so uplifting and helpful, and went above and beyond to assist me from security to departure gate. This hasn't been my previous experiences pre covid, but definitely with staff like malvina the experience has enhanced.

items.title: Brussels terminus
items.review_text:
Travelled from Amsterdam to Brussels to get the London connection.
Disappointingly on leaving the Thalys train there was NO SIGNAGE to show where to go through Customs and Passport Control for the Eurostar train.
This needs fixing as a stressful experience. How about a sign on the Platform and in the subway that says EUROSTAR TERMINUS PASSPORT CONTROL with an arrow.

Also WIFI connection on the train is hopeless and felt sorry for waiters and waitresses serving refreshments in Business Class. Crockery very nice but food tasteless. May as well give out a couple of bags of crisps with the wine!

items.title: Consistently poor Experience
items.review_text: This is the second time in six months that Eurostar has cancelled our train.  They advise it was due to reasons that do not entitle us to compensation but in both cases it appears that they just want to move passengers on to one train rather than run two half full. They are constantly moving our seats to accommodate groups of people who have booked last minute. Customer service is impossible and predictably negative. What a shame they are a monopoly. We are choosing more and more to fly or drive.

items.title: It does not even de one star .after…
items.review_text: It does not even deserve one star after the atrocious journey we had on Monday 27th March 2023. We were due out of London to Amsterdam on the 11.04, train no 0126, travelling in standard Premier. 4 hrs 22 mins later we departed. We were served a light meal and drink at around 11.30 but no information apart from delay due to overhead cables down in Brussels we think. 5 mins before Brussels a garbled message which no one could here informed us that we must leave the train. No help from staff we were told to get another local train. That broke down and had no facilities for refreshments or use of toilets, finely arrived at Amsterdam at 23.55!!! Never will I use Eurostar again, no apology from anyone.

items.title: They changed the departure time and didn’t inform us
items.review_text:
They changed the departure time without informing us.
We had the train from Rotterdam to London. We arrived on time according to the old departure time but they didn’t allow us to do the check in, because according to them we were already late. They even didn’t want to speak with us. 
The weirdest thing is to see how the train is coming, all people are getting in but you are just staying and can’t get in because you are not allowed.
Very awful experience!

items.title: Do they even employ a customer service team???
items.review_text:
Booked via Eurostar because we wanted to be more environmentally friendly than flying (which would have been cheaper). If all the trains had been on time/not cancelled it may have been worth it... but that's not the case. Okay, delays happen, trains get cancelled. The real annoyance is the fact that Eurostar make it incredibly difficult to contact their customer services (only an online form available), which they still haven't responded to 3 working days later.

Our connection from Amsterdam to Brussel (run by Thalys), scheduled for 27/03 was cancelled on 22/03 due to upcoming strike action... plenty of time for Eurostar to inform us of alternative arrangements. They never did. And they never responded to our Customer Services requests.

Maybe Eurostar never identified that one of their advertised connecting trains had been cancelled? If true, that's very awkward since Thalys is part of Eurostar Group. It's the same company, yet they aren't aware of cancellations across the group.

Now Eurostar tells us to get a refund from Thalys, Thalys tells us to get a refund from Eurostar. Great working together there...

I give two stars (rather than one), because onboard + station staff are fantastic at trying to help out... unfortunately their HQ teams are letting their front-line staff down massively.

Edit: Two points I forgot to mention.
1) Our Customer Service form was initially + automatically marked as resolved without any sort of response from Eurostar.
And 2) In the time we've been waiting for a response from Eurostar, their marketing has sent at least 3 emails encouraging us to buy more tickets from them/book future journeys... it feels like they focus on marketing to the detriment of customer service and general operations/good service.

items.title: Honestly
items.review_text: Honestly, after my experience in the field, the customer is regarded as a king, I don't know how a big hotel like this can occupy racist people, normally we're living in 2023, and there's no need for all this racism because we're all the same no matter what colour or religion, and yeah, if you're planning to book there just think twice before waisting your time and money to be disrespected 👎🏽

items.title: Great connection to London
items.review_text: Used them a few times without a hitch between Brussels and London. When you get a ticket on a special offer, it's even sweeter (€29 one way). Trains are punctual, fast, clean and comfortable. The only problem is the Internet - their Wi-Fi is simply dead. And the waiting areas both in Brussels and London are rather inconvenient, to put it mildly. The security checks to get to the train can be tiring, too.

items.title: Simple things should not be this hard
items.review_text: Simple things like upgrading doesn't work. The claim missing points link has not been working for well over 6 weeks now. Just really frustrating stuff that should be simple to fix and not broken in the first place. I'm writing a review on a train at the moment. Not a Eurostar of course as the wifi has not worked for my last 4 trips.

items.title: Very bad customer service, hugely expensiv
items.review_text: Very bad customer service, hugely expensive. This should be more citizen-friendly. WE financed this, after all. Eurostar is actively driving people to fly; which is mad in times of climate change. The most unfriendly, unreacable customer service ever, a disgrace. Total arrogance! Customs are a nightmare, too, especially in Brussels. Dirty, old trains.

items.title: What awful customer service
items.review_text: What awful customer service.  Unable to find my booking I completed their on-line form since they apear to have no telephone!   I quickly got a response suggesting that I check my booking reference and see their FAQ's.  Thats it!   Only to contact them again if I need to.  ie a complete brush off.  Unfortunately the only option is a ferry.

items.title: I just don’t understand
items.review_text: I just don’t understand. Why do all of these SUPER EXPENSIVE train companies promote free WIFI when the WIFI does not work. I understand that WIFI is not accessible on an airplane, but on a 4 hour train which you’ve paid £150 ticket for and travels 95% of the time overground, surely the WIFI should be working seamlessly. Honestly Eurostar, with the amount of cash we throw at you, sort out the freakin WIFI. And buy a proper coffee machine.

items.title: Zero customer service.
items.review_text: Train stood still for almost 2 hours (ok, that can happen). Got a voucher. Wanted to use it a few months later. Did NOT work. Contacted Eurostar, after three days still no answer. In the meantime, prices doubled for the train. NO service what so ever.

items.title: Diabolical customer service
items.review_text: Diabolical customer service - impossible to contact, never reply to messages. It's time they lost the contract and it went to an organisation that knows what customer care means.

items.title: Cancelled trains and left me stranded
items.review_text: Cancelled both my trains to get back from France to London the day before I needed to travel. Tried to call them and couldn’t get through after an hour of being on hold. Really traumatising being stranded in a foreign country with no way home, trying to book things last minute to get home. Totally unreliable and unreachable company.

items.title: Unreliable and unhelpful company
items.review_text: When it works, it's good. But when something goes wrong, you are on your own. Not sure why Eurostar don't have the same rules/compensation scheme as airlines when they cancel.  Forced to buy expensive flight home at very short notice with only promise of fate refunded (less booking fees!). Staff really don't care.

items.title: Absolute shambles
items.review_text: Absolute shambles, save your money and fly!

items.title: Brussels Eurostar is truly horrible
items.review_text: Brussels Eurostar is truly horrible.  Kings Cross not much better.  Just the check in is truly a shambles.  Trains dirty and overcrowded.  Lounge sucks with bad food and also limited drinks offering.  Hundreds of unfriendly staff standing around doing absolutely nothing.  Where is management of this company!?  Next time flight directly to Antwerp!!!!  No more.  I have suffered these crooks way too long.

items.title: I have accidentally deleted the email…
items.review_text:
I have accidentally deleted the email with my booking reference for a trip to Paris in May but I am having zero luck in getting through to Eurostar customer service! 

The chat system is a robot and doesn't recognize what my question is either. 

I am now going to have to go in person to St Pancras and get this sorted out, it's really unprofessional and frustrating that nobody is interested in responding.

items.title: VERY HARROWING EXPERIENCE WITH TRAINS…
items.review_text: VERY HARROWING EXPERIENCE WITH TRAINS TO AND FRO PARIS FOR MY PREGNANT WIFE AND I. FURTHERMORE, A REFUND/VOUCHER WAS PROMISED MORE THAN 6 MONTHS AGO. CUSTOMER SERVICES HAVE IGNORED MULTIPLE EMAILS.

items.title: dont pay extra for business class as…
items.review_text: dont pay extra for business class as you will almost certainly be sitting next to a noisy younger family with screaming children.   This is not business class it is privileged don't care about your fellow passengers class.   I get u have kids and want more but do u have to expel half the car to do it.

items.title: I travel on Eurostar Standard Premium…
items.review_text: I travel on Eurostar Standard Premium probably every 2 weeks minimum for work. While the staff on site is helpful, I have to say the service has gone so downhill the past 15 years and it is now unreliable from late trains, delays at every stage - train not ready, blocked outside tunnel- but most importantly the customer service over the phone is non existent and with a price increase of 30%, your wifi should be working . To the shareholders; Get your act together or sack the CEO.

items.title: Excellent service and support from Achata
items.review_text: Excellent service and special thanks to Customer Assistance Team member Achata who helped me from the moment she saw me in the queue until inside the train (I’m 7.5 months pregnant and was travelling with a toddler and heavy suitcase). Such great service from Eurostar and very grateful for the support from Achata who helped making my journey so smooth.

items.title: Raising prices AND cutting their meal costs
items.review_text: I paid for an expensive Standard Premier ticket on the 17.28 Rotterdam to London service (coach 14, seat 75) having worked all day and boarded expecting a meal. There was no choice - just a vegetarian option with soft cheese that I can't eat. The meal is served more than an hour in and the buffet had limited options left. In the past, a choice of two meals was always available. Having contacted customer service they confirmed this is now normal ("no complications") and offered nothing.

items.title: Sold our seat to someone else
items.review_text: We bought four tickets on a train from Paris and London and when we boarded the train someone was sitting in one of our seats. They held a valid ticket with the same seated number. So I had a heavy child sitting on my lap for 2.5 hrs which was incredibly difficult. It’s not all about the problem that occurred it’s how the customer service team have responded since then, refusing a refund for 1 ticket where they didn’t deliver the service we bought. It’s appalling. Be aware, if you book, you may have to stand!!

items.title: Denied child gluten-free meal and weren't bothered
items.review_text: I have to say the train journey itself from London to Paris and back was very comfortable, the staff were very friendly and it's an experience I would have liked to repeat. But sadly the poor accessibility to speak to Eurostar beforehand when I tried to arrange a gluten-free meal for my young son and the company's lack of empathy afterwards when I complained has put me off travelling with them again. Chloe from Eurostar tried to say I should have booked it earlier but when you are a new customer like I was, I found their website, app and contact-ability almost impossible. The end result was that my 12-year-old had to watch me and his mother eat while he had very little to eat. Not nice. Chloe pretty much said 'sorry but that's your fault for not booking it on our app' ... very cold reply. Sorry Eurostar, lovely smooth journey, nice onboard staff, but with admin staff like that I shall avoid Eurostar in future.

items.title: Hele fijne reis gehad naar Londen
items.review_text:
Hele fijne reis gehad naar Londen. Alles verliep netjes en op tijd. In de trein genoeg ruimte en een bar om wat drinken e.d. te halen. 

Personeel was erg vriendelijk en behulpzaam.
De wifi in de trein werkt niet heel goed, maar dat is het enige 'minpunt'. 

Tip: wees op tijd, in zowel Nederland als Londen moet je door 2 douanes en een bagage controle.

items.title: Load of rubbish they pick the phone…
items.review_text: Load of rubbish they pick the phone shameless service.

items.title: Prijswissel
items.review_text:
On February 20 last I booked 2 tickets to London. On my computer screen I saw 'lowest rate' 44 Euros. I was very surprised that when I paid the price per ticket was 54 Euro. I have to say that I find this a bit 'unfair practice'. 
After a telephone conversation with your services, I received the answer 'you paid with your credit card, so you agree.
I don't really understand the whole concept anymore lowest rate until a booking is made. Then give people at least a voucher for the amount of 20 Euros. But not that itself.

So I have made my decision Never book through the site of Eurostar on the internet again. 

I have another item that I want to report, namely The site says the following:

You can already request a discount of €12 for a next trip.

Until you try this, you get this as an answer:
This option is temporarily unavailable
Sorry, we'll be reintroducing this option soon.

When people want to reach you by phone, they have the choice between different languages, so I pressed 3 for Dutch and the lady started saying Sorry, but I only speak English.

Where has your service gone Eurostar??

This is the 1st time I experience such practices. Is this the result of the merger with Thalys? Then I think this is a very unfortunate thing.

A disgruntled customer.

items.title: It’s all about your staff
items.review_text: Can not recommend Eurostar enough but it’s not about the company it’s about the staff they employ. When it comes to customer service it’s the people who make or break your journey and in our case it was a member of staff called Alvin. He was just lovely and when he found out it was my birthday made it even more special. We expected one complimentary drink but Alvin when he found out it was my birthday kindly gave us another! Thank you so much Alvin you made my day! 😍🥂🙏

items.title: Appalling customer service
items.review_text:
Appalling customer service. No one answers the phone. 
Unable to change ticket like it says on their site.
No one to talk to.
I'm sure no one reads this.

items.title: Brutal
items.review_text: Brutal - avoid at all costs. Passport control slow. Seats in business are hard and uncomfortable… Thalys standard seats are much better

items.title: They confiscated my climbing axe contrary to their own Terms and Conditions
items.review_text: I was returning from winter walking in Austria yesterday. I took the 13.47 train from Amsterdam to London. I had equipment including an ice axe securely packed in my suitcase which I told them about in accordance with their rules. Despite this item being permitted (essential for what I'd been doing) it was confiscated. I asked the surly, functional security man "Why?" He said it wasn't permitted on Eurostar. I said it was and it was fine on the way out. Nope. I knew if I pushed it I would be taken aside so I asked if it could be put in the care of the guard. "No!" I asked if it could be given to someone who could use it and was told "No, it gets thrown away!" What a complete waste! How do I know these people don't just flog it off? It is theft because their own rules say it is ok. Searching the internet this has been a recurring problem and Eurostar have recently clarified their policy to confirm it's ok as long as you tell them, which I did. I only did this trip by train to be a bit greener but never again. It all looks good until you have an issue. Most reputable companies respond to Trustpilot posts but this is not the case with any of the (mostly terrible) reviews on here. I have asked for compensation and an apology but I doubt I'll get it. Perhaps someone needs to take them to court. As is typical with a monopoly they don't care. Why IS it a monopoly anyway? That's not what was envisaged originally. The train trip was ok but they have lost my future custom

items.title: Al about making money only
items.review_text: My self and friend decided to have day trip to Paris to do some girlie shopping all was going well until we checked in to our last train home and I had accidentally put in the wrong return date which was same day but month away ! We were sent to the desk in Paris and was told we would have to buy 2 new complete tickets at cost of nearly €400 we asked to see the mgr who did come but still said we would have to pay they did manage to get price down slightly and I understand it was my fault but we were so so angry when we got on the train after paying the fee as it was over half empty has put me off travelling with Eurostar in future just all about making money !!

items.title: Ridiculous Fare Increase
items.review_text: I love travelling by Eurostar, do it with work at least twice a month, spending over £10k a year in fares. Will be moving to the airlines now. Can no longer justify cost for this short journey. Business Premier that enables me to carry on working at the station and on the train has been increased from £245 each way, to £325. A 33% increase overnight. Out of touch with the reality of life right now, and naive. This increase won’t bring more revenue to Eurostar, it will push passengers to other modes of transport. It was already a VERY expensive way to travel, now it’s just silly.

items.title: NSI.
items.review_text: Ivm priveomstandigheden wilde ik de treinreis met Eurostar naar Londen voor juni 2023 annuleren. Bloed chagerijnige medewerkster aan de telefoon vertelde dat ik niet kon annuleren. Kan alleen als je het duurste ticket boekt. Kortom geld kwijt. Wat een service zeg!

items.title: Filthy Trains
items.review_text:
Trains were dirty both ways from Amsterdam to Paris. 
320.00 EURO return trip cost.
Nottttt Coolllll.

items.title: Eurostar train and hotel package fraud
items.review_text:
Fraud! I tried to book a train plus three night's hotel to Amsterdam. The booking went through, they took £876 only after taking my money did they say it's unavailable and they threw me out of the website and for some reason gave me a list of hotels in Paris.
Absolute criminal fraud.

items.title: Klantenservice reageert gewoon nooit
items.review_text: In Augustus een claim ingediend ivm geannuleerde trein, nog steeds geen respons.

items.title: i had ticket from london to brussel  a…
items.review_text:
i had ticket from london to brussel  a mum eith a baby and 2 lugages big and medium. i have been in a wrong couch and i have moved to the right one as informed and in the couch i was meant to be was fulled up with luggages. i was helped only to het in the train and there was the train manager Maureno who said pit those luggaesas and fold up your pram ehich is really huge and fulled up with luggages 
i said i cannot its really big and still do not have space for it
he said dont f*uck uo with me when im back i want to see those in place.
instead to help me or send his assistance to help, this was his answer. i said i cant do it !! he said at next stop i will remove you if u dont fold it
so i fold it and i put it where i find space next to emergency doors and guess what he came and said i will report you taking pictures only to the emergency doors that i blocked them but he didnt take pictures of the shelves that they were full with luggages. instead to helpcto love me in a emptier coach or to help me move the luggages to find place for them as i couldnt having a 10 months old baby. at next stop Lille in France he had police taking me out with a baby in a foreign country with luggages on me and helpless and no one cared. this was due to racism !!!!! no because of colour , because of country and that im not british! heard my bad english and just treated me so bad from beginning. there was no bad verbal from my part. they do have a really bad service and racism work staff which is unbelievable. especially im not a criminal and i have not touched or bad verbally no one.

items.title: Quasi Vol d'EUROSTAR d'un objet de valeur.
items.review_text:
Je situe les faits:
Lieu: Gare du midi, Bruxelles.
Booking reference: YFXKPT
Train: 9135
Hr.départ: 12h.56
Classe Standard.
Ticket n.: 295048227
Wagon 5, place 23

Voici ces faits incroyable:
Devant partir à Londres et y fêter avec joie le nouvel an avec ma femme et un couple d'amis, je me suis vu devoir comme tous les autres passé au crible aux rayons X (Check In).
Quelle ne fut pas ma stupeur de constater d'abord qu'ils fallait subir ces fouilles d'hyper sécurité comme pour s'engager dans un vol en avion.
C'est vrai que c'est mon épouse qui avait tout organisé et réglé, jamais, je ne l'aurais imaginé.
Etant technicien, j'ai toujours à ma ceinture une "pince-outils multi fonction Leatherman, je m'en sert plusieurs fois par jour.
Comme cet outil contient des lammes de couteau utilitaire, je me suis non seulement vu refusé pour le voyage mais tout simplement le voir jeter dans un bac destiné "officiellement" à être jeté dans un container.
Suis à mes protestations absolument non agressive, un membre de la sécurité me proposa gentillement d'attendre qu'une personne de mes conaissance vienne le chercher dans la demie-heure.
Après de nombreux coups de tél.et le temps passant, l'étau se reserrait et il devenait quasiment impossible de réaliser cette dernière planche de salut, la mise en place dans un coffre de sécurité de la gare étant aussi impossible, j'ai donc décidé d'abandonner et de rejoindre mes amis et ma femme dans le train.
En effet prendre une autre train m'aurait couté beaucoup plus cher et aurait complètement déstabilisé l'organisation du groupe.
Le Leatherman, lui était retourné dans son "bac à papiers".
Je suis bien conscient que je devais être au courant de ces contrôles, mais ce que je reproche, c'est qu'il n'y ai pas une solution pour mettre des outils de valeur dans une pochette numérotée pour pouvoir le reprendre au retour du séjour, comme cela s'est passé pour un ami proche coutellier-artisan qui a eu exactement le même cas et qui a pu accéder à cette procédure.
Je considère donc que ceci constitue un vol déguisé d'EUROSTAR et je demande le remboursement intégrale de cet outil soit 150€.
Guibert Dumont 0476882537

items.title: Eurostar has a new CEO.
items.review_text:
Eurostar has a new CEO.
I am trying to book to travel Friday to Monday any weekend the whole of Feb/March/April nothing under £200 each.
If you want to travel on a Wednesday in October you may get something cheaper
Also, Eurostars exchange policy. Within 7 days of travel is not fair plus you have to pay the difference if your preference to transfer is more.
I cancelled through Covid, only being able to travel late October 2022, the trip to Paris and back cost me over £400..
I am disabled, Eurostar do not recognise Disabled rail cards either..

items.title: No Customer Care
items.review_text: I booked a ticket Rotterdam - London for the 15th of June 2022. Train was cancelled by email by Thalys (first part to Brussels). Still no refund or proper answer from EUROSTAR to refund. Customer Care does not exist with EUROSTAR.

items.title: Still waiting for a full refund a month…
items.review_text:
Still waiting for a full refund a month after I opened a case with their customer services via Resolver.

They promised that my wife would receive a full refund over 3 weeks ago but said it could take up to 28 days!

She then received less than half of her out of pocket expenses and chaser emails have been ignored for 4 days now.

items.title: Travel package is a scam
items.review_text: Scam. Due to an unfortunate circumstance, I asked for the trip to be postponed by a month, and they simply wouldn't do it. They would not even consider our special circumstance. Please DO NOT in any circumstance book a travel+hotel deal. They are inflexible and will not return your money even under special circumstance.

items.title: Avoiding refunds for hugely late service. dreadful
items.review_text:
Booked 3 train tickets London to Belgium.
St Pancras was a mess and no trains were running but they did not tell us. They said there was a broken 'cantina' (apparently a wire) and that was it. Staff were rude and dismissive.
4 hours late. Apprently eligible to compensation but I have followed the steps, called, emailed, called, emailed a complaint and all I get is a huge silence. Did not supply a service and will not refund.
Absolute shark of a company

items.title: Ongelooflijk onduidelijk en onflexibel
items.review_text: Ik was 1.5 uur van te voren op het perron (15b) zoals aangegeven op het ticket maar zag niks. Geen poortjes oid. Ben toen in een koffietentje gaan werken (want op het perron zijn geen voorzieningen) en 20 min voor vertrek weer terug gegaan. Bleek helemaal aan het einde van het perron de paspoort controle te zijn waar ik niet meer door mocht (sluit 30 min van te voren). De trein was er nog niet eens. Ik was zeker niet de enige! Ongelooflijk onduidelijk en onflexibel!! Last minute een vliegticket moeten kopen want er gingen ook geen treinen meer vanwege staking. Ik en de planeet zijn jullie ondankbaar!!

items.title: Zero help after missing my train
items.review_text: I used Eurostar for a return trip from London to Amsterdam. I missed my train back (my own fault, got confused and waited on the wrong platform), but then Eurostar pretty much told me tough luck, cant help you, all next trains sold out, even though tickets still being sold on their website. Tough luck Eurostar, ill never forgive, never forget. Btw, Wifi is a lie, you will get to download 5 kilobytes every 10 minutes, no internet better than internet like that.

items.title: Horriblement cher
items.review_text:
Horriblement cher
Tarifs multipliés par 5
Honteux 
A fuir

items.title: Breathtakingly rude and unhelpful staff
items.review_text:
Over the years Eurostar has scoured the world to find and train some of the rudest, most unhelpful and most incompetent people in the service sector. They are quite literally the worst travel company I have encountered.

Today was a great example…

I arrived nearly two hours early for my train. It was early and GDN was nearly empty. I asked if I could change my ticket to travel on an earlier train. I was met with a blank stare and an angry ‘non’. I asked why and was told, I would be too late to board. I passed through customs in 10 mins. I asked again on the other side but the Eurostar staff member could not speak English or understand my French Accent and waved me away. I waited for around 40 mins while the earlier train boarded. It was nearly empty.

Next time I will fly….enough is enough.

items.title: Great service lovely staff
items.review_text:
I travelled, St Pancreas to Paris with a work colleague. I have a severely broken ankle, I had a boot on and crutches along with a large trolley case and some hand luggage.  I fully expected to limp all the way but was asked as soon as we got to the first bit of departures if I needed assistance, I didn't realise this was an option, I was treated amazingly, both in London and Paris
 and again on the return journey , with assistance all the way to my carriage.  I'd like to mention both Farah and Achata on the London to Paris journey who both treated me with kindness and were very patient.  First Class Service.  Thank you

items.title: Absolutely appalling customer service!
items.review_text:
Absolutely appalling customer service!
Their system does not work correctly and trying to liaise with their so-called customer service dept is impossible.
Very unprofessional!

items.title: Bestel direct bij eurostar ipv NS international
items.review_text: Na het falen van NS international om een staking te communiceren naar mij heeft eurostar het eigenhandig erg netjes opgelost door een upgrade naar de eerste klas te geven!

items.title: Disorganised nonsense
items.review_text: Last minute cancellation due to strikes elsewhere on UK rail. I received an email offering a voucher but the process is needlessly confusing and leads you in circles. I've tried contacting Eurostar but their contact form also leads you in circles. You click around only to end up where you started. Honestly, if I didn't know Eurostar are a legit company I would have sworn this was a complete scam. I would recommend getting the shuttle, a ferry or even swimming to France at this rate.

items.title: Une compagnie honteuse !
items.review_text:
Déplacement prévu du 31 décembre au 3 janvier 2023. J’ai du annuler pour problème de santé de mon conjoint. J’avais souscrit une assurance mais …. elle me demande une facture d’annulation que je ne peux fournir ! En effet Eurostar ne fournit pas ce document J’ai demandé une attestation de non embarquement >> silence radio ! 
SNCF connect eux se lavent les mains du problème ! Bref je peux m’asseoir sur mes deux billets À/R 
Cette compagnie est une vraie arnaque ! Et j’envisage un procedure d’ailleurs…
Plus jamais ça La prochaine fois ce sera l’avion !

items.title: Onvoorstelbare ervaring op Amsterdam CS
items.review_text:
Na zeer slechte informatievoorziening van Eurostar op Amsterdam centraal, werd ons toegang geweigerd tot het incheck kantoor aan het uiterste einde van platform 15b. Als gevolg de trein gemist en gedwongen diezelfde dag een vliegticket te boeken.
Zowel ticket van de heenreis alsmede de vliegticket worden NIET vergoed door Eurostar.

Koste wat kost mijden dit bedrijf!

items.title: worst train company ever
items.review_text: worst train company ever

items.title: Suite à une réservation sur votre site…
items.review_text:
Suite à une réservation sur votre site avec trajet et hotel compris ,et une annulation de cette société suite à des grèves, je n'ai été rembourser que de 670€ sur un voyage à 1045€ ,dégoûté, service de réclamation inexistant ou réponds pas ,18 appels sans réponses...je deconseil ce site et cette société qui n'a aucun respect des usagers...
A fuir......

items.title: Brought through third party as part of…
items.review_text:
Brought through third party as part of package. Eurostar cancelled train and offered voucher via email which we accepted and told third party this was the case. All parties where happy until Eurostar didn't fulfil promise and are now saying they cannot provide voucher and third party won't refund as Eurostar will not confirm voucher was not issued. Eurostar are refusing voucher or to liaise with third party to organise refund. So now have to go go through credit cards and small claims to get money back. It's not cheap and they just expect people to be down money because they can't organise themselves or speak to their booking partners.

I would have happily accepted voucher and spent more money traveling with them but now I just want the refund as they are an absolute joke of a company and will never use again.

items.title: Aller retour compliqué
items.review_text:
Aller Paris Londre du 26/12/2022 annulé pour cause de grève. Obligé de prendre l'avion.
Retour retardé et désorganisé pour cause de panne... placement libre ...... alors que les titres de transport d'origine sont numérotés..... le coût est élevé  pour un service nul.
Bienvenue chez Eurostar

items.title: Ik reis NOOIT meer met Eurostar
items.review_text: Ik reis NOOIT meer met Eurostar. Op het platform van R'dam sloten ze de glazen deuren recht voor mijn neus, terwijl ik 1 minuut voor sluitingstijd aankwam (foto gemaakt van de klok als bewijs). Zonder verder begrip of excuses werd mij de toegang ontzegd tot de incheckruimte, waar gewoon nog mensen bezig waren met de bagagecheck. Ik had de trein gemakkelijk kunnen halen. Hij stond zelfs naast me. Ik heb uit nood (voor € 440,-) het vliegtuig vanaf Schiphol moeten pakken om op tijd op mijn afspraak te zijn in Londen. Na mijn klacht willen ze mijn extra kosten niet vergoeden. Schande Eurostar!

items.title: Drive don’t travel by Eurostar
items.review_text: Travelled back from Disneyland Paris on the 14th. We were one of the lucky ones who managed to get on the train home. However I was witness to almost 300 people including children, toddlers, disabled people and the elderly that did not get on the train home. Thankfully we did not listen to the Eurostar staff telling people the train was delayed and we were to go back to the park and return at 4pm. If we had we would also have been left stranded in Paris. The staff were directing people to ‘go over there’ and not to a particular queue. There were 4 queues. 1 - arriving customers, 2 - people trying to drop off luggage, 3 - people trying to collect luggage and 4 - people trying to leave that had their luggage. Everyone was just joining any queue creating a mass issue and ultimately the reason so many people were left behind. The problem could have so easily been avoided by having competent staff directing people to the right queue and by starting check in early. For us boarding started at 16:15 and ended at 16:50. There was no physical way 400-500 people could have been checked in on time. They knew this and still allowed it to continue. Once the train left, the staff went home and got the remaining customers thrown out by the police into the freezing cold. No hotel, no means of getting home. Just ‘try getting to Paris and see if you can get home from there’. No money to do this. Eurostar you are a disgrace and I will never travel with you again and I will share my experience with anyone that will listen!!

items.title: Slechte organisatie
items.review_text: De veel te lange wachtrijen voor London zorgen ervoor dat mensen te laat op hun trein zitten. Ook reed de Eurostar 2 keer met vertraging zonder enige verklaring. Mensen moesten in Brussel en Londen een nieuwe aansluiting halen en dit lukte hierdoor niet. De vertraging liep op tot 20 minuten. Erg jammer dat dit zo moet gebeuren, want de Eurostar is geen goedkoop transportmiddel. En dan is toch het minste wat je kan verwachten dat het op tijd rijdt.

items.title: Thieves
items.review_text: Eurostar cancelled a booking , won't reimburse and won't reschedule !

items.title: Terrible company
items.review_text: I don't think I've had a problem-free trip with eurostar in the last 6-7 times I took it, between the delays (up to 5 hours on 2 occasions), the technical faults and the fact no staff member is ever aware of what is going on. Last July after a 1h30 delay waiting in the queue at gare du nord (then heading into an overcrowded waiting area with no ventilation on one of the hottest days of the year), we were told the train was going to take 4h to get to London just after it left (usually takes 2h), everyone rushed to the bar and they were out of food and drink quite quickly, terrible service.

items.title: Ik reis nu premier class
items.review_text: Ik reis nu premier class. Toilet heeft geen warm water en geen handdoeken om je handen af te drogen. Toilet is ook nog eens smerig. Eurostar: klanten komen op de eerste plaats!

items.title: Trip cancellation
items.review_text: What they are doing because of the strike is disgusting!!!!  The trip is canceled 1 week before departure...this would have been our family's Christmas present!!!!  Outrageous!!!!

items.title: Train to Paris was cancelled on Friday…
items.review_text: Train to Paris was cancelled on Friday at 5pm. Site doesn't work. App does not work. Never, I will use again! Never! I don't know what they strike for. To lose clients, to lose revenue, to lose the job.

items.title: YOU SHOULD BE ASHAMED OF YOURSELF
items.review_text: CANCELLING LAST MINUTE A LONG PLANNED TRIP ON THE 24TH OF DECEMBER BECAUSE OF THE DAMN STRIKE WHILE YOU DO NOT PROPOSE ANY REPLACEMENT SOLUTION AND ALL OTHER TRAINS ARE FULL. I MIGHT NOT BE ABLE TO SEE MY FAMILY FOR CHRISTMAS WHILE I HAVE NOT SEEN SOME SOME OF THEM FOR MANY MONTHS / YEARS. DOING THIS IS SO CYNICAL AND DISRESPECTFUL FOR YOUR CUSTOMERS. SHAME ON YOU!!!!!!

items.title: Cheers eurostar
items.review_text: Cheers eurostar.  Brussels on strike so spent a small fortune getting to terminal on time.  Then waiting and more waiting only to depart late 'due to slow boarding!!!!  Now we will miss our only connection in London to get home in the UK rail strikes

items.title: Reizen 16 december vanaf Amsterdam naar…
items.review_text: Reizen 16 december vanaf Amsterdam naar London . Incheck prima. Vervolgens denken we een kopje koffie te kunnen bestellen, maar helaas de bekers zijn op. Bij de vraag of er na Rotterdam de volgende halte deze dan aangevuld zullen worden krijgen we helaas wederom het antwoord dat we geen warme drankjes kunnen stellen. Staaltje dat de bekers geleverd worden is niet mijn taak.

items.title: Disappointing
items.review_text: The train was on time but there was nowhere to sitvat St Pancras, no coffee machine on the train and disgusting toilets with no toilet paoet.

items.title: Horrible
items.review_text: Je me demande vraiment pourquoi les billets sont aussi chers. 50€ si on les prend très très à l’avance, sinon ça peut être multiplié par 6. Et pour quoi ? Un service médiocre, les sièges ne sont pas confortables du tout et on est absolument à l’étroit. Insupportable quand on a quelqu’un qu’on ne connaît pas à côté de soi, on est beaucoup trop serré. De plus, la connexion wifi ne fonctionne absolument pas, ni à l’aller, ni au retour. Les trains sont toujours bondés mais c’est uniquement parce qu’il n’y a pas d’alternative similaire. Bref, à éviter. Me concernant, je prendrais l’avion la prochaine fois.

items.title: Je reserve un combo train et hotel mais…
items.review_text: Je reserve un combo train et hotel mais je ne recois aucune confirmation de l’hotel. A moi de me debrouiller pour que l’hotel me confirme ma reservation. Ils me demande de payer la chambre à l’arrivée sur place alors que j’ai deja tout payé en ligne. Je dois partir le 15 fevrier j’espere que cette histoire sera réglée. Je me suis méfiée suite à un mauvais commentaire et j’ai bien fait. Plus jamais je ne reserverai d’hotel via le site eurostar

items.title: Vermijd Eurostar als je kan.
items.review_text: Als je met vliegtuig kunt of de auto kunt zou ik dat aanraden! Ze beloven van alles na een annulering en op het einde krijg je niks ook al heb je schriftelijke bewijs! Face to face super vriendelijk en alles kan maar in het echt krijg je niks. Trein geannuleerd en dat hoor je pas als je op het station bent, geld terug wat ze beloven ook niet. Gratis om boeken, ook dat is een leugen. Het is echt verschrikkelijk.

items.title: Eurostar Premier Business
items.review_text:
I purchased a return Business Premier ticket London Amsterdam (approx 5 times more expensive than an airplane ticket with luggage). This is what to expect. 

1. Dirty seats. The staff had to clean it and in doing so dropped crumbs amd soap foam onto my breakfast tray. The utter unprofessionalism would have made me laugh in pity had it not been for the high price of the ticket. 

2. Free Wifi 🤣😅 Oh yes. Small detail is that the WiFi connection doesn't provide you with reliable internet access. For 80% of the trip it's impossible to work. Your own SIM card works far better. I am stopped in Brussels station at the moment  my SIM card picks up max 4G and the WiFi on the train takes about 60 seconds to load the Google page. All the investment they made into the service and they can't get WiFi properly engineered. I wonder, maybe it was a Belgian engineer. 

3. The blinds on the windows don't prevent the sun from coming in at all. Maybe because they want you to have some sun after being deep under the sea. Cute of them.
