- The departure lounge at RTM was small and windows wouldn’t open. No shops or cafes just one vending machine so make sure to buy all you need before you enter the Eurostar building (the ticket check counter)
- The seat itself is poorly padded (so my bottom and lower back started to get uncomfortable just past the hallway point to London)
- inflexible website: i wanted to change my departure point (from Rotterdam to Amsterdam) but the online booking portal wouldn’t do it. So i called and it took me over 45 min to reach an agent and I was told changing origin/destinations is not an option with them. Shame. Airlines excel on this point.

I’d travel with Eurostar again if given a chance so don’t listen too much to all the 1 star reviews. It really isnt THAT bad.

items.title: Impossible to book with Eurostar
items.review_text: To make an online booking, I must login. I’ve forgotten my password and chose the option to change it. The system tells me an email has been sent with link information to do this. No email has been sent. The ‘help chat’ is a bot which understands nothing. It is impossible to contact human help at Eurostar, since no-one answers. No doubt they are “working at home because of COVID”!

items.title: Awful
items.review_text: Awful - no signage or help at St Pancras and an angry member of staff shouts at you when you unwittingly get it wrong. Avoid if you can

items.title: No service on board to speak of
items.review_text: No service on board to speak of. Also terrible waiting area on France side. No options for shops or cafe. Just one big money making scheme

items.title: The worst customer service possible.
items.review_text:
The worst customer service possible.
The don't answer the phone, they don't reply to emails and they certainly don't refund any consequential loss due to their service cancellation. 
However, on the plus side I did not get abused or beaten.

items.title: Unprocessable entity on ticket changes
items.review_text:
I'm trying to change my tickets to Antwerp for a new day and I'm outside the seven day period when there is a fee but each time I try to save the changes it says 'Unprocessable entity'. I'm worried I will be forced inside the seven day period and charged 30 quid a ticket - which would be 120! Anyone else getting the same problem???

But hang on! I rang Eurostar today bang on at 0800, got through on the fifth ring to meet the fabulous Dawn who sorted it all out and moved the dates to April with no phone fee, no 30 quid charge and no additional fare charge. So I've changed the score from one star to five star - AND SOMEONE GIVE DAWN A BONUS!!!!

items.title: I took the Eurostar from Amsterdam to…
items.review_text:
I took the Eurostar from Amsterdam to London this evening. 

The check in queues were in open area and we were exposed to rain and bad weather for about 15 minutes till the queue moved closer to the check in area. Surely Eurostar operators could spend some money to have a canopy to protect the passengers from bad weather. 

The train was not very clean either. There was still some rubbish on the floors. 

Went to the kiosk in the train selling food and drinks. There was no beer available. Really?  The journey starts from Amsterdam and the company couldn't stock up the drinks. 

The WiFi connection was not available from Brussels onwards. 

The toilets have seen their better days.

I shall fly instead next time. Sitting with a face mask for 5 hours is not a pleasant experience either, though it is not Eurostar's fault.

items.title: Sweet and sour journey! Unprofessional staff member
items.review_text:
Staff member behavior really unprofessional. 

I traveled with Eurostar last week from Paris to London. The last minute, my friend had an emergency and couldn't make it. I ended it up having 2 seats booked, as it was too late to cancel. 
I have then decided to leave my coat and my bag on the empty one and travel comfortable. A lady from the staff came to me and asked to remove my belongings from the other seat as someone else could take it, I showed her my ticket, a clear reservation for 2 people, but she insisted that it could have been used by someone else, I politely disagreed explaining that it was paid by me, so it was not free for someone else to use, she then left saying that it was ok. 
One minute later, a lady asked me to remove my stuff to allow her to sit down there, I didn't want to argue again so I just took my coat off the seat, but I then asked her the reason why she was seating in there, wondering if that space was maybe mistakenly double booked. She smiled and said the staff member sent her to seat in there, I was under the impression that they were friends! OK this is only my impression, but at the end of the trip the lady went to thank the staff member, who knows why, maybe for the free dinner?! 

I  think this behaviour is very unprofessional!

A part from this, the journey was very pleasant, the train is very comfortable and fast.  I would definitely recommend Eurostar and I hope to travel again with them soon, hoping I won't come across the wrong staff member again.

items.title: Een samenvatting: waarom reizen met Eurostar kansloos is.
items.review_text:
ALLE reviews die u hier leest, komen volledig overeen met hoe reizen met Eurostar vandaag de dag is. 

Bijvoorbeeld, de klantenservice is inderdaad compleet onbereikbaar. Iemand heeft de moeite genomen om nog even in te spreken dat het door de COVID drukker is dan normaal en daarna hebben ze het licht uit gedaan op de afdeling. We wilden herhaaldeijk een ticket laten wijzigen, maar dat is niet gelukt door die onbereikbaarheid van de klantenservice. Gek is dat telkens ook de verbindingen worden verbroken, er wordt gemeld dat er niemand in de gekozen taal beschikbaar is of na enige tijd in de wacht, alsnog de lijn stopt. En doe vooral geen moeite om per mail contact te zoeken. Want de “beloofde” 7 dagen, zijn as we speak al 32 dagen geleden verstreken. 

De procedures aan de grens zijn een giftige cocktail van 2 factoren. Factor 1 is een monopolistisch bedrijf dat zonder enige concurrentie zijn functies uitoefent. Niemand is dus geïnteresseerd in het soepel afwikkelen van het inchecken. Typerend is de chaotische situatie van het inchecken op Londen. Alsof ze het elke keer voor het eerst doen. We hebben ons zeer verbaasd op 24 oktober. Rijen door elkaar. Schreeuwende staff en routes die elke 10 seconden met trekkoorden gewijzigd worden. Een Indiaas vliegveld is overzichtelijker. 

Factor 2 is de complete desinteresse van beide grenssystemen van Groot Brittannië en de EU om de paspoortcontrole goed te regelen. 2 douaniers op 2 volle treinen. Alles straalt hier uit dat beide grootmachten hun uiterste best doen om zo min mogelijk energie te steken in de paspoortcontrole, omdat de ander vooral niet de indruk moet krijgen belangrijk te zijn. Dat dit politieke spel gespeeld wordt over de rug van de reiziger, is niet alleen triest, maar ook typerend voor hoe dom het is als je elkaar als grootmacht de rug toekeert. Het lijkt wel alsof we weer 50 jaar teruggeworpen zijn in de tijd. 

En tot slot de reis zelf. Het idee dat de iets langere treinreis wordt gecompenseerd door het niet-hoeven-wachten op vliegvelden is een fabel. Alleen de nachtferry duurt vandaag de dag langer dan reizen met Eurostar tussen Londen en Rotterdam. Voorbeeld: wie op zondag om 11:04 de Eurostar uit Londen neemt, moet volgens Eurostar al om 9u op het station zijn. En is pas om 16u:30u in Rotterdam. In die tijd kan je met het vliegtuig ver voorbij de evenaar zijn, incluus check-in. Waar zit die lange reistijd nog meer in? In verborgen buffer-tijd in de dienstregeling. Omdat België qua spoor ook nog in de 19e eeuw zit en omdat elk land de Eurostar liever achteraan laat aansluiten (eigen trein eerst, al is het een stoptrein), rijdt de trein bijna nergens op topsnelheid, als’ie op tijd is. Sterker nog; in bijvoorbeeld Brussel sta je nog dik een half uur stil. Is de Eurostar eenmaal een paar minuten vertraagd? Dan heb je pech en voeg je overal achteraan in. Achter de autotrein in de Kanaaltunnel, achter de TER van Calais naar Frethun, achter de L-trein naar Mechelen en achter de sprinter naar Lombardijen. 

Is er dan niets positief? Jawel. De Britse omroepers zijn altijd en overal duidelijk hoorbaar en zoals Britten betaamt, is alles “please” en “excuse me”. Dus aan beleefdheid gelukkig geen gebrek. 

Mensen, duurzaam en snel reizen is mijlen ver weg. Alle goede intenties ten spijt; het was een leuk streven. Maar het blijkt kansloos onhaalbare hobby die genadeloos de nek wordt omgedraaid door gemakzucht, arrogantie, winstbejag en desinteresse. Maar ze hebben het gelukkig wel geprobeerd.

items.title: Klantenservice onbereikbaar
items.review_text:
Mijn boeking ging fout maar het geld werd wel afgeschreven. Probeer nu al twee weken contact met de klantenservice op te nemen, maar ze zijn telefonisch onbereikbaar en reageren niet op e-mails. Het gaat om een behoorlijk bedrag dat ik eigenlijk niet kan missen. Ik heb nog nooit zo'n slecht bereikbare klantenservice meegemaakt.

UPDATE: we zijn inmiddels 26 dagen verder. Ze reageren alleen op openbare tweets, vragen je vervolgens te reageren in een DM en negeren je vervolgens daar. DRAMA

UPDATE 2: Na meerdere tweets en DMS heeft er iemand 'de manager' aan de jas getrokken en die heeft ene Ria op de case gezet. Dan verwacht je dat als de manager Ria op de zaak zet, Ria wel weet hoe je dit moet oplossen. Helaas blijkt Ria niet zo goed te kunnen lezen, alles door elkaar te halen en wanneer je alle informatie nog eens stuurt je weer een week te negeren. Ik wacht nu al 41 dagen en hoop nog steeds op een goede afloop.

items.title: Eurostar - Booking Ref: 6MG 2HH - seem to not have any telephones!
items.review_text: Eurostar. Amazingly shoddy service when my girlfriend having made a mistake in booking - cannot reach them by phone at all. They don't even have a waiting system in place. Obviously cannot be bothered and wish you would go onto their website instead. I cannot resolve the issue via their site.  We live in London - so thought I should go to their ticket office in St. Pancras, as people might do - but the cowards say it is shut due to the stupid pandemic. I will fly instead next time. Please avoid Eurostar.

items.title: Folding Bikes
items.review_text: On Tuesday 12th October 2021 at 7am myself and a friend were refused entry to the Eurostar service from Paris to London because our folding Brompton bikes were not in a bag. Luckily there was an American ticket inspector (Damian) who took a sympathetic approach and called for a senior manger to give us discretionary approval to board, as the train was only about one quarter full. Thank you Damian. You were our saviour!

items.title: booking KPJGGC london to brussels
items.review_text: DO NOT risk your money booking with this cowboy outfit. Only their payment system works. They take your money immediately and then do not answer calls, their emails and their website does not allow you to amend your booking when it says you can and the online support states ' we are still learning!!!'  I  have been trying for 3 days to contact them about a booking i made a week ago with no success at all . None of the ways they suggest on their website work . Its a classic sign of a business that takes all the money it can and then goes bankrupt and closes down overnight, letting all  its customers down . I repeat - DO NOT risk your money booking with this outfit. No business survives long providing such an apalling service!!

items.title: Had to change itinerary on eurostar due…
items.review_text: Had to change itinerary on eurostar due to changing covid regulations. Tickets were booked after July 1, 2020 and hence fully changeable. Eurostar still charged us over 110 euros each for the change doubling the price of the tickets. Will not travel with them again nor encourage a company with such poor integrity.

items.title: Eurostar = voleur
items.review_text: Eurostar = voleur ! Inadmissible de ne pas rembourser les personnes ne pouvant pas replannifier leur voyage au regard des condition d'accès imposées !!!! Payer des tests obligatoires à J2 revient plus cher à 4 que le voyage lui même !!! C est honteux ! Du pur chantage,  eurostar s en met plein les poches sur le dos de personnes qui bossent pour s'offrir un voyage ! Et le pire c est qu'ils ont fait pleurer tout le monde car au bord de la faillite pendant la crise ! Écœurant !

items.title: We booked for Disneyland Paris back in…
items.review_text:
We booked for Disneyland Paris back in August for a weekend in October. Booked everything separately as it worked out cheaper. With Eurostar we booked directly as it obviously goes straight into DLP, which was perfect.

Until a month later after booking I get an email from Eurostar to say our direct train had been cancelled, and we now had to get there using the RER.
I have basically paid £300+ for a direct service I am not getting, paid more for direct so we didn't have the hassle of changing trains. NOWHERE have I been offered a reduced price. They seem to think that the fact they have covered the €7.60 per adult is enough to justify it. I don't think so as I am not getting the service I paid for.

Not only that, my out going time is now 10 minutes later, and our return time an hour earlier. So, now thanks to having to mess about with changing trains, we now loose time in the parks (they are not cheap either) Also, because of the return train home, we have to leave even EARLIER due to it being a Sunday and the journey time doubles back to Paris.

This is the first time I have ever booked with Eurostar, and I am honestly so put off with ever booking with them again. Customer service is non existent, and their answer is to just cancel. I can't cancel as I have literally paid out for the hotel & park so I will loose money. They do not care in the slightest.

Next time I will just fly, and save myself the agro of using such an arrogant service.

items.title: Totale Blamage reizen met Eurostar
items.review_text:
Totale Blamage reizen met Eurostar! 

Wat belachelijk het inchecken bij Eurostar. Op de bevestingsmail is aangegeven dat je tussen de 90-30 minuten van te voren aanwezig moet zijn, zodat de checks soepel verlopen vanwege Brexit en corona. Nou ik was daar dus 30 minuten van te voren, om vervolgens te horen dat de checks dicht zijn en je niet mee kan gaan met de trein. Want blijkbaar staat de douane daar om je koffer te checken, en je paspoort en al je corona documenten. Alsof je op het vliegveld staat. Dat was totale nieuws voor mij?! In de mails en op de website staat er helemaal niks hierover over. En ook niks vermeld dat als je niet 30 minuten van te voren aanwezig bent je mooi kan fluiten naar je reis. De bewaking kan slechts zielig met je meekijken hoe je 30 minuten achter een glas staat te smeken of je binnen mag komen, terwijl de trein het station komt inrijden. Je kan de trein letterlijk aanraken, maar niet toegelaten worden in de trein.  Daar gaat dan je ticket van €133,- heen! 
De volgende trein vertrekt pas de volgende dag of je kan naar Brussel gaan, maar dan moet je wel €250 euro extra bij betalen! Wat een onzin! Als Eurostar je zo slecht informeert over de procedure op het perron! Daar stond ik dan met 10 andere reizigers, zonder enige opties om nog die avond in Londen te komen. De volgende dag als enige optie, maar met een retourticket voor de dag erna. Dus kon ik slechts 1 nacht in Londen zijn om de volgende ochtend de trein weer naar huis te pakken. Er waren geen opties, omboeken was de enige mogelijkheid. Maar met deze last-minute prijzen, van 200- 400 euro, totaal onmogelijk om weer thuis te komen. Ik vind het rond uit belachelijk dat de procedures, de douane en check-ins niet duidelijk zijn benoemd op de site en op de bevestigingsmails. Je wordt alleen maar plat gegooid met corona info wat je allemaal moet doen, maar dit vergeten ze voor het gemak even te melden. Ik ga nooit meer met Eurostar reizen.

items.title: The Eurostar experience
items.review_text: The Eurostar experience: Book Paris for two July 2021, trains get cancelled due to COVID, e-vouchers sent (that expire 31 Dec 2021). Rebook Paris for two Nov 2021; when applying e-voucher at checkout, error code says, ‘Sorry we can’t complete your checkout’ and provides phone number. Eurostar offices closed over weekend so send email, get auto response. Try first thing Monday morning. Sit on hold 1 hr 25 min before I have to go. Try again, on hold 45 min, phone connects, person on other line disconnects. Go through entire directory of options - each one disconnecting except finally, one for disability. After 45 min, agent named Linda picks up, stops me after five words, says if it’s not about disability, she can’t help and without listening to my query, promptly reroutes me back into queue, where I sit for another 25 min before I have to go. Finally decide to book Paris for two using credit card (will deal with e-voucher later). At checkout, error code says, ‘Sorry we cant complete your checkout’ with same number listed. Try another credit card. Same deal. Partner tries to log in, clicks ‘forgot password,’ sitting waiting for password reset email to come through, still waiting.

items.title: My wife suffered a stroke several…
items.review_text:
My wife suffered a stroke several months ago and we decided to visit our second home in the South of France.I contacted your Special Assistance number.The professional and friendly service was exceptional.There was a staff member at each station,St Pancras,Lille,and Avignon waiting for us with a wheelchair.The service was of the same quality for the return.I would like you to pass on our gratitude to all staff involved.
Thanks again

items.title: Je déconseille vraiment Eurostar pour…
items.review_text: Je déconseille vraiment Eurostar pour partir à Londres ce sont des gens avec de très très mauvaise information ils m’ont dit que je pouvais voyager en temps qu’étudiant mais le policier de la douane ne m’a pas laissé passer il m’a dit que Eurostar n’avait pas les compétences pour décider du passage avant de voyager avec eux veuillez aller à l’ambassade du pays car vous allez avoir une mauvaise surprise

items.title: Wat een afschuwelijk bedrijf is…
items.review_text: Wat een afschuwelijk bedrijf is Eurostar. Ik had een weekend pakketreis geboekt en zag pas daarna wat het betekende op dag 2 een test te moeten doen. Omdat dat een offiele pcr test moet zijn is het niet mogelijk over de uitslag te beschikken voor vertrek. Aangezien mijn tickets vanwege het pakketaspect niet te annuleren zijn hoopte ik op overleg om te bespreken of er toch niet iets te regelen is, wellicht een voucher. Net als de anderen heb ik de ervaring dat het onmogelijk is telefonisch in contact te komen met Eurostar en ook op emails reageren  ze domweg niet. Ook niet op een aangetekende brief. Nog nooit zoiets meegemaakt. Nooit meer Eurostar, 800 euro lichter!

items.title: Ik wil mijn online geboekte reis cancelen
items.review_text:
Ik wil mijn online geboekte reis vanwege omstandigheden cancelen. Als ik dit online wil regelen krijg ik de melding dat ik dit bij mijn agent moet regelen....... deze bestaat helemaal niet. 
2x geprobeerd te bellen en na 2x 1 uur in de wacht te hebben gestaan werd de verbinding vaag Eurostar verbroken. Nu inmiddels 2x mail gestuurd naar Eurostar maar krijg geen reactie.  Waardeloos bedrijf

items.title: Booking ref: NK7Z6J
items.review_text:
It was my first time booking a ticket from Eurostar after lockdown and I must say it's awful service. 
I booked a ticket yesterday and then I found the travel conditions on the website, so I'm actually not eligible to travel. Why they sale tickets when they're aware of new changes which we don't as customers. 
Eurostar didn't even reply to my email. 
Very disappointed from a very poor service

items.title: They do not respond to the request for reimbursement due to the pandemic…
items.review_text:
I bought train tickets from Paris to London in 2019, long before the pandemic. Due to the Pandemic I was instructed to generate an evoucher for later use. After having already changed my trip once, even paying the difference in fare, and the British government maintains the restrictions for Brazilian travelers, I tried to cancel my trip and receive a refund of the amounts paid.
unfortunately, I was not able to make this refund online, nor did I receive any feedback from two communications I made on the company's website.

items.title: Oversized Luggage
items.review_text:
I think it is ridiculous that you are claiming that Covid is stopping you from bringing oversized luggage on the train and then you charge 100+ to get the delivery! Not to mention that the delivery window is anytime between 9-5, impacting any break and is completely unfeasible.

This means I will reluctantly be looking to fly from now on. This is a real disappointment as taking the train is by far my preferred option

Will

items.title: 350 euros de perdus...
items.review_text:
350 euros de perdus. Comme beaucoup de clients, nous avons fait la très mauvaise expérience de voir notre réservation annulée à cause du covid. 
Eurostar refuse de rembourser et propose des bons d'achats sauf que l'on ne peut replanifier nos vacances.

items.title: Afrader om te reizen met Eurostar!!
items.review_text:
Zojuist geprobeerd telefonisch contact te krijgen met Eurostar, via telefoon niet te bereiken). - Ook is er momenteel geen Nederlandse agent aanwezig dus toen maar voor Engels gekozen. Na 45 minuten in de wachtrij nog steeds geen gehoor. 

Probleem is: Ruim een week voordat mijn reis was gepland had ik een E-voucher gevraagd, gezien het Verenigd Koninkrijk nog op rood staat om te reizen en ik mijn reis dus wilde om boeken. Doordat er nu veel veranderd tijdens COVID wat betreft maatregelen, wilde ik op een later moment besluiten wanneer het geschikt is om te gaan. Helaas is het nooit tot een E-voucher gekomen, gezien ik vandaag op mijn account mijn reis weer zie staan. Nu krijg ik alleen nog de optie om het om te boeken, gezien de reis over 2 dagen gepland staat. Het erge is, dit had ik dus al op tijd ingediend zodat ik nog een E-voucher kon krijgen! 

Geprobeerd om via mail en telefonisch contact te krijgen, maar helaas zijn ze gewoon niet te bereiken. Nog nooit meegemaakt dit bij een reisorganisatie. 

Hele grote afrader!

items.title: Impossible de les avoir par téléphone…
items.review_text:
Impossible de les avoir par téléphone pour changer mon billet après les avoir appeler plusieurs jours de suite et ensuite ils me disent que j'ai passé la date.
Franchement ils ne sont pas du tout commercial surtout que je demandais juste la possibilité de partir plus tard
je suis très déçu de ce service client qui n'en est pas un.

items.title: I’m only writing about the WiFi… it’s…
items.review_text:
I’m only writing about the WiFi… it’s 2021. People use your service for business travel, and we’re not 30,000 ft in the air. 

Worst train WiFi I’ve ever experienced. Really impacted how much work I got done. Do NOT use Eurostar if you have to work.

items.title: No WiFi, why?
items.review_text:
This review is just a message to eurostar about their WiFi. Outside of this, the train is actually a relatively good service.

The WiFi: I've been on eurostar many many times, over the last years and never has the WiFi worked. Not on my many phones, not on my laptops. Why is it so hard to arrange WiFi on the train? All trains in Netherlands have WiFi, even most busses in Netherlands have WiFi! An international and relatively expensive service like eurostar should offer proper WiFi! You need to be able to work on such long trips, otherwise business people will remain using airplanes. Mobile network doesn't always cover you during the trip, and is often disrupted. Please, eurostar, pull yourself together and get this sorted. It's 2021 and not having WiFi is unacceptable. Get it done.

items.title: Avoid Eurostar Allianz insurance
items.review_text:
The insurance with Allianz that Eurostar offers for "cancellation" is useless, avoid it, it's applicable only in case of natural disaster or other extreme situations.
Of course when you call Eurostar to cancel your ticket they won't tell you that... they just tell you to call Allianz, and after you wait for 45 minutes on Allianz phone line, they will tell you that the insurance applies only to very specific and extreme circumstances (for example, strikes are not covered)

items.title: They do not reimburse any tickets
items.review_text: They do not reimburse tickets, the railway often has issues. Exchange conditions are quite outrageous, charging 30€ regardless of the ticket price.... It's a monopoly, and like all monopolies, they behave as though they can bully the client as they fancy. Do take the ferry.

items.title: I was sold a ticket for a non-existing…
items.review_text: I was sold a ticket for a non-existing train from Rotterdam to London on 3 September 2021. When I arrived at the station, I was told that the train departed one hour earlier than the hour stated in the Eurostar app and on my ticket. They rebooked me on the following day, but I have to do another departure covid test and day 2 test in London. I have been trying to contact the customer service for over 2 hours... How frustrating...

items.title: No more service at Eurostar - next time I will fly !
items.review_text:
It is complicated enough to travel nowadays but receiving bad services from the staff on top of that is very disappointing.
I will fly next time despite being carte blanche for years !
From the check-in where all passengers are treated like cattle, the ticket control where the staff is completely disengaged, up to the lounge where they are difficult and unreasonable while having no one to look after. 
Next time, I will definitely fly instead as Eurostar is not what it used to be

items.title: 25 minutes wait for nothing, then 38 minutes wait and fixed
items.review_text:
I waited for 25 minutes to cancel a travel insurance policy - someone finally picked up -> I was half way through explaining what I was calling about when they hung up on me.

I called again and waited for 38 minutes on hold before someone picked up - this time the operator was very nice and helpful - resolved my issue this time.

items.title: Absolutely diabolical service.
items.review_text:
Absolutely diabolical service.

Tried calling twice today and waited over an HOUR both times before giving up. Absolute utter total pathetic excuse for a company. The 'complaints' number puts you through to the same line which is not answering!! No response to emails and no response to the Press Office line. This is way beyond acceptable. If you can believe it they now want US THE TAXPAYER to subsidise them for millions of pounds again - for this utterly crap 'service'. You could not make it up!!!
Getting Easy Jet.

items.title: An easy way to travel to Paris
items.review_text:
An easy way to travel to Paris
I traveled a few times without any problems

items.title: HORRIBLE !!!!
items.review_text: HORRIBLE !!!!! Comme plein de personnes nous avons une réservation de 500€ qui n'a pu aboutir à cause du covid et eurostar ne fait rien !!!! nous partirons c'est sûr à Londres mais en avion cette fois! peut être plus cher mais plus honnête !!! Honte à eux mais ils s'en fichent !!!!

items.title: The WORST experience of my life
items.review_text:
The WORST experience of my life. They give you no information ahead of time about COVID restriction changes to the UK. The representatives from Eurostar made me miss my train saying that I needed to first pay for the UK vaccines from their government. It took 2 hours to complete the online process and 400 pounds!! So once I did that the Eurostar agent confirmed that me and my fiancé were going to be able to board the train. Then once we get past the French police, we then get past the UK police and finally ONE MORE station to get to (mind you this was taking the 5pm train and waiting 4 hours past our original try at this) the UK border agent tells us that we are not allowed in the UK because although we are American we can’t come in through France. He threw my Covid vaccine cards and negative test results at me and called another agent to a hold cell where we waited two more hours (missing the next bus) and then finally we were escorted BACK to the French side of the station and told we were out of luck. 


After explaining all this to the Eurostar agent she told me that the tickets were “unrefundable” and didn’t seem to care much about my situation. Honestly, the WORST experience and now I despise the UK and vow never to take the Eurostar ever. This company only cares about your money. They dont value you as a customer.

The most they will do is give you another date to travel which does me no good since I will never go back to Europe after this horrible treatment.

items.title: NO REFUND FOR COVID
items.review_text: NO REFUND FOR UNEXPECTED CIRCUMSTANCES!!! I Have booked a ticket for Amsterdam. Unfortunately due to the government guidelines in Netherlands I cannot travel, I tried to get a refund and the lady rudely said to me "You should have known the risk of booking a ticket during an ongoing pandemic" I was so shocked on the lack of customer service. I feel like I have been punished for using their service. Long story short I never received a refund.

items.title: I would like to thank Sam and Lyndsey…
items.review_text:
I would like to thank Sam and Lyndsey who have been amazing .they were very professional and helpful. They could provide assistance to my 81 year old dad within 5mn.they got him a wheelchair and showed high positive attitude. Well done ladies and thanks once more. 
Y.klock

items.title: NOOIT EUROSTAR NEMEN!!!
items.review_text: Ik wou de trein amsterdam london nemen, eenmaal op centraal station amsterdam werken de codes niet terwijl alles gewoon goed is (ik was niet de enige waarbij dit gebeurde) klantenservice is non-existent en alles was zeer onduidelijk, heb 2x de eurostar gemist door deze onzin met codes enzo die niet werken, bespaar jezelf de moeite en neem dat vliegtuig maar, nooit met de eurostar rijzen behalve als je van je geld wilt worden beroofd want je krijgt je geld niet terug

items.title: Compensation was received for a delayed…
items.review_text:
Compensation was received for a delayed train, which was under the value I was expecting, according to what was stated in terms and conditions. 
An email from them says 'I hope that helps but if there’s anything else I can do, please do get in touch'...........

..........I have tried to call so many times to discuss this query but each time I am waiting more than an hour on the phone. I sent an email via the contact page which says someone will aim to get back within 7days. 13 days later and no reply. I understand there are delays 'because of covid', but if that is the case then they need to be changing their holding emails to reflect this. 

Having spoken to one of their customer service team just now, they say the compensation refund is lower than what I was expecting as the cost of that return travel leg was (conveniently) very cheap. 
No where does it state the individual leg/ticket prices on my invoice, so as far as I am concerned this figure could be plucked out of the air to save them money.

If you're not going to be transparent on your invoices, then be fair and refund based on an assumed ticket price being 50/50 of the total return cost. 

My case has been left open for one of their team members to review further- will update with the outcome.

items.title: Allerbeste klantenservice
items.review_text: Tijdens mijn reis vanuit Londen naar Brussel vergat ik een zak in het bagagerek, de crew in Brussel-zuid was ongelofelijk behulpzaam en deden er alles aan dat ik deze (dezelfde dag nog!!!) terug in mijn bezit had. Beste klantenservice OOIT!!!!! Super efficiënt, vriendelijk en betrokken.

items.title: DISCRIMINATION FROM POLICE
items.review_text:
It was my first time to take the Eurostar so I was hurry to arrive in the station for all check in I needed it  to drink coffee but the coffee shop was closed. I was waiting for my train and a few minutes later they sent a police to check me again I don't why they did like that because I was black they look me like suspect. WHY I COMPLAINED BECAUSE THERE IS AN ASIAN YOUNG GIRL DOING A VIDEO CALL IN FRONT EVERYONE NO POLICE CAME TO CHECK. I FELT LIKE DISCRIMINATE.
THIS POLICE MAN TREATED ME LIKE ILLEGAL. 
THE STAFF ( Eurostar) INSIDE AND OUTSIDE THE STATION WAS VERY FRIENDLY. ONLY THE POLICE MAN MAKE MY JOURNEY UNCOMFORTABLE.

items.title: Een reis alternatief verpest door de waardeloze service van de NS/Eurostar
items.review_text:
Het leek ons leuk om een keer met de trein naar London te gaan i.p.v. vliegen. Door de corona pandemie en de regels in de UK was het niet mogelijk om te reizen. Na een keer verschuiven met de datum, nieuwe tickets (waarbij er wel bijbetaald moest worden, want duurdere tickets). Nu er weer een verschuiving nodig is, is het niet mogelijk om 1 van de 3 tickets te annuleren of zelfs los te koppelen van de andere 2. Om persoonlijke redenen is het 3e ticket nu na al die tijd niet meer nodig. Het geld hiervan is niet terug te krijgen, maar het is ook niet mogelijk deze los te koppelen van de andere 2 waardoor er dus alleen een voucher van 3e tickets gegeven wil worden. Ook moeten we zelf de voucher maar gaan regelen bij Eurostar, dit terwijl we de tickets besteld hebben bij de NS.

Het komt er dus op neer dat we 300euro gespendeerd hebben voor vouchers welke we nooit kunnen en zullen gaan gebruiken, of in ieder geval 100euro verlies als we wel binnen de voucher termijn gaan reizen omdat het 3e ticket verloren is.

Mijn advies: Reis nooit, maar dan ook nooit met de NS naar London. Stap over de schaamte en stap in het vliegtuig. Dat is goedkoper, sneller en levert minder stress op

items.title: Being able to reschedule a trip is extremely helpful!
items.review_text: I am so happy that it is possible to change departure / return dates so easily. Thank you, thank you, thank you! This month it will be my 3rd attempt to apply for French Schengen Visa. The previous two failed miserably because things changed between the dates I applied and my appointment dates. So being able to amend at least train tickets at no cost is golden!

items.title: Impossible de revoir mes 500€ de…
items.review_text: Impossible de revoir mes 500€ de billets pour un aller retour en Angleterre... La situation devait changer le 1er Juillet elle n'a finalement pas changé je ne dois pas en tant que citoyen français avoir à payer pour les décisions d'un pays voisin.

items.title: Wat een goed alternatief zou zijn voor vliegen verpest door slechte service
items.review_text:
Ik heb in 2019 voor het eerst gebruik gemaakt van de Eurostar en vond dit allemaal heel goed en fijn gaan. Ik houd niet zo van vliegen, wil ook milieubewuster bezig zijn met reizen en dit kwam goed uit omdat je van het midden van de ene stad uitkomt in het midden van een andere stad.

Alle slechte reviews over Eurostar in coronatijd zijn waar. Ik heb echt geen probleem met vouchers (ondanks ik het gigantisch storend vond hoe moeilijk er werd gedaan over geld terug krijgen, er wordt gezegd dat dit niet kan, volgens mij mag dit helemaal niet), maar als deze dan niet verlengd kunnen worden naar een tijd die uitkomt zonder enige andere opties naast je geld gewoon verliezen, ben ik er een beetje klaar mee. Contact maken duurt gigantisch lang en is telefonisch bijna onmogelijk. Het zou toch niet zo moeilijk zijn om de duur van een voucher te verlengen?

Ik had graag met de trein gereisd en het zou perfect uitkomen voor het bezoeken van een festival in de buurt van London, maar hoe er met klanten om wordt gegaan vind ik belachelijk. 

In conclusie: Vooral heel erg teleurstellend.

items.title: Now I have had enough
items.review_text: Was refused boarding from Amsterdam to Brussels because I should have checked in 1 hour in advance. This was neither listed on ticket nor notified in any way. Furthermore: 1) app is very buggy and often crashes during booking, 2) frequent travel programme does not work on many trips, 3) Corona refund policy has been very restrictive, often not working properly via website, and staying far behind competitors, 4) communications are often misdirected, e.g. I received an email “Since you are soon traveling to the UK …” whereas I traveled from Amsterdam to Brussels. I have had it and am scrapping Eurostar from my preferred travel options. The only good thing about Eurostar: their on-board staff is very friendly and helpful. This review was written before the merger with Thalys

items.title: Eurostar is a horrible business
items.review_text: Eurostar is a horrible business. They are non flexible and refuse to give people refunds for tickets even though they can not travel due to GOVERNMENT RESTRICTIONS. They should be shut down. Avoid them at all costs.

items.title: GEEN ster waard
items.review_text: Ik lees hieronder alleen maar ellendige verhalen over de afhandeling van Corona vouchers. Ik sluit me hierbij aan en heb hier geen positief woord voor over. Na maanden vechten heb ik wel de vouchers ontvangen, maar nu reizen voor einde geldigheid niet gaat lukken kan je je geld wel vaarwel zeggen en geven ze niet thuis. Het gaat wel hier om aardige bedragen. Schandalig dat ze zo misbruik maken van de situatie waar we allemaal in zitten en hun winst op deze manier pakken.

items.title: No refund. Booking made in 2019 and rolled over via voucher. Still cant travel. :(
items.review_text: No refund. Booked our tickets in 2019 (before covid). Had an email cancelling our holiday from eurocamp for June 2021. Full refund given by eurocamp as we have been told we can not travel. Eurostar will not refund. Only option is a voucher valid upto Dec 2021. We cant travel any other time due to kids holidays and work. We booked way before covid. Now cant travel (we want to but France not letting us). £850 in eurostar tickets wasted. Its a disgrace. Customer service team very nice but point blank so no refund due. I cant afford to lose £850. It's not our fault. Shocking. I think a collective group of customers in same situation need to take this further. A protest/demo outside head office or at Kingscross.

items.title: Unhelpful, irresponsible  Eurostar Customer Service, overly bureaucratic procedures that even staff don't understand
items.review_text:
After travelling on trains through Germany, France and Belgium conveniently and without any hassle, at Eurostar in Brussels the experience took a terrible turn.  As I had not noticed that  Iwould need to buy a  separate ticket for my instrument (which could fit easily standing next to me sharing my seat without) I had to buy one.  I had arrived with 2 hours to spare so this should have been possible.   However, I faced I wall of ineptitude, unhelpfulness, lack of training, as unsympathetic, unskilled staff were sending me from office to office across a large building (my carrying weight was no issue to them if they could avoid lifting a finger). I faced a large number of contradicting statements, prices, and procedure.  The 2 hours twindled down to minutes before departure and with no ticket in sight, instead Eurostar employees still starring vacantly at their computer screens.  No regard for the stress this caused to someone about to miss their international travel, they continued in their slow, bureaucratic way. In the end a ticket could not be produced even though I had paid.  A "manager" was supposed to see me through the gate, but he didn't come.  An employee took pity of me and let me through and I ran through the doors as they closed behind me 10 seconds later.  Very different to the Eurostar adverts.  Much better and cheaper to go by plane, where there will always be someone who knows the procedure.  With Eurostar  I was trapped.  
I wrote to complain but no one replied!

items.title: Worst experience ever!!
items.review_text:
Worst experience ever!!! 
Still waiting for my money back or equal voucher from April last year.
Thank you euro star.
I will tell everyone I know to do not expect too much from your company and never relay on your services!!!
Best regards

items.title: Unsafe and unprofessional during the pandemic. Used to be great!
items.review_text:
Before the pandemic I would have given five stars! In the last year:

- March 2020 booked business class and it cost £200 extra to switch my ticket. No business class services were provided onboard, other than small bottles of water being handed out
- October 2020 train was crowded, with social distancing impossible. I paid £75 to upgrade to business class, for safety, but in business class everyone was without their masks as they were eating the provided meal
- January 2021 social distancing was impossible at the St Pancras paperwork check, with a Eurostar employee actively encouraging people to bunch up
- They advertise that all bookings are flexible but, unlike flexible flights, they must be rescheduled the week before travel, rather than the usual 24 hours.

The only reason I have continued to use Eurostar is that it is more environmentally friendly than flying.

items.title: Allianz & Eurostar Fraud ! Please be aware.
items.review_text: I've been offered for cancellation insurance in addition to my ticket fee it says if you need to cancel your trip for personal reasons you'll be covered. I paid 15£ and felt relaxed because I need to apply shengen visa before my travel and it was risky due to covid. Now, I tried to claim the refund due to covid travel restrictions and they said this doesn't covers covid. Basically, it is a fraud you just  need to give extra money to Allianz and Eurostar. They stole my money during covid time great experience. Will never forget it !

items.title: Very poor service on the phone. I was pretty much told that I cannot have money back because I was silly to book in the midst of a pandemic. Eurostar has taken our money but given no service in return
items.review_text: I just requested a cash refund,because we had booked and re-booked twice over the course of the last year.

items.title: Client satisfait depuis plusieurs…
items.review_text: Client satisfait depuis plusieurs années, le service est excellent à bord comparé à la concurrence, les trains sont très conforts et toujours "on time", j'ai du annuler un voyage en raison du covid l'année dernière et j'ai discuté avec Maryline du service client par email qui as trouvée une solution satisfaisante, arrêter d'être aussi dur avec eux sur cette page car comme toutes société en lien avec le tourisme (comme les hôtels, etc...) elle souffre beaucoup financièrement, il réponde lentement mais toujours, et si vous n'êtes pas agressif ils seront bien plus sympa et coopératif ;) , courage Eurostar on t'aime !

items.title: Cela fait des années que je voyage avec…
items.review_text:
Cela fait des années que je voyage avec Eurostar et globalement tout s’est toujours bien passé mais je vais vous parler de mon expérience suite au Covid-19.

Je devais voyager avec mon fils en avril 2020, je décale mon voyage à décembre 2020 et ensuite à avril 2021.
Nous sommes en mars 2021, la frontière est fermée avec la Grande Bretagne mais Eurostar refuse de me rembourser car mon train prévu en avril est pour le moment maintenu.

J’ai deux « solutions » :
 1. Attend 24h avant le départ pour faire une demande de remboursement SI mon train est annulé. Si mon train est maintenu je serai hors délai pour décaler mon voyage.
2. Encore décaler mon voyage.

Eurostar est mauvais en service clientèle et devrait traiter chaque demande au cas par cas.

items.title: Still waiting on refund 2020
items.review_text: Still waiting on refund for train cancelled by them summer 2020!  This was also at a time when it was perfectly fine to travel.  Also if you accepted a voucher when it expires in one year you do not recieve your refund in accordance with the law.

items.title: I have been using Eurostar for many…
items.review_text: I have been using Eurostar for many years and always very much enjoyed the service - especially the simplicity of it. Yes, prices have increased a lot - I would very much enjoy seeing more affordable prices.

items.title: Much improved but still not perfect
items.review_text:
22/02/21- update. 
Service and flexibility has become much better. Credit where credit's due-was able to cancel my booking and get a voucher valid for almost 18 months. 
Still not perfect, they didn't refund me the full value of what I paid (they didn't refund the ticket transfer fees due to my initial booking being booked before the pandemic and then having to change the date because of travel restrictions caused by the pandemic) 

Old revew-
Eurostar have behaved very badly over the pandemic, making it impossible to get refunds and charging huge amounts to change tickets. They are behaving very underhanded and I would 100% recommend not to buy any ticket from them at all until the pandemic is 100% over.
Eurostar do not respect or value their customers at all.

items.title: Waardeloos bedrijf
items.review_text: Waardeloos bedrijf. Eigenlijk zijn ze ook geen 'één ster' waard. Krijgen geen geld terug. De voucher kunnen we niet meer gebruiken. Krijgen ook geen reactie op e-mails. Wij hebben onze rechtsbijstand ingeschakeld. Nooit nooit nooit meer.

items.title: Excellent Customer Service
items.review_text: Huge thank you to the customer service team who resolved my concern regarding cancelled trip.  We were due to go to Amsterdam in April however due to current restrictions we cancelled the hotel.  Trains were still running on our due date however following a virtual conversation they have allowed me to have a evoucher for the full amount.  Really pleased as I thought I would lose the whole amount.  Looking forward to when we can travel with them again

items.title: Très mauvaise première expérience
items.review_text: Très mauvaise première expérience. Bons d'achat reçus mais inutilisables vu la crise. Aucune solution proposée. Une honte !

items.title: LET OP VOOR U BOEKT!!
items.review_text:
LET OP VOOR U BOEKT!!
Eurostar is GEEN alternatief voor vliegen. Nu begrijp ik dat Corona flexibiliteit vraagt echter mis ik deze bij Eurostar. Ik heb ik tot op heden nog steeds geen antwoorden op mijn vragen m.b.t. de voucher die veel te laat is opgestuurd. Het betreft mijn geplande reis in de 2020. Als ik mijn reis opnieuw wil boeken voor augustus 2021, wordt ik al geconfronteerd met beperkte beschikbaarheid. 4 dagen Londen zit er daarom niet in. Echter mijn voucher loopt wel af. Communicatie verloopt moeizaam, als je al iemand aan de lijn krijgt. Reacties op mail krijg ik pas na 3 tot 4 maanden. Het enthousiasme om te reizen met Eurostar is weg. Ik laat de trein voor wat het is en ik neem maar mijn verlies. Wat ik in deze nog het ergste vind is dat dit een tripje zou zijn samen met mijn zoon voor zijn behaalde examen, in deze toch al moeilijke tijd....

items.title: Avis positif sur Eurostar, ça existe!
items.review_text:
Je me permets d'écrire un avis positif, car aux vues des dizaines de messages négatifs, je devais raconter mon expérience avec Eurostar! 
Comme beaucoup d'entre vous, j'ai dû annuler mon voyage à Londres l'été dernier et Eurostar m'a envoyé des vouchers rapidement.
À la lumière de la situation actuelle, je me décide à demander un remboursement intégral de mes billets (environ 520€). Quand j'ai lu les retours d'autres clients, et lu les articles sur la situation financière de l'entreprise, je me suis dit que je ne serai jamais remboursée!
Eh bien, je peux vous affirmer que mon remboursement des billets s'est réglé en 15 jours!!! Eurostar a répondu à chaque fois à mes mails. Je n'y croyais plus.
Cependant, il me semble que lors de la réservation initiale, j'avais pris l'assurance annulation... c'est peut-être pour cela que j'ai eu gain de cause!?
En tous cas, je devais vous expliquer mon expérience avec Eurostar et ma satisfaction vis-à-vis de la société!

items.title: TERRIBLE!
items.review_text:
👎
Je n’ai tout simplement pas de mots pour ce terrible service ferroviaire qui emploie des intimidateurs comme la sécurité.J’ai eu un test covid négatif qui a été estampillé, mais a refusé l’entrée dans le train.J’ai ensuite été détenu pendant une heure sans explication, puis laissé aller.Traité comme un criminel pour quoi??? Je n’utiliserai plus jamais cet Eurostar !

items.title: Sadly I have to give 1 star to be able…
items.review_text: Sadly I have to give 1 star to be able to write my complaint. LET ME TAKE IT AWAY. Useless company who does not refund tickets despite several requests. Using COVID as an excuse not to answer queries. Despicable behaviour

items.title: VOLEUR !
items.review_text:
Nous avons effectué une réservation pour un voyage en famille en juin 2020, au vu de la situation nous avons donc repoussé notre voyage pour aout, sauf que nous devions obligatoirement faire une quarantaine impossible et illogique pour un simple weekend. Eurostar nous envois des voucher ok ! Mais maintenant nous ne pouvons plus du tout aller en Angleterre, cela fait 3 mois que je cours après EUROSTAR  pour un remboursement de nos billets pour plus de 500 €! et rien ! bien évidemment pour eux 500 €c'est rien ! mais pour une famille c'est énorme ! et surtout en ce moment ! 
Vraiment des VOLEURS ! je suis bien déçue ca au lieu d'être à l'écoute des voyageurs ! ils jouent aux fantômes et nous balance de service en service !

items.title: Disgusting
items.review_text:
Am now on my third request to sit my partner and i together
Staff constantly ignore my request

items.title: REFUS DE REMBOURSER
items.review_text:
REFUS DE REMBOURSER, VOLEUR !
Bonne faillite

items.title: Eurostar illegally never offered full £424.50 refund
items.review_text:
I was due to travel on the Eurostar last year, to Brussels and Paris, with my partner.

We were never offered refunds for our travels (which cost in total £424.50) despite being legally entitled to them, as our trains were cancelled due to the Coronavirus pandemic.

Despite explicitly requesting a full refund, Eurostar said they didn't offer full refunds, so I reluctantly accepted a voucher instead.

I have now discovered we were legally entitled to a full refund - meaning Eurostar basically refused/ignored/lied about my request, saying they can only offer vouchers.

This is clearly illegal and completely immoral. 

We haven't travelled with Eurostar since and I will use other alternatives after the pandemic ends.

I have written to the Eurostar customer service about this. Let's see what happens.

items.title: VERY bad
items.review_text: VERY bad. I don't want to give Eurostar any stars as I am STILL waiting for a refund on a cancelled train from last April! I continue to get standard replies saying how many claims they are processing but no news on my refund.

items.title: I complaint about Eurostar in…
items.review_text:
I complaint about Eurostar in resolver.co.uk and had no response - i am brasilian I have a VOUCHER VALID UNTIL 01 JUNE 2021 BUT WILL BE IMPOSSIBLE TO TRAVEL IN 2021 BECAUSE OF COVID 19 BECAUSE RESTRICT TRAVELS FROM BRASIL TO OTHER COUNTRY AND BECAUSE OF COVID 19 SITUATION  I EMAIL.THEM 10 TIMES AND TRYING TO CONTACT WITH NO SUCESS I WILL LOOK UP FOR MY RIGHTS I AM EXTEND MY VOUCHER EXPIRY DATE 01 JUNE 2021 WILL NOT BE ENOUGH TO TRAVEL SAFELY 

BRASIL IS LATE DID NOT BEGIN VACINATION  DOES NOT HAVE A VACINE APROVAL DOES NOT HAVE VACINATION PLAN DID NOT BUY ANY VACINE YET.   I IMPLORE TO EXTEND MY VOUCHER TO 2022 SO I CAN TRAVEL SAFELY WITH MY PARTER WHO IS 62 YEARS OLD.   IDO NOT RECOMEND EUROSTAR TO ANYBODY

EUROSTAR DO NOT RESPOND 
EUROSTAR REFUSE REFUND
EUROSTAR GIVE VOUCHER 12 MONTHS BUT COVID 19 ISGETTING WORSE IN THE WORLD  MY CPINTRY BRASIL IS SUFFERING MORE THAN 210.000 DEATHS NORE THAN 8.5 MILLION CASES . DO NOT HAVE TEST ENOUGHT . NO OXIGEN IN HOSPITAL  TOTAL CAOS . PLEASE EXTEND MY VOUCHER SO I CAN TRAVEL SUMMER 2022 AFTER VACINATION

I WILL CONTINUE TO TRY CONTACT BECAUSE I AM NOT LOSING MORE THAN 100 EUROS MY TRIP WAS CANCELLED BY EUROSTAR IN 2020 AND I WANT TO EXTEND MY VOUCHER TO TRAVEL SUMMER 2022 SO OR EUROSTAR EXTEND MY TRAVEL VOUCHER OR OPEN MORE THAN 1 INE YEAR AHEAD SEATS TO JULY 2022 AUGUST 2022 PLEASE

items.title: Appalling customer service
items.review_text: Appalling customer service, having been forced to rebook a trip to Paris due to COVID travel restrictions Eurostar have proved almost impossible to contact. Emails take 10 days to get a response from them. Rebooking the tickets at a 4th attempt almost impossible as only a skeleton service offered - will not be travelling with Eurostar in future.

items.title: Disappointing in light of Covid
items.review_text:
Disappointing in light of Covid.  We had booked to travel at the end of March and could not go when the restrictions were brought in.

Our Airbnb was refunded immediately (great, smooth service) but Eurostar was a different story. Almost impossible to get a refund so I accepted an voucher which I still haven't received (Almost 9 months on).

Furthermore the vouchers had an arbitrary expiry date, but of course due to Covid risks and vulnerability we have not been able to travel. 

Shameful stealing from the little people to line their pockets at a time when everyone is struggling.

Sorry, but will not be using again.

items.title: "Ok so we're breaking the law. Goodbye"
items.review_text: "Ok so we're breaking the law. Goodbye." These are not words you expect to hear from customer support agents. Overall response to uncertainty created by COVID has been poor

items.title: Still waiting for my refund
items.review_text: Still waiting for my refund, what a shame 1 month and nothing done so far...

items.title: Refuse le remboursement
items.review_text: A la suite du COVID, Eurostar refuse de me rembourser ma réservation et préfère me faire parvenir des e-voucher inutilisables… Histoire de conserver l'argent de la réservation. J'ai pourtant demandé plusieurs fois le remboursement plutôt que des e-vouchers, mais rien à faire, Eurostar n'est pas honnête.

items.title: Unable to travel to Europe due to COVID…
items.review_text:
Unable to travel to Europe due to COVID restrictions, only European business that would not give a refund. Even though travel restrictions from Australia to Europe were in place. The attitude was, "the train is running we will not refund you".
Service was lousy, will never use nor recommend Eurostar. If I could give minus stars I would!

items.title: Cancelled train more than 5 months in advance and ignores their customers
items.review_text: Euro star have cancelled our trains booked for April 2022, due to covid19. I have emailed them asking for a refund and explanation as to how they can justify cancelling a train that was at the time over 5 months away. I have yet to receive a response, I feel like they are ignoring me. You can't cancel a train and then ignore your customers! I got offered the option if an evoucher in the cancellation email, no thank you. I will not be rebooting my trip until I can trust the service again. You cancelled the trip, therefore you voided the contract. You owe me a refund, keep your poxy evouchers. I will be taking it further if you do not respond to your customers

items.title: Larceny.
items.review_text:
Eurostar claims to have refunded my payment for a London/Paris trip.
Eurostar canceled the voyage because of the Coronavirus pandemic. 
Eurostar initially only offered a travel voucher for future usage.  I filed a dispute with my financial (credit card) institution, but being that it was considered a legitimate transaction my claim was denied.
Eurostar kept the funds, but claimed to have submitted a refund to my very popular, but equally incompetent payment service.

items.title: Très déçue 😡
items.review_text:
Très déçue. Suite à la crise sanitaire, le voyage de la famille qui était prévu pour avril 2020 a été annulé. Eurostar ne répondait pas apres maintes relances (via les mails et les réseaux sociaux), ils ont finalement daigné m’envoyer des vouchers pour septembre 2020 (comme si la situation sanitaire le permettrait). Impossible d’obtenir un remboursement malgré la situation sanitaire, complètement anormal ! 
Mise a jour : finalement j'ai été remboursee au bout de 9 mois ! Mieux vaut tard que jamais.

items.title: I will not be able to use my train…
items.review_text:
I will not be able to use my train ticket due to government regulations, yet I will not get a refund but only a voucher valid to June 2021

Also keep in mind that they advertise you will be "free to change and get vouchers" but it's 14 days within date of travel, otherwise they take 30 Pounds from you - which is unreasonable since I didn't know my train would not be usable two weeks ago with government travel bans only being stated last weekend

items.title: DAYLIGHT ROBBERY.
items.review_text:
My train from Paris/London was canceled by Eurostar and therefore they sent me an email telling me not to travel to Paris because my return was canceled and will be getting E-Vouchers as a refund. A month later i sent an email enquiring about my E-Vouchers and been told that my evouchers were in fact used, by whom? Not me anyway. I've tried again and again to phone them and get to the bottom of this but nobody answer the phone. Airbnb refunded straight away why not Eurostar?
And why this flagrant liar?
Disgusting treatment towards theirs best customers. 
I will not stop here.

items.title: Cela fait maintenant 2 fois que je les…
items.review_text:
Cela fait maintenant 2 fois que je les contact la première fois cela a été très rapide, suite au COVID j’ai du annuler mon voyage j’ai donc fait une demande de e-voucher. Celle-ci m’a été transmise 2 semaines plus tard environ. 
A présent je souhaite utiliser mes e-vouchers et là impossible, le site me dit qu’ils ont déjà été utilisés (pas assez de caractère ou trop, les e-vouchers ont déjà été utilisés) alors que je n’ai fait aucune autre réservation depuis. Je les contact donc une première fois, aucune réponse. Alors 2 semaines plus tard je renvoie un mail, encore 0 réponse appart le mail robot me disant qu’ils ont bien reçu mon mail. 
Cela fait à présent 2 semaines encore une fois que je n’ai aucune réponse.

items.title: SCAM COMPANY
items.review_text:
I booked a ticket that was cancelled by the company itself. They canceled it last minute and refused to give me a monetary refund. Instead they gave me a voucher for 65€. the original ticket price was 79€ and they deducted 14€ for a handling fee, in which they never provided a service nor honored their terms of agreement that stated clearly I would receive a FULL REFUND.
Totally useless voucher that now I am afraid of using in case I try to book another trip which they can cancel and charge another 14€! 

Definitely I do not recommend this company

items.title: inderdaad, schandalig
items.review_text: We boekten 2 plaatsen A'dam London in februari voor juli.  Ze hebben geannuleerd. Vanaf die dag hadden ze een verplichting om ons terug te betalen. Ze maakten het erg moeilijk, wilden een voucher geven, maar geen restitutie en maakten het moeilijk om de terugbetaling link te vinden, maar we hebben volgehouden dat we een restitutie wilden en gewacht. Uiteindelijk kregen we te horen dat het 14 dagen zou duren. We hebben maanden gewacht. Toen kregen we te horen: nog 28 dagen te horen. Weer een paar maanden gewacht. Deze week hoorden we nog 28 dagen. Ik schreef en zei dat ik de volgende stappen zou zetten. De NL-ombudsman stelde voor om contact op te nemen met een Britse waakhond genaamd London Travel Watch. We waren ook van plan om een class action suit te beginnen, omdat zoveel mensen boos zijn over deze slechte service. Vandaag kregen we eindelijk ons geld terug. Mijn advies: wees volhardend, en neem het mee naar de volgende stap. Wat ze doen zou illegaal moeten zijn. We hebben drie reizen (autohuur, vluchten, hotels) geannuleerd en eurostar was het enige bedrijf dat ons geld voor bijna 5 maanden heeft ingehouden.

items.title: Voucher onbruikbaar. Contact onmogelijk.
items.review_text: Na een door Corona geannuleerde reis een voucher ontvangen. Die kon niet worden gebruikt. Eurostar is niet bereikbaar en geeft geen geld terug. Hier wordt duidelijk opzettelijk contact onmogelijk gemaakt.

items.title: Would give zero if I could
items.review_text: Would give zero if I could - awful customer service. My train was cancelled by Eurostar in March due to COVID. They gave my boyfriend a refund for his ticket within two weeks. However, they insisted on giving me a voucher instead of a refund. I called to dispute this and they agreed that this was unfair and that they would have to send a voucher due to their system already being programmed this way, but I could receive a refund for the voucher. I still haven't received the voucher nine months down the line. This is extremely greedy and disrespectful to their customers, and the lack of consistency regarding the treatment of my boyfriend and myself just goes to show that they have no clear system and do not care about customer service. Had no problems with refunds from Ryanair and Easyjet! Will never use Eurostar again.

items.title: Les gens satisfaits ne donnent pas assez leur avis
items.review_text:
Si vous ne lisez que les premières lignes: retenez bien que les gens insatisfaits écrivent bien plus souvent des avis que les gens satisfaits, d'où cette incroyable écart ici je pense.

---

Je me permets d'écrire un avis pour contraster avec tous les négatifs.
Personnellement, depuis plus d'un an, j'opte pour le train pour réduire mon empreinte carbone. Résidant en Angleterre, mais venant tous les 2-3 mois en France, je n'ai jamais eu de souci avec Eurostar, qui je trouve très professionnel et communiquant. L'application et la communication sont bien au-delà de la SNCF. J'espère que ceux qui critiquent autant Eurostar se rendent compte que la SNCF est bien bien pire (j'ai expérimenté longtemps et les problèmes sont bien plus fréquents, et même quasi systématiques).
Concernant la situation COVID, j'ai plusieurs fois eu à décaler/échanger mes billets, je n'ai jamais eu le moindre souci (contrairement à l'expérience de certains). Je n'ai pas réalisé de remboursement par contre, donc je ne peux donner d'avis là-dessus.

---

Pour résumer:
- application fonctionnelle, jamais de problème
- communication très fréquente et en avance de tout évènement ou changement pouvant impacter le voyage
- changement des billets sans souci
- personnel de bord et en gare au top et souriant

items.title: Eurostar and French police refused me…
items.review_text:
Eurostar and French police refused me to embark in their train from London to Belgium because I'm black.

I was travel Brussels from London with my Girlfriend she's white, the French police didn't ask anything to her and they started ask a lot of questions, I just asked the French police officer why they ask me all that questions and they haven't nothing to my girlfriend because of that they said I can't travel and call the British police to take out, they said I'm not allowed to travel today but tomorrow will be okay, because of me she didn't travel as well, but they didn't giv me any motivation of refuse me to travel, even Eurostar customer services didn't help at all, when I insisted a lot to know I can't not travel, they said because of my behaviours. I would like to know how can I feeling if I travel with a white person they haven't as any questions to her and they stopped me for only to ask me questions about my trip when the person I travel with just get in with any poblem. If you're black don't travel with Eurostar or to France because the French authorities are very racist.

items.title: They refuse to give any refunds for Covid-19
items.review_text: They refuse to give any refunds for trips canceled because of Government restrictions on travel due to Covid-19.  We tried to re-book 3 times and each time the governments of both France and the UK have banned us from traveling in and out of their countries and yet Eurostar continues to keep our money!  EVERY other airline and train company has given us our money back.  Eurostar STILL refuses!

items.title: 0 REMBOURSEMENTS (Confinement)
items.review_text: Profondément scandaliser de la politique de remboursement de EUROSTAR vis-à-vis du confinement en France et qui rend impossible tout voyage en train. J'ai pu obtenir un remboursement total de la SNCF mais pas de l'Eurostar. Qui ne souhaite rien rembourser. EUROSTAR NOUS PREND EN OTAGE, très clairement. Rien n'est mis à jour sur leur site depuis le 30 octobre, on est le 2 novembre. Impossible. SACHEZ QUE JE NE VOYAGERAI PLUS AVEC EUROSTAR. JE PORTE PLAINTE.

items.title: En attente d'une réponse et de mon remboursement
items.review_text:
Je contacte par tous les moyens possibles la société pour obtenir mon remboursement (3 fois d'abord). Le voyage a déjà été annulé deux fois à cause de la situation actuelle. On me propose un bon d'achat que bien évidemment je ne souhaite pas accepter. Depuis mon refus, plus de réponse de la part de l'entreprise malgré 2 formulaires supplémentaires envoyés via le site. 

Je tente Facebook comme nouveau moyen de contact et je n'obtient qu'un copié collé disant qu'ils me proposent un bon d'achat. 

Le service client n'est pas un priorité évidemment. Il suffit de voir les notes et les avis ici. J'attends toujours mon remboursement.

items.title: I had the worst eurostar experience…
items.review_text:
I had the worst eurostar experience yesterday 23 October 2020, afternoon train. 
It is been few weeks/months that eurostar is struggling with covid, constantly cancelling bookings. 
Those cancellated booking are free of charge replacement. But those ticket always disappear from the eurostar app. So it is difficult to track ticket whose has been cancelled. So you always have to go back to your booking emails, if you still have them. It is OK if you one ticket cancelled but when you have 10 return tickets it is really painful and not clear. 
In addition, you cannot change them on the app as from time to time it does not work. 
So as I could not change my ticket I went to eurostar yesterday beforr departure as i have done it several times before, I asked someone to change my ticket to the next departure. But, when I arrived they had no one from eurostar able to change my cancelled tickets due to a reduction of staf in the station. But had 3 people there to say 'hi' to people!? Find the error !
The staf there was berly speaking French. Feel really offended that the line manager present there expected me to speak with me in  flamish to explain the current issue.  Feel a bit of racism! She did not want to help me at all.
Later on, an other lady arrived, a bit late 15minutes before departure. She was almost having an heart attack when the eurostar line manager told her she cannot get in. The line manage and her colleague have not moved a fingers in order to help this poor lady while having an shorten breath. She would have let her die. 
It is unbelievable how eurostar is dealing with covid issue. It is the worst experience I have ever had. How people can be that unrespectful?
Eurostar should review they staf and find helpful staf, willing to help passengers in this diffucult time and not make the passanger life even more diffucult. 
Next time I will travel by flight.

items.title: Verschrikkelijk slechte service voor…
items.review_text:
Verschrikkelijk slechte service voor het omboeken van je ticket. Te lange wachttijden, fouten die worden gemaakt door de mederwerker na het bellen etc. 
 Duidelijke misbruik van hun monopolie.

items.title: Thieves
items.review_text: I was notified less that 24 hours before my departure that my return ticket was cancelled. With both reduced Eurostar service and current Sncf Covid schedules there is just no trains that connects on time anymore for my journey back. That meant that if I were to take the inbound journey I would end up stranded in France. The only option I had left with was to change my journey from Strasbourg-London via Lille instead of Paris. Eurostar refused to change this leg of the journey for me despite the inconvenience they caused. They told me the only option I had was to get the voucher and rebook the entire journey back. But the entire journey back including changing the Sncf trains last minute would have cost us 2.5x the price of our original tickets. No compensation, no help, just a stressful two hours on the phone arguing with them to end up with nothing. Holidays cancelled. Oh and yes now I need to wait 28 days to be able to use up my voucher. Thieves.

items.title: They will not refund my money
items.review_text: They will not refund my money.  THey claim they have sent a refund, but my bank tells me such a "refund" has not reached them after 6 months.  Maybe they sent it "Burro Express", but it is starting to look more and more like they just want to keep my money and keep on making excuses.

items.title: Billets de train de mai 2020 non…
items.review_text: Billets de train de mai 2020 non remboursés. On nous a imposé des bons non datés à utiliser dans les prochains mois alors que la situation sanitaire ne permet toujours pas de prévoir un voyage à Londres. C’est honteux et contraire au droit européen ! Et nous sommes nombreux à être dans ce cas !

items.title: Your website is such a bad experience
items.review_text:
Your website is such a bad experience! Your customer service is hard to reach. 

Problem 1 - back in June I was coming back from France to the UK and my tickets were canceled and your website wouldn't let me change my ticket so I had to buy a new one. I sent you an email asking for a refund and I still didn't get a reply. Can someone reply to me and pay me back for this please it has been months. 

Problem 2: I have a trip to the UK next week and my train both ways was canceled, I was told to change my train free of charge but when I go to manage my booking all the options are paid. I am being asked to pay £105 for changing my trains. I now tried several times to log in and log out from my account, once I saw the options to be free (which is how it should be) so I selected the options and pressed a button to change my ticket, but guess what the Eurostar website decided to crash. It's saying "we are almost there" for the past 15 minutes. So as a result I still did not manage to change my tickets. I am posting here and on Twitter in a hope to get a response.

items.title: Un service client honteux.
items.review_text:
Un service client honteux.
Le site internet et l'application fonctionnent 1/4 fois.
Impossible de renseigner votre numero d'adhérent fidélité. (plus de 10 voyages pas enregistrés en 8 mois a cause du dysfonctionnement des plateformes)
J'ai voulu demander un retour des mes points fidélités, 1 mois après on vous répond que c'est impossible, que vous êtes un menteur et que le service client est disponible 5/7 par mail et telephone etc etc (ce qui est faux, cela fait des mois que j'essai de les joindre par telephone)
En gros service client impoli et insultant et ne fait aucun effort commercial (tout est toujours de votre faute, vous n'avez pas fait ce qu'il faut en temps voulu etc).
Les prix sont chers et bougent tout le temps à la hausse, le programme de fidélité ne permet pas grand chose, et le service client est plus qu'incompétent.

items.title: Nooit meer!
items.review_text: Mijn vriend en ik wilden enkele romantische dagen in Londen beleven voor Valentijn. We hadden eerste klasse geboekt, maar om de een of andere reden kwamen we terecht in een tweedeklasserijtuig van aan aftandse trein. Er was geen WiFi beschikbaar. Bij vertrek werd aangekondigd dat het personeel regelmatig door de trein zou komen, we hebben de treinmanager welgeteld 1 keer door de trein zien rennen. Toen we bij aankomst in Londen ons beklag gingen doen, bleek dat ze een oude ipv een nieuwe trein hadden ingelegd en dat daardoor onze zitplaats- en wagonnummer aangepast was. Natuurlijk werden we daar bij vertrek niet van ingelicht, maar wel pas bij aankomst. Een compensatie konden we niet krijgen, want ze vonden dat het onze fout was. Op de terugweg zaten we dan wel in eerste klasse en wonder boven wonder was de treinmanager daar zeer beschikbaar. Hij had zich namelijk bij enkele reizigers die hij kende geplaatst (die volgens ik begrepen had van de steward bovendien kaartjes voor tweedeklas hadden) en was gezellig wijntjes aan het drinken met hen. Tegen Brussel was hij stomdronken en kon hij zelfs niet meer rechtop wandelen! Veiligheid voorop? Het personeel sprak bovendien amper Nederlands of Engels, enkel de aankondigingen in het Frans waren verstaanbaar (alhoewel bij aankomst in Brussel de treinmanager zo dronken was dat ook dat op niets meer leek). Ik heb dit alles in een klacht gemeld, maar de klantendienst heeft zich er zonder compensatie met een goedkoop standaardantwoord vanaf gemaakt. Volgende keer vliegen we. Eurostar neem ik nooit meer.

items.title: Update - Gift voucher refusal to extend expiry date
items.review_text: I was initially very disappointed to find that eurostar were not prepared to extend the expiry date on vouchers bought as a gift. The person had not been able to use them due to the covid situation as they are in the vulnerable category. Their initial response was to say all vouchers are only valid for 12 months. However after I emailed expressing my disappointment and also posted a negative review on here they replied promptly. They apologised for the first email and have now extended the vouchers until Sept next year.

items.title: Horrible & Stressful Journey, I’ll never EuroStar again!
items.review_text:
Horrible customer service, rude train staff and uncomfortable journey. They cancelled and rebooked our journey multiple times, costing us hundreds of pounds, saying we had to pay again for each rebooking. In the end, the trains they booked were so messed up that we arrived from Amsterdam to Brussels AFTER our train from Brussels to London left. Thus, missing our ride back home. We spent so much extra money trying to get back to the UK. 

And, although I deeply support and understand the current COVID19 sensitivity and the required guidelines, I suffer from severe eczema on my face, which makes me medically exempt from face masks. I still do my best to put up with the pain and wear a face mask for as many hours as I can.  Wearing one for a prolonged amount of time causes bleeding and a lot of pain. After the first 2 hours of the journey, my skin needed a break, but when I informed the attendants, they told me unless I had a medical report from a hospital, I wasn’t allowed to take it off. UK laws strictly prohibit anyone from asking for a medical report to prove you are exempt from face masks due to a medical disability, which can be seen on the government website. However, Eurostar is clearly exempt from government guidelines. I felt really embarrassed trying to explain my health condition, which feels so private, and the UK guidelines to an attendant while the whole carriage listened.

items.title: Well I purchased tickets for my…
items.review_text: Well I purchased tickets for my grandchildren Brussel- Lon return for easter due to C19 I claimed evoucher after many emails eventually they made part payment as I used two cards to make the payment. they still owe me £60 and can't get it back each time they say 5 days but 5 days never arrives.

items.title: Owh ja...je moet in quarantaine
items.review_text: Net een reis geboekt online, ik dacht leuk met mijn vriend naar Londen te gaan met oud en nieuw. Overal advertenties en aanprijzingen. Wel dacht ik even aan de corona maatregelen maar het eerste wat ik vond was een pagina over de maatregelen aan boord. Enfin prima, mondkapje niks mis mee. Ik boeken 224 euro weg en zie dan pas een Let op: je moet in quarantaine voor 14 dagen als je reist vanaf Nederland per Augustus. En natuurlijk geen geld terug of annuleren maar yeeeh gratis omzetten, heel top. Nergens tijdens het boeken en waarschuwing, nergens een pop up. Ik snap dat je nog steeds geld wil eurostar maar dit is toch wel een beetje dikke oplichterij, spreidt eens de goede informatie joh heb ik veel meer aan.

items.title: Impossible d'obtenir un remboursement…
items.review_text: Impossible d'obtenir un remboursement du au corona virus, malgres le fait que je ne pourrais pas utliser leur voucher dans le delai qu'ils m'ont fixe.

items.title: Eurotrash!
items.review_text:
Had tickets booked from Paris to London. Five days before we were due to travel, we got a message saying our train had been cancelled, but we would be issued with a voucher, which we could offset against future travel.

If a service provider fails to provided the service which has been contractually agreed, without offering a valid reason, then they are in breach of contract. Eurostar's reson was 'Covid-19 restrictions'. At the time, the restrictions were no different to when we made our outward journey so this was nonsense. In any case, if they don't provide the service, they are legally obliged to make a full refund.

Anyway, to continue. Although our train was cancelled, they had another one available, for which we could book tickets at almost 4 X the cost of the original ones. You might ask why they didn't simply offer us travel on that train using our original tickets, if seats were available. We wondered that too and emailed Eurostar, but three days later, there is still no reply.

Effectively, Eurostar abandoned its customers in a foreign country and offered not a jot of support, simply asking for more money. Bearing in mind the current situation, I would put this on the same level as profiteering in wartime. Their behaviour is absolutely despicable.

Despite the inconvenience and added time, I will be driving to Europe in future, rather than travelling with this bunch of crooks

items.title: Lost A Loyal Customer
items.review_text: I've staying in travelled many times with Eurostar, and was generally happy with them, so was expecting a reasonable approach during the Covid times. However, their policies have left me significantly out of pocket so I won't be travelling with them again.

items.title: très déçue d'eurostar je pensais que…
items.review_text:
très déçue d'eurostar je pensais que c'était sérieux pas du tout 
je ne recommande pas j'attends toujours mon avoir mais je pense que je vais déposer plainte car par contre pour encaisser l'argent ils ont mis moins de temps que de nous refaire un avoir 
et quand je vois les autres avis on a pas fini de réclamer

items.title: Taking advantage of Covid to rip off customers
items.review_text:
No answer from customer service 
Didn't appreciate they have used Covid-19 and travel restrictions to increase their prices and force people to pay double to travel back. Also never book another train ticket on Eurostar. They offer the bookings but won't take responsibility if the train is late and you miss your connection ( and they don't plan enough time between connections).

items.title: Voucher arrived promptly
items.review_text: I asked for a voucher because I had to cancel my second attempt at going to Amsterdam because of Covid. The voucher was issued the same day. I just hope that I'm not going to have to pay more when I rebook for May 2021!

items.title: Voleurs + menteurs, J'ai honte pour vous.
